content: ['We went to the Boisdale restaurant for my anniversary and we were very happy of our choise.', 'An excellent and spacious restaurant, perfect service, nice atmoshpere, very good food, high standard wine and drinks.', 'On the top of it, Mud Morganfield, the eldest son of Muddy Wateers, made a great show with his band.', 'To recommend!']
title: Amazing place!

content: ["Have been here a few times and it's always good. The food is consistently of a high standard; the environment's nice and a bit different; the service is excellent and they're really helpful; and the price is pretty reasonable - especially with the set menu and the deals they tend to run. Recommend!"]
title: Always good

content: ["My wife, 19 year old son and I took the trip down from Yorkshire to experience Sunday lunch at the Boisdale. We hadn't appreciated at the time of booking that it was mothers day, so an added bonus for us. We arrived at 12 noon and were shown to our table next to the floor to ceiling windows with nice views of the surrounding area and within a decent proximity of the stage. My wife and I had visited before but never for Sunday lunch.", "We opted to include the wine option and upgraded to the finer wine. Great choice, the Rioja was superb as was the Chablis that my son decided on. We explained to the staff that we didn't want to rush the afternoon and they said we could take thing at our own pace and call in our food as and when.", 'My wife and I chose the roast beef for mains whilst my son had the burger. All was fine, beef nicely cooked however like a previous reviewer the roast potatoes were desperately salty (just had to drink more Rioja!). Deserts very nice and overall no complaints about the food. The jazz was discrete and not like the shows they put on in the evenings, just background sort of music but very pleasant none the less.', 'We managed to hold out until 4pm and agreed that the value for money was exceptional taking into account having enjoyed a good meal and some very good wine.', 'The staff who took care of us were very professional and friendly and we enjoyed some great conversations with them. Special thanks to Jean-Claude who kept us topped up with table water, Kevin Anderson who provided the bread and Christophe our lead waiter who made sure our afternoon was perfect and kept the glasses filled.', 'We are already planning our return and look forward to seeing the team again soon. Thanks for a great Mothers Day afternoon.']
title: Great Mothering Sunday lunch.

content: ["Slightly hard to find the first time, it's upstairs adjactent to Cabot square, with its own lift off the main mall. Staff are very welcoming, and the selection on the menu is good. While you're waiting, you can admire the amazing whisky bar, which must be the biggest in London.", "Large stage for the music performance, which started (for us) a little later on after 9, so we didn't see much of it.", 'The food is great, unfortunately one of our main courses was wrong - they simply served up the wrong dish - but it was well handled by the manageress.', 'Good place and we booked to go back there and then.']
title: Great steak and music

content: ['I had not come here for lunch before so was pleasantly surprised at how bright, airy and Scottish the main dining room is. We had a table by the window. Very well priced 2 course menu although we ate a la carte. Fish and steak were delicious and service prompt and friendly. Would definitely come back. ']
title: Really enjoyable lunch

content: ['The venue is excellent. We arrived on time and were met by a happy receptionist. Got to our table and the service was absolutely terrible. This is no reflection of the staff who were short staffed. The manager on the day was the most useless person on the floor. The quality of staff was below what I would expect. The staff should visit Zedel or Fischers and just see the difference. The fault lies with the management.', 'The wine we ordered was great, the starter was above average but the main ( chicken) plus vegetables was awful. The chef really needs to go back to basic or needs to find a new job. The chicken was over- done, the potatoes were served in large chucks in a terrible bowl and the green were full of oil. These are simple basic steps the chef should be fully aware.', 'The bill came along which was wrong and got corrected after three attempt. ', 'Terrible place,', 'Happy to discuss with mgt my comments.']
title: Nice place except on the day it was exceptionally poor

content: ['There is a nice balcony and a cigar room in the rear. Can usually be quieter than the other bars in the wharf so a good place to check in if everywhere else is standing room only. The balcony offer a good view of the fountain and a good place for some summer beers.']
title: 2nd floor drinks in the wharf

answer_text: ['Hi Scott M, ', "Thank you so much for taking the time to feedback your experience of Boisdale of Canary Wharf. Having 'all our bases covered' is really what we strive for from every aspect of the 'customer journey'. ", 'Reviews like this make all of the hard work worthwhile and I will take great pleasure in feeding this back to the team!', 'We hope to see you soon, ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['As a regular customer of Boisdale Canary Wharf, I have to say this is a place everyone who knows Canary Wharf must visit at least once. ', 'You have all your bases covered for an amazing experience that will have you returning for more. ', 'You can dine in style in the amazing Scottish Restaurant where you can be whisked away on an amazing culinary experience that will excite your tastebuds and melt your heart at the same time. The food is simply divine and the service is top class. The staff make you feel warm and welcome from start to finish. This space also hosts live performances and you can sign up for the privilege of being able to meet the stars too. ', "If drinking whisky or smoking a cigar is your thing, you've only got one choice. Boisdale. From the amazing assortment of Scotches, the top class cocktails, to the collection of fine wines, you've got anything you could want to drink. If you fancy a wonderful cigar to compliment it you only need to ask the cigar specialist Filip. His knowledge of cigars and exemplary customer service have me returning time and time again with a smile and a bounce in my step. There is no better returning welcome than his. Once you know it you'll understand. ", 'So what else do you need to hear? If you need more, god help you....']
title: The Boisdale Experience

answer_text: ['Hello Andrew H, ', "Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent visit. Feedback is very important to allow us to ensure we are delivering on our customer's expectations. ", 'Although you have raised some negative points re; the vegetables on the whole I am glad that you enjoyed both the ambiance and the food. Please rest assured that our Head Chef and I will be paying closer attention to the details you mentioned. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['We opted for the 3 course Sunday lunch menu, at £47.50 per head with 3/4 bottle of wine per person. ', "Let's start with the good, the ambience. It's a beautiful venue with some good Celtic decor and a fantastic bar display what I guessed displays nearly 400 bottles of whisky. The live jazz music was melodic and soothing and a lovely accompaniment to what was a decent meal. ", 'A starter of haggis was well received, hearty, generally well seasoned apart from a tad too much pepper. A traditional roast it rib of beef was very good in some aspects, less so in others. The good? Well cooked flavoursome meat, tender to the bite too. The not so good? Salty roast potatoes, although they were lovely and crispy and very generous with their portions. Next up, over cooked flabby and tasteless carrots. The broccoli was OK, but a smattering of butter on it would have been welcomed. ', 'A dessert of pear and apple crumble with ice cream was of a good pub standard. I must say that the nice piquant apple complemented the sweet pear. The crumble topping needed something extra though, perhaps some honey roasted oats and more nuts. ', 'The wine (you get 3/4 of a bottle per person) was good for the price and was free flowing. Big thanks to the waiting staff. ', "The lead waiter who took the order, although nice didn't feel like he had a good understanding of the day's menu. He wasn't even sure what the fish of the day was. However he was very polite and always kept us topped up. I must add this place welcomes children and they gave our daughter a nice activity pack (colouring book, pens) to keep her busy. Also the 'distorted' mirrors near the toilets kept her entertained for ages. ", "All in all a good experience but had better roast dinners at places like the Gun. Thing is the Gun doesn't boast the great music, whisky selection or cool decor. ", "Give Boisdales a try, you won't be disappointed, just as long as you go in with realistic expectations regarding the food. Decent but not great. "]
title: 5 star music, 3 star food

content: ['We went here for Sunday Lunch as a pre-mothers day treat', 'Mothers day is always so busy so bought a Sunday lunch voucher for 2 from Travelzoo and went a week early.', "The whole experience was fantastic - the atmosphere was great from the moment we arrived and although the place was busy we didn't feel hemmed in.", 'Three courses of delicious food.', 'The roast beef was plentiful and the roast potatoes, carrots, wilted greens & Yorkshire pud were all tasty and completed the main course.', 'The dessert was also very well presented and tasted wonderful - looked quite a small portion when it arrived but it was just right.', 'We only had the house white which was the cheapest bottle but to be honest I am no wine buff and we enjoyed every last drop.', 'Even asked to take home my left over beef for two very happy dogs as a sunday treat ! - staff were more than happy to wrap it up and brought if back in a paperbag for me to take away - no problem', 'Thoroughly enjoyed lunch and would definitely go again']
title: Fantastic Sunday lunch with Jazz Music bonus

answer_text: ['Hi ipek2208,', 'Thank you for taking to provide us feedback of your recent visit. ', "I am glad you enjoyed the atmosphere however was disappointed to hear that you are not as positive about the food. We generally receive fantastic reviews on our steak so I was surprised to learn you found it to be 'ordinary'. I have shared these views with our Chef. ", 'It is a shame that you did not think the acoustic was right, we are very much a live music venue and as such have spent a significant amount ensuring that our sound system is correct for the venue. Above this we have a highly qualified sound technician to ensure that the levels etc are correct. The Dukes of Mayfair are quite a lively band and do put on quite a show, perhaps there will be another act coming up soon that is less so and you can give us another shot! ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['We were at the Boisdale Canary Wharf yesterday. The atmosphere was really nice. However I cannot say the same thing for the food. We had steak which was ordinary. The cheesecake was so so. The band was Dukes of Mayfair . The lady singer has an amazing voice. Unfortunately, the acoustic was awful. Secondly the sound level was extremely high, it was at some point unbearable. In summary, not a good value for money !']
title: Not good value for money !

answer_text: ['Hi Adrian S, ', 'You have raised some concerning issues in this review that I would like the opportunity to speak with you about in more detail. ', 'Please contact me directly on GM@boisdale-cw.co.uk', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['I went here to celebrate my birthday with a friend. I was so looking forward to it, as I had wanted to go there for some time. ', 'The table we were put at was best described as the naughty table, on its own in an odd position. We asked to move and the way it was handled could of been much better, there were only about 75 people in the place and lots of empty tables. Anyhow, we got moved and ordered. The waiter was useless, he kept saying that he had forgotten what drinks we had ordered and that he should of written it down. The food was OK, nothing special, part of the order was missing, he said because he had not written it down. ', 'At about 9:30, the jazz band kicked in and it all just went down hill from there. We paid and left, without even getting my surprise birthday cake that had been pre arranged. ', 'The food and staff at the Big Easy are a lot better than this overpriced restaurant that is trying to be something it is not. ']
title: What a let down

answer_text: ['Hello Louise t, ', 'Thank you for your review and apologies for the delay in my reply. ', "I am glad that you enjoyed your offer with us and didn't leave hungry!! Sunday's are a day to feast. ", 'Hopefully we will see you soon, we also have live music every Tues-Sat in the evening which is something you may enjoy. ', 'Kind regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["We got a deal on a travelzoo, otherwise may have felt it was overpriced. Portion sizes were enormous, but go early as they were sold out on some things when we arrived. Sadly the jazz seemed to end at 3pm. Staff were very friendly. Nice ambience and decor, can't have enough dead animals on the wall for my liking. The plates were warmed which we appreciated! Small point but tables were far enough apart to feel like you had some privacy and not be annoyed by other diners. It was also child friendly from what we saw."]
title: Nice atmosphere

answer_text: ['Hello Snoopyandfrenchie,', 'Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback of your recent visit. We use such reviews as an important tool and constructively as a way to evolve and improve. ', 'I have shared your concerns re; the food with our Head Chef who was very disappointed to hear your comments on the food.', 'Being regular guests I would appreciate if you could drop me an e-mail before your next visit so I can ensure I am here to catch up with you personally to discuss further on GM@boisdale-cw.co.uk', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ["Went to the suspiciously Elvis show last night. Had pre-drinks in the downstairs bar first which has a lovely view. Bar was busy. Went up for dinner before show started, orders were taken quickly and food arrived promptly. I have to say as frequent visitors of Boisdale the last two times we have been we have been disappointed with the food. Over priced and if I'm honest wasn't great last night. The menu has been changed since our last visit, I ordered fillet steak to be cooked well done, and specifically said no red. My husband and friend asked for medium. Husband and friends steak arrived rare and had to be sent back. Mine was ok but wasn't as well done as I would of liked. Small in size and didn't taste as good as previous steaks I have had there. Elvis was good. Lots of people were up dancing. Good atmosphere. Had a good night overall but think food standards are slipping which is a shame as we really like it here. Good for couples or groups of friends/family. Would recommend, only disappointed as we here been many times before and know how good it can be!!! Staff polite and helpful. If food was fantastic wouldn't mind paying the prices but when mediocre not good value for money. "]
title: Disappointed

content: ['Dinner and an Elvis tribute band. Good food, although a little pricey, with attentive service and a great ambience. A fun evening in a cross between a Scottish hunting lodge and a jazz club.']
title: Saturday Night, Steak and Elvis

answer_text: ['Hi MapBoy,', "Thank you for your very short but very sweet review - It was a pleasure to read and I'm sorry for the delay in coming back to you.", "We have lots of other really exciting acts coming up and amazing steaks are always in abundance so don't wait too long before you visit again!", 'Kind regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Food great (amazing steaks), alcohol flowed and music was outstanding. We were treated to The Dukes of Mayfair for entertainment and what a fun group. Really good night, highly recommend.']
title: Fab night

content: ['Tried this place mainly for music and food. The bar on 1st floor is excellent, enjoyed the drinks. Initial reception at the restaurant was good. However, the service by our waitress was poor. Cold not break a smile. The food was average to good. Vegetarian choice was limited. ', 'When the live band started at 9.45, we were shocked! Poor music, singing was awful. Doubt if the drums were tuned in last 12 months. We decided to leave and have deserts elsewhere. When the bill arrived, it was almost thrown onto our table. Bill included several items we never ordered including deserts. Revised bill arrived, again almost thrown on to the table. Over charged on the wines again. When they saw us checking prices on menu. they quickly brought a third bill with correct pricing. This time bill was literally thrown onto our table. ', 'One wonders!! I do not recommend this restaurant. ', 'IF you do eat there, check your bill in details.']
title: Poor service, terrible music band. Tried to overcharge twice.

answer_text: ['Hi Danny M, ', 'Thank you for your review of our downstairs bar area. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our more than reasonably priced lobster! As well as the wine and cigars.', 'You should come again to experience our 2nd floor when you get the chance - where we have fantastic 2 4 1 cocktails and live music! ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Great live music and lobster dinners. Lively bar on the lower level with great wines by the glass. Humidor and smoking terrace great for cigar fans. ']
title: Great lobster

answer_text: ['Hi jackfamily17,', 'So glad to hear that you managed an impromptu visit and managed to catch some of the music! ', "Lots of more fantastic acts coming up so please don't wait too long until you come again. ", 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['We popped in to catch the last hour of the show and have a drink. Were not disappointed. Have previously visited and enjoyed dinner. Shows are excellent and would recommend. ']
title: Frank and Dean night

answer_text: ['Hi Karen H,', 'Reading you recent review really brought a smile to my face. You touched on all aspects that we work really hard on to ensure are well received for a memorable experience! Thank you. ', 'Keep the romance alive and come back soon.....', 'Kind regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["We went to Boisdale for a romantic dinner and really enjoyed the evening. The cocktails were unusual with whisky being a main component. The fish starter with Oysters - Mussels and Prawns was delicious. Our main courses and desserts were great - the menu is extensive' Quirky but super service. A big choice of whiskeys and live music."]
title: Date Night

answer_text: ['Hello minimemo,', 'Thank you for your constructive feedback on your recent visit. Also being a Scot it saddens me to hear that you did not enjoy the Haggis. We do use an extremely high quality supplier and I agree that the texture is a little smoother than what many are familiar with. ', "Of course I am pleased that our staff are able to advise on what the 'recommendation' of cooking temperature should be for steak but if this was delivered in any way other than 'advice' then I will of course address this. ", 'Please drop me an e-mail on gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk to let me know when you are coming back in for your celebration - rest assured we will not disappoint!! ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ["Been once before for a date night and loved it so much, came back with friends for a birthday celebration. I'm Scottish so kind of have an idea of what I'm talking about here...the haggis?? was like a spicy smooth pate and not in a good way! If this had been my first time eating haggis, I'd never want to eat it again. Haggis has texture but not here :( such a shame....then 3 steaks ordered with the waiter 'telling' us how to have our steaks cooked but two of them had to go back 3 times each and in the end couldn't eat them! In fairness to Boisdale, they knocked the price off the bill but would rather have had all being well in the first place. There needs to be a bit more on the side dishes of vegetables too. Cutting corners, cuts customers. We live five hours away from London so when we go to Boisdales, that is our sole purpose of travelling and take it on the chin the cost of the hotel for the night! We are planning on going back again prior to daughter and her fiance's wedding and them emigrating immediately after the wedding, as they have never been before and because we big it up!! Lets make it a night for them to remember...for all the RIGHT reasons Boisdale!"]
title: Love it but room for improvement

answer_text: ['Hi Nikkibains78,', 'I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the atmosphere! I am slightly confused by the comment on limited food menu as we do have an extensive and diverse A La carte menu upstairs and a similarly extensive British Tapas and Bar menu downstairs. ', "We do have a number of set menus however anyone booked on a set menu offer is more than welcome to take a look at our larger menu's too. ", 'Please come back soon so you can take full advantage! ', 'Kind regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['This place has a great atmosphere and is great for a romantic drink for jazz lovers. The only thing that lets this place down is the limited food menu and the quality of the food, but I would still visit again for the music and atmosphere. ']
title: Lovely atmosphere, friendly staff, great music

answer_text: ['Hi franchaines,', 'I was pleased to hear that - overall - you enjoyed your recent visit to Boisdale Of Canary Wharf. Thank you for taking the time to feed this back. ', 'Please rest assured that I have taken your comments on Burgers and bill timings constructively and will be paying extra attention to these points moving forward.', 'We have lots of great live music acts coming up, perhaps you will find something that suits and be able to find something else to celebrate! ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['We visited this restaurant on Saturday night when a Fleetwood Mac tribute band was there. ', "My food was superb, (langoustines, salmon, mussels and saffron rice, followed by an incredible choice of British cheese and biscuits), although the rest of my group chose hamburgers or steak and were all very disappointed as they were over cooked. The haggis and squid are also recommended by our group. The one thing we didn't like was that vegetables are charged separately for a lot of the main courses.", 'The service was very good apart from getting the bill at the end of the evening - it was unfortunate that everyone wanted their bills at the same time.', 'The tribute band was excellent, more space could of been made for dancing though. ', 'I would recommend this restaurant for a special evening out if you are prepared to splash out. ']
title: Celebrating a birthday

answer_text: ['Hi Berni54,', 'I am really disappointed to hear that you found the quality of the steak and burgers to be below par. As I am sure you can imagine both of these dishes are high volume sales items for us and we generally receive very positive feedback. ', 'That said, I will of course bring this up with our Head Chef and endeavour to monitor these dishes more closely in the coming weeks. With this in mind, I am confident that should you be willing to give us another chance we will not disappoint! ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['I asked for medium rare steak and got well done. They did change it but very tough. Four of our group had the burgers which were so well done that they were dried out. This is the fourth time I have been here and disappointed that the quality of the food has gone downhill! The music was good and the service was fine. Definitely think twice about returning.']
title: Food

answer_text: ['Hello Richard s, ', "Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback of your recent visit. Although I appreciate that when there is live music people do feel inclined to dance it is worth mentioning that we are a restaurant with live music and so have revisited the 'dance floor' space which is no longer advertised. ", 'Unfortunately, due to the size of the restaurant, as soon as even a few people get up to dance it ruins the show for the vast majority - the view of the stage becomes totally obscured. This is unfair given that people pay for music tickets. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['Six of us went there last Friday to see the Black Hat Band. Bar upstairs was good, reception was great, table in the restaurant was excellent, music was brilliant! But.....the dance space was ridiculously small...surely they could have moved two tables away. Ok, we were on a group on deal, which just seemed too cheap, but the limited menu was all extras, and the food quality was uninspiring at best. so what did we get?...great value, but poor quality in a great venue. What an odd combination. Come on Boisedales...lets keep up the standards!']
title: Great location, terrible food!

answer_text: ['Hello AllanC1960,', 'Although you have raised some points that I will certainly be investigating and are far from the kind of feedback we enjoy hearing, thank you for taking the time to bring them to my attention.', 'We use feedback as a very important training tool and I am confident that should you visit us again all of the points mentioned above will have subsequently been ironed out. ', 'Thank you, ', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["Boisdale's is a restaurant which provides entertainment and food.", 'Visited in December for a Frank and Dean show. The singers were good but both were Franks in my view but they were very good.', 'The problems started with the ordering and service.', 'Having ordered starters and mains and a bottle of red and white wines, the wine had not arrived by the time the starters arrived. When we pointed this out the waitress spoke to my wife and seemed to offer her a glass of white on the house. Nothing was said to me.', "It turned out that the wine was the wine we had ordered, but Boisdale's had the good grace not to charge us for that bottle. What was bizarre was the waitress placed the wine bottle in a cooler some 8 feet from our table, my wine arrived and was placed n the table.", 'When the starters arrived I had ordered the Haggis which was supposed to be a mini "roast". The texture suggested that the only oven the haggis had seen was of the micro wave type. My wife had the Scallops which were good.', 'For main I had ordered the "guest steak" at £36, which I asked for medium rare. My wife ordered quail. ', 'My steak arrived rare not medium rare.', 'The quail came on a full plate which contained game chips. The waiter brought bread sauce which he served onto the plate covering the game chips making them soggy and unpalatable. The main issue though was that as the plate was full it was very difficult to eat the quail as there was no room to manoeuvre. ', 'All in all, was not impressed with the service or food but the entertainment was good.']
title: Poor Attention to Detail Can't Cook Steak as Requested

content: ['Have been to the Boisdale on many occasion for live music. Great venue, great place. have previously eaten in the main restaurant as part of the dining/seating package at £40.00 each. Always been good.', 'Recently saw a Santana tribute who were excellent. Stay with me if you can here....paid £40 for a seat and 2 course dinner. Normal price for a seat to watch the band £10.00...meaning £30 for a 2 course dinner consisting of 5 choices for starter/main...but 2 of these came with a supplement....so soup (which was lovely) and goujons of plaice/fries/dip for £30.00...PLUS a service charge of £8 bringing this to £88.00. I reiterate....band great, place great, service great....food was fine...but not value for money.', 'for future reference... 2 course fixed menu available from the bar at 12.95....and a non dining seat for the music weighs in at £46.00...much better value!']
title: great place, great music...but value for money?

answer_text: ['Hi snazzzle,', 'Thank you for your kind comments - I will take great pleasure in sharing your compliments with our bar team. ', 'To hear that you will definitely be coming back is exactly the kind of reaction we are looking for! ', 'See you soon, ', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['This is a lovely bar you can get table service, there is a smoking area with heated terrace, they have a restaurant upstairs prices are reasonable and there are also live jazz bands which you can watch while eating, the bar staff are all friendly and polite,I will definitely be going back here']
title: Lovely bar

answer_text: ['Hello Serica2015,', "To hear the venue being labelled as 'superb' is fantastic - I agree that it is quite an impressive site. ", 'Above this, to leave such kind comments on the food, drinks and music really tops it off!', 'Almost on your doorstep means there is no excuse for not coming back soon. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Superb venue, spacious and light but an ambience for the great Jazz trio playing. Food was first class, the aged beef superb and of course the whisky list was mind blowing. Great to have this almost on our doorstep!']
title: Jazz Lunch

content: ['Using a travel Zoo voucher so the me he was limited. Our glass of champagne arrived after we ordered red wine (v strange...) I had soup, which was so salty. My partner had haggis which needed seasoning! The burger was good but the steak was a little too fatty (it was a rib eye but all the same it was just a bit too fatty...)', "The service was poor, our server didn't appear to be too busy but you just couldn't find him. When he was there he would just walk past quickly - he topped our wine up once! Love this place but really....! "]
title: Borderline food, service poor

answer_text: ['Hi Mitchell1960,', "To be labelled as 'Excellent' is absolutely the kind of accolade that we strive hard to achieve. Feedback is a very important part of our business and to read such positive words makes it all worthwhile! ", 'Glad to hear that you will be joining us again and we look forward to maintaining such standards upon your return. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["Okay, there's not much about this place that isn't all the way up there in the excellent category. Service superb - it really was - food same - wine quite expensive unless sticking to the house bottles.", 'Entertainment excellent - a jazz night - great environment- sound and seating superb', 'Will go again']
title: Great experience.....

answer_text: ['Hi Rositsa,', 'Thank you for your very short yet very sweet review! ', "We hope to welcome you back soon for some jazz and Whisky and if you haven't already you should give the food a try too..", 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['The food is fantastic and the atmosphere is always great! If you love jazz and whiskey Boisdale is the perfect choice ']
title: Always a great experience

answer_text: ['Hello vonnyDublin, ', 'Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback of your recent visit. I am sorry to hear that you found the price of the food to be on the higher end of the scale. We do use extremely good quality suppliers and as such our pricing reflects such quality. That said, we are still priced competitively for the market. ', 'I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the service. It is unfortunate you were unable to enjoy the live music. It is advisable to book - especially at the weekends - as we do get extremely busy. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Ate here Friday evening with my daughter and Aunt. A nice open room with an outside balcony area where people can smoke. Food ok! Have eaten better elsewhere for much less. Thought £18.50 sterling for a burger a bit over the top. I ordered the steak and this small sliced piece of meat arrived on a plate, chips and veg all at extra cost. Cocktails also steep at £13.50 but I suppose they are catering to a business and finiancial clientel who can afford these prices..', "The service was good and there was a nice atmosphere to the place.Unfortunately we couldn't get in to hear the music as it was booked out and we ate on the first floor. Had a lovely evening but found the place expensive."]
title: Trendy Place

answer_text: ['Hi hoenesm.', 'Thank you so much for your fantastic feedback on your recent visit! Feedback of any kind is very much appreciated and obviously even better when as positive as yours. ', 'We would love to have you and your family back again so please do not wait too long!', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['As always, it has lived up to its feel and look and ambience.... I booked a table of 14 and was told we would have to be on 2 tables. We visited the day before our booking to ask if they could try to sit us together as my 2 families were coming a long way and i didnt want to split them up...., it was no trouble for the staff and had a call the next morning to say they had re organized tables so we could sit together. Unfortunately i then had a call to say 4 could not make it due to family member ending up in hospital. I called Boisdales back and apologised that it would now be 10... When we arrived we had a superb table for the 10 of us...great credit to them for accomodating us again in such circumstances.', 'My family that did come all made a comment about how amazing the Rib eye steaks were... and to be honest evertime we have been here we have never been disappointed in the quality... you may have to pay a supplement and add side dishes, but we have always found it to be excellent. Oh... and the Haggis is amazing.... The entertainment on that night for us was not as spectacular as other nights we have been, but we knew that may be the case anyway.... My family loved the whole feel and ambience of the venue.... we have all been to expensive restaurants and plush places, and we are very picky and fussy and have no problem pointing out to staff any failings we feel are justified....At Boisdale Canary Wharf we have never had reason to say anything....and i have always been amazed at how reasonable the final bill has been at the end... My family all want to come back again.. !!!']
title: Great venue and food 4th time here for a music night

answer_text: ['Hi b9scottuk,', 'To be highly recommended is exactly the kind of feedback that we are looking for - thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback! ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["We were here for our friend's birthday on Friday night. The food was delicious and very reasonable (a special deal: 2 courses, a glass of bubbly for £20) the entertainment was fantastic and the staff were wonderful. I highly recommend this place for friends, dates, or business"]
title: Friendly atmosphere, tasty food, great music!

answer_text: ['Hi John L,', "Words like 'impressed', 'attentive', 'fantastic' and 'stunning' in relation to Boisdale of Canary Wharf really do make us feel very proud as a team here! ", 'Thank you so much for sharing your views and we hope to welcome you back in the near future!', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Visited on a Saturday evening and was so impressed with the attentive service, the fantastic food and the stunning live band. ', 'This is a must visit venue and the management and team should be rightly proud of their efforts - well done!']
title: Wow - what a venue

answer_text: ['Hello Nigel T,', 'You have raised some concerning points re; the quality and timings of the food. I have raised these with our chef and we will both be paying close attention in the coming weeks! ', 'On a positive note I am glad that you enjoyed both the music and the service. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['On our visit the food took far too much time to arrive at the table and when it did, it was cold. Upon complaining the staff were very attentive but the replacement food again too far too long to arrive. The music was fabulous, but being a large open room it was very difficult top hear the artist due to the noise of people talking etc..']
title: Nice Music.....

answer_text: ['Hi Anna70_13', 'Needless to say I am both shocked and disappointed after reading you review. We have various different offers running at the moment as well as using third party Booking agents and I can assure you that no booking takes priority over another. ', 'Please contact me directly at gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk to discuss this further.', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['Me and my friend booked one of Boisdale Canary Wharf\'s special offers on opentable as we thought it would be a nice ending to the evening after attending the Winter Lights Festival. I arrived in Canary Wharf at 6 pm and noticed that I had a missed call from the restaurant telling me that they could not fit us in (we had booked for 7.30 pm). I booked the table the night before and they had 20 hours to figure out if there were space for us or not (there were several free slots when I booked)! This makes us suspect they got a booking request from people not using an offer and they were more "attractive" guest. This lead to that we were out of a place to dine and since I refuse to eat in big restaurant chains with bland food we ended up walking around for ages trying to find something. I will never try and book this place again as it is far too unreliable.', 'I have used opentable for years and I have never experienced this kind of behavior before.']
title: Our booking was cancelled 1,5 h before we were supposed to dine

answer_text: ['Hello OnehandEconomist,', 'It was a great shame to hear that you did not enjoy the Haggis, many of our customers come specifically for this and - being a Scot myself - I must say I am proud to serve. We buy our Haggis from a seriously reputable supplier who is renowned for their quality. ', 'That said, I have had a conversation with our head chef and we will both be ensuring we pay extra attention to the preparation moving forward to ensure the correct consistency. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["Pleasant enough evening but for the haggis starter. It was billed as wee, so no inaccuracies there. But was it haggis? Is haggis a smooth, sticky, tasteless paste? Where was the grain? The pepper? And was that really bashit neeps? Or just an English turnip? I was reminded of the great Burns' alternatives to his master o' the pudding race. And of his reaction to such junior members of the pudding race - especially ragout. For a Scottish restaurant, this is poor. The Saltire deserves better. C'mon, you can represent us better than this! "]
title: Poor wee thing...

answer_text: ['Hi WilcoBraintree,', 'Thank you for taking the time to provide the review of your recent visit. We have just introduced a new menu and if you are looking for a bit more of a buzz then you should join us on a Thursday, Friday or Saturday evening. We also have live music which I am sure you would enjoy!', 'Hope to see you soon,', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['A pleasant surprise, large, plush and nice staff. We were there early so it was quiet. Had haggis as a starter followed by cod. Nothing special but good enough']
title: Liked it

answer_text: ['Hi cazw0406,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write your review of your recent visit. To hear that the food and atmosphere was "lovely" is fantastic! ', 'I am surprised that you only managed to enjoy 20-30 minutes of the Jazz as the musicians play for 1.5 hours. I will ensure that the timings are clearer moving forward. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['We really enjoyed our visit here, the food was lovely as was the atmosphere. My only negative is we booked as we love live jazz and we were at lunch for just over 2 hours and there was only 20-30 minutes of music which i think was not enough considering its sold as a sunday Jazz lunch!']
title: Sunday Jazz lunch with not enough Jazz

answer_text: ['Hello Kohan R,', 'Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback of your recent visit. I was surprised to hear that you found the burger to be average as we have won awards in the past and generally receive very positive feedback on that dish. That said, I will ensure I speak to our head chef and we keep a close eye on the burgers moving forward. ', 'I am confident that you will not be late getting back to work on your next visit, alternatively you should join us in the evening as we have just launched a fantastic new cocktail menu - perhaps you would like to sample!?', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["Went to Boisdale for lunch and had the spicy burger. Was nice but very average. You're paying for the location as it is stunning inside and has a really good ambiance. Service was really good but so slow. Took 45 mins for our burgers to arrive and we were late getting back to work.", 'Overall good, but nothing to write home about.']
title: Lovely location, not bad food, slow service

answer_text: ['Hi Bignickandlittleted,', "Although I was disappointed with some of the points raised in your review I would like to thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. I am glad you felt the dinner and entertainment to be 'Excellent'. ", 'I was unaware of any delays with food on the evening and would have certainly addressed this at the time had I known so apologies that this was not the case. ', 'Please rest assured that the configuration of the restaurant had not been altered in anyway however it is not usual to have two larger tables book in the VIP section - it is usually smaller tables of 2 or 4. ', 'We have some fantastic acts coming to join us over the course of the next few months. I am confident that should you wish to enjoy any of these there will be no problems re; speed of service. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["Went for a Saturday night entertainment and dinner (Jersey Boys), both of which were excellent. However, it's not cheap and the speed of service was poor - 90 minutes between starter and main. The waiter (who was very good also) said the kitchen was under pressure, but nothing they didn't know about in advance and is presumably a regular thing, so unless they were people down this isn't really an excuse or explanation. It looked like they'd squeezed two extra tables onto the dance floor too, which was a shame as it made the whole place look like an untidy village hall event rather than classy."]
title: Lots of Positives Spoiled By Speed of Service

answer_text: ['Hi Carol B,', "Reviews don't really get any better than this so thank you so much for taking the time! I am so glad to hear that we exceeded your expectations. ", 'We have various different offers running at the moment, perhaps one of them would suit you and you can use as an excuse to visit again!', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["Visited with group of friends on a travelzoo deal following matinée theatre show. Bit of a trek from the westend but definitely worth the effort! Fairly easy to find and magical location overlooking Canary Wharf. Great vibe on arrival; welcoming and efficient staff. Food and service good but the unexpected highlight of the evening was the cabaret entertainment NY the outstanding Westend Jersey's; a Jersey boys tribute band who were simply amazing!! Definitely of Westend standard. Wow, what a night!!", 'Highly recommended.']
title: Fab night out!

answer_text: ['Hello LGladders, ', 'Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback of your visit to Boisdale Canary Wharf. ', "I am glad to hear that you found the room to be enjoyable and the waiter to be good. I am, however, disappointed to hear of the issues you faced with regards to the timing on the evening. I would like to assure you that this is not the 'norm' and would like you to rest assured that if you decided to dine with us again I am confident that you would find the speed of service to be more in line with expectation. ", 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['I had a belated works Christmas meal so we had one of the private rooms as there was 10 of us. The room was well laid out with a good size square table so that you could talk to everyone easily. ', "We had a good waiter, but as with other reviews, the service was very slow. It's good not to be rushed but 5 of the diners missed their last train home as there was such a big gap between courses! The wine wasn't left on the table but on a table at the side of the room and due to the slow service, it wasn't easy to keep your glass topped up!", "The starter was lovely, but I had the steak for my main, which was OK, but I have had better at less expensive restaurants. One of my party is a vegetarian and they only had the choice of one main, which wasn't very good. ", "The view from the room was lovely, but I think that's what you are paying for, location, location, location.", 'The restaurant closes at 12am, but by the time we had paid for the bill it was 12.40am and the receptionist who deals with the costs, was all packed up with her own coat on! As one of my party was in the toilet when the majority of us picked up our coats, the receptionist had left before she could get her coat, so we had to go and find someone.', 'I think if I returned I would go for drinks only and sit in the main room listening to the live music.']
title: Good location, but had better food in less expensive restaurants

answer_text: ['Hello Giusi F,', 'It was a real pleasure to read your recent review - thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. ', 'We work hard to ensure that we deliver a well rounded experience from all aspects and it seems like we managed to deliver just that! I will take great pleasure in feeding your kind comments back to the team. ', 'We hope to see you soon!', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ["I've heard and read lots of positive feedback about this restaurant and finally I've had the chance to dine at this lovely place; the venue itself is stunning with a baroque style decor and split in two floors; the restaurant is upstairs where diners can enjoy a fantastic view overlooking Cabot Place; as for the food we tried all the Scottish dishes which were absolutely delicious- a particular mention goes to haggis and the black truffle mayonnaise! On the top of that our dining was accompanied by live jazz music which made it really pleasant and unique! Staff very attentive and polite. I definitely recommend it especially for romantic people or simply jazz lovers!"]
title: A must have for all jazz lovers

content: ['I first visited Boisdale a year ago - as part of two couples celebrating two birthdays. That visit was tremendous, the food was excellent, the service impeccable and whilst expensive - we all felt that it was worth it. However that was then...', 'Late January 2017, to celebrate a birthday - my wife and I decided to enjoy Boisdale once again, believing that the anticipated expense would be worth it as it was a celebration. Unfortunately, the night soundly failed to deliver... There was obviously a private function going on that evening (the night before Burns night?), so the main restaurant never got more than 40% full, however it seemed that the staff wanted to sit all couples next to each other (more on this later).', 'Perhaps it was due to this function that the focus of both front of house and kitchen staff - were focussed elsewhere.', "The choice of starters was somewhat limited (seemingly a lot of fish - we don't eat), so opted to share a game terrine with foes gras. Unfortunately the fatty fois gras which masked all other flavours except the gingerbread melba toast, so the experience was that of fois gras and not terrine. But it was only the starter - so we weren't overly worried.", "We followed with two steaks, a medium and a rare fillet on the bone. Unfortunately the medium was rarer than fillet. After some time, we managed to actively attract a member of staff's attention - who took the steak away to be cooked some more. Unfortunately when it had returned, it was evident that it had been now cooked in a pan that had just cooked either heart or haggis from its strong metallic taste, ruining this meat for both diners. The fillet on the bone was unremarkable (so damned by faint praise), the highlight of this course was the sauce diane (and that is not a reason to go to a restaurant).", 'The desserts were quite nice - a chocolate torte, tasted good but looked fussy. The salted caramel ice-cream was tasty and smooth. However the diners now sitting at the freshly turned neighbouring table had just started on their very smelly fish starter (when they could have been sat anywhere else in the 60% empty restaurant). I am sure that no-one could enjoy a dessert with an all encompassing smell of fish and lemon.', 'Throughout the evening the service was conspicuous by its absence. The staff had no knowledge or joy of the dishes, we had to chase for the steak to be cooked correctly, at no point were we asked if everything was alright, indeed no-one checked if the recooked steak was satisfactory.', "At the end, we queried the service charge (a restaurant set 12.5%) which was deducted without hesitation. Speaking with the manager, he said the couple were seated next to us as they had decided they didn't want to sit by the stage - surely they could have been sat anywhere else instead (this shows lazy planning and lack of consideration for other diners). ", 'I mentioned that we had returned as part of a celebration, to which the manager told me that I should have told him. Does this mean that Boisdale only gives good experiences to those whom they are know are celebrating a special night. In summary Boisdale charge prices for which one expects (£200 for 2) an excellent experience, one should not need to actively ask for it or justify it. For this price, Boisdale should be delivery a consistent experience to all of the appropriate standard - this evening, Boisdale failed.', "Can I recommend Boisdale? In all sincerity, I can not - for the price paid, there is no guarantee of consistency. Ultimately, it appears that Boisdale is relying upon the price charged persuading its patrons that it must be good and hoping that others won't complain too much."]
title: The danger of second visits

answer_text: ['Hi sandra f,', 'Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent visit. I look forward to sharing your kind comments with the team. ', 'We have various different musicians who play here in Boisdale Canary Wharf, you can find the music listings on our website. ', 'We hope to see you soon,', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['I went to Boisdales on Saturday with my husband and had a lovely time. The service was very good and the jazz music excellent. The food was choices from a set meal, and was quite good if not a bit on the basic side. The venue itself is great if you like something a bit different from the usual run of the mill eating places.']
title: Something a bit different

answer_text: ['Hello Tony M, ', 'Thank you for providing us with your interpretation of your recent visit. I appreciate you taking the time. After a bit of investigation with regards to this booking I would like to clarify some points. ', "Your table had been booked with us on the 20th of January with our new receptionist who was unaware that the 50% offer was not available on the 1st floor - only on the 2nd floor. Needless to say, all staff are now fully aware of all offers and the T&C's attached to them. As soon as this was recognised we made several attempts to contact you to explain and left a voicemail to ask you to confirm if you would like to go ahead with the booking but this would be on the second floor. We received no reply and so cancelled the table, assuming you did not want to proceed. ", 'When you arrived, we did accommodate you and also - as a gesture of goodwill for the mix up - extended the 50% discount for you on the 1st floor. With regards to you waiting for hours, this is not quite correct. Your bill was opened at 20.39pm and closed at 22.10pm. A 1.5 hour time slot for starters, mains and a bottle of wine and a further 2 glasses would be a reasonable time scale from our side. ', "It is a shame that you did not enjoy the food, our burgers and chips are extremely high volume items and we had no other complaints on the evening. Not to mention having won various awards for our burgers. At the end of your meal our Manager downstairs enquired as to whether or not everything was alright, as there was food left on the plate, to which you replied 'fine'. Had you mentioned any of the points raised here we could have endeavoured to rectify things for you on the night.", 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Dont touch this place with a barge pole. We booked a table with a 50 % off coupon when we arrived we were informed that our table had been cancled and therefore our coupon was not valid. We decided to take a table anyway. The bar menu is very limited so we ordered a sharing platter to start, which was very nice. Then we waited and waited and waited for our burgers. 1 hour 20 mins after finishing our starter i asked where our burger was. It arrived 10 mins later. What a massive disappointment. The chips were cooked in dirty oil which gave them a unusual taste. The onion rings were stale, yes stale iv never had stale onion rings befor and dont particularly want them again. The burger its self was dry very dissapointing. £90 for a bottle of wine a starter and 2 burgers is more than a rip off, i feel as thou iv been mugged. Only eat here if you like paying well over the odds for crap food and you dont mind waiting for hours. Wont be going back.']
title: Worst most expensive burger EVER

answer_text: ['Hello John F,', 'Thank you so much for taking the time to share your kind words. A really important part of our business is to build relationships with our guests and so to be able to recognise what you drink is exactly the level of service we are striving for. ', 'You really should have a look online at our music calendar as I am sure you will find an act that is appealing and I can guarantee you will enjoy, the performances really do add something special to any visit. ', 'Hope to see you soon! ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['I am slightly loathe to write this report. ', 'By far the best bar in Canary Wharf for service and surroundings. ', "Lunchtimes are quiet in the bar area, which means you get served a lot quicker than other (much poorer) pubs. It's nice to walk into a bar where they remember your drink and you. ", "It's also not the most expensive bar in the wharf. ", 'I go there once a week usually and chill on my own or with colleagues. I enjoy trying to spot the celebs in the photos. ', "It's the best kept secret in the wharf but deserves the recognition. ", 'I have sadly never been able to attend the gigs at night although one day that will happen. ', "Come and enjoy it but please don't tell anyone."]
title: Lunch

answer_text: ['Hi Denisehuckett,', 'Thank you for letting us know of your recent visit and providing us with much valued feedback. ', 'I was surprised to hear that you felt the sound was not great, we have invested a lot of money in a extremely high quality sound system and this is not feedback that I have come across to date. I will ensure that I pay extra attention to this moving forward so that if the sound quality is not as it should be we can rectify the situation. ', 'Kind Regards, ', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Great atmosphere buzzing restaurant which made it quite difficult to hear Kai Hoffman the jazz singer who was singing Etta James and Dana Washington songs. ', "We paid £30 each for VIP tickets but couldn't hardly hear her and this was being quite near the stage. ", 'The food was delicious but quite pricey after paying £30 each to sit close to the stage it made it an expensive week night out. ', 'I would return but would not pay for VIP tickets.']
title: Great night out

answer_text: ['Hi David_985,', 'To get feedback like this makes all of the hard work the team put in here worthwhile. I will take great pleasure in feeding this back to them! ', 'We do hope to see you again soon. If you enjoy cocktails then you should come and check out our new cocktail menu which will go live on Monday - very impressive, even if I do say so myself. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['I ate at the Boisdale Canary Wharf for a Christmas night out with work collegues. The service was excellent and the food was very nice. Live music added a great atmosphere to the restuarant and made the whole evening more special. ', 'I would highly recommend paying this place a visit.']
title: Very nice food and great atmosphere

answer_text: ['Hi paul s,', 'Reading your recent review brought a smile to my face - thank you for taking the time to share. ', 'To hear that you were impressed with the terrace, food and service is fantastic! If you are a Whisky fan you are certain to be impressed with our Whisky collection - make time to nosy through our extensive list next time.', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Great venue with a rather impressive terrace.', 'Steaks are consistently good but the lobster is excellent value at around £22. Worth going back again just for that. ', 'Very busy as it was pre-Christmas but the service was excellent ']
title: Great food and great value

answer_text: ['Hi UD K,', 'Thank you for taking the time to review your recent visit. All feedback is very much appreciated so thank you for taking the time. ', "I have to agree - the view is quite spectacular and one that I will never tire of. I was so pleased that you found your service from Ashley to be 'Excellent'. The team work very hard and so to get a bit of recognition is always very well received. ", 'I was sorry to hear that you were let down by the food and I have highlighted these comments to the chef. We will both endeavour to keep an eye on these dishes over the next few weeks. Our Burgers are extremely popular so this is surprising. ', 'I am confident that if/when you join us again it will be the full package and the food will be of the same standard as the rest of your experience. All of our staff are well equipped to offer any advice on the menu too - should you so wish! ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['We came for dinner and a jazz performance. The view of the canals and the lit skyscrapers all around you is very nice and romantic. The service was excellent-- our waiter (Ashley) was polite, cheerful and efficient. The music was very good-- a 4 piece band played well jazz of various flavours. The main disappointment was the food, which was average. I had a hamburger which was just OK, and my wife had a chicken curry dish she did not care for. But overall it was a good experience that we might repeat for the view, service and music.']
title: Nice view, good music, excellent service, average food

answer_text: ['Hello michealE4102AH,', 'Although I was disappointed with some of the points you have raised I would like to thank you for taking the time to feed them back to me. ', "I feel the 'minimal efforts made' is an unfair statement. I was myself working that evening and although could not position myself personally in front of the stage all evening I went to great lengths to politely ask those who were dancing to move to the side and did successfully manage to do this. Please rest assured that we have, subsequently, contact our musicians to ask them to refrain from inviting everyone up to dance as obviously this does cause some problems. ", 'I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the food and service.', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['Be careful what you pay for::We booked a VIP table for 4 to watch and listen to Ben Walters Boogie evening> Whilst food and service were good the show was not: the staff allowed dancers to block the stage: minimal efforts were made to clear them unsuccessfully> the dancers ( it was like watching you\'re Grandad at a bad wedding with two particular men from the rear of the restaurant jigging around for the whole evening, but more importantly changing the music to dance style by request and only missing was the " birdie Song" > An expensive evening spoilt by poor management and misrepresentation of dinner cabarat']
title: VIP Music

answer_text: ['Hi Hudstefer,', 'This type of feedback is exactly what we are striving so hard to achieve - from the service, to food quality as well as the live music element which is a bit of a unique selling point. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts! ', 'I will take great pleasure in feeding this back to the team and we all look forwarding to welcoming you back soon.', 'Kind regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['A confession, I love this restaurant and have been a number of times with family and for business. It never lets you down and I felt compelled to say thanks via this site. ', "Great staff. Really professional and hard working. The food is always top quality. And the music nights can be really incredible, whether it's the Jazz themed Sunday lunch or a live band at night. ", 'This place deserves all the plaudits it gets.']
title: Always great food and great atmosphere

answer_text: ['Hello Madalina M,', 'To hear that we were able to positively contribute to such a special evening is fantastic! Thank you for your feedback. ', 'I hope that we will be able to host you again in the future for another special occasion.', 'Kind regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Was a great night out of the bridesmaids team. Nice atmosphere, music, food and staff! Pleasant surprise at the end of our dinner, the waitress came with a different cakes on the house, cause she figured out that we were celebrating the wedding that was about to come.']
title: Nice restaurant

answer_text: ['Hi Claudia A,', 'To receive such a lovely review is a fantastic way for us to start the new year. Thank you!', 'To hear that you visit us often is great - I do hope that means we will see you soon.', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Food is lovely, staff friendly, good music, good wine. Would highly recommend. We often go here with family or friends and each time we have not been disappointed. The food is always up to standard. And you can have a little dance if you feel up to it after or in-between meals. Be careful as when you book there is a surcharge if you go into the live music slot which is added to your food bill.']
title: Great ambience, with live music

answer_text: ['Hi Keith! ', 'I appreciate that having joined us so frequently you may have felt that providing some feedback would be unnecessary,however it gave me great pleasure to read your kind words!', "It has been an absolute pleasure hosting you and your company and there is lots more Claret to be had so don't wait too long before your next visit. ", 'Look forward to seeing you then,', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Attended the Xmas show on the 3rd, 10th, & 17th with various friends and family. Boisdale Belgravia and Canary remain my favourite restaurants & the Frank & Dean Xmas show at Canary Wharf truly was exceptional. The food is great and the team headed by the new general manager Jenny are fabulous, nothing is too much trouble even with the restaurant packed to the gunnels. ', 'Great food, service, entertainment and a Cigar terrace to boot!!!! What more could you want!!']
title: Xmas show

answer_text: ['Hi Marshall B,', 'It was with mixed feelings I read your recent review. Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. ', 'Although I was glad to hear of the positives it is concerning to hear your comments on our food offering. We do have a rather varied music calendar and do not only play Jazz music, a lot of the artist who perform here have quite a following too so - for the moment - we are happy with the musical aspect of things. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Firstly, the great things: excellent cigar terrace for members, with personable service, good choice of wines at reasonable prices, often some good blues or reggae bands playing. Good sports bar/pub atmosphere on lower level for watching rugby with a beer and a burger. ', 'However, the food in the main restaurant ranges from passable (at best) to God-awful, and this is after having eaten there for business or with friends over a dozen times in five years. Not once have I left there saying "wow that was good - let\'s go back soon" and most often I go there for a beer or a cigar and eat elsewhere. ', 'The food is simply too bad or inconsistent to make it worth the effort. ', 'Also, do people really like jazz? I mean, really? Get more upbeat bands playing and fill the place. Just a view...']
title: Place is nice, food is awful

answer_text: ['Hello Brightredangel,', 'Your short but very sweet review has been very well received by myself and the team. Thank you. ', "Don't wait too long before your next visit!", 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Thanks for another lovely Boisdales meal, service good, food lovely, generous portions and quality food.']
title: Great Sunday Jazz Lunch

answer_text: ['Hi N D, ', 'Thank you for your recent review, I was delighted to hear that you enjoyed the music and the atmosphere of the restaurant. ', 'I have to agree, the window tables with the view of the skyline are quite special! ', 'We do hope to see you soon, ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["Having visited the Belgravia venue, we thought we would try Canary Wharf. The music and atmosphere were excellent. We would ask for a table near the window another time as the view were fabulous. The food is overpriced and nothing special. We found the same in Bekgravia. Having said that, we'll go again because the music made up for it."]
title: Great music

answer_text: ['Hi paul m, ', 'I was really pleased to hear that you enjoyed your evening with us recently, thank you for offering your feedback. ', 'Although people do tend to get carried away with the festivities please rest assured that Canary Wharf Security do a fantastic job to ensure a safe environment and are always only moments away should any situations get out of hand. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['Spent a great evening here with Friends ', 'food was very good ', 'Music great ', 'service also very good', 'Will visit again', 'Only downside to it all we went on a friday evening and on leaving so many drunks about at canary wharf and was a bit nervy ( never police around just the security officers ) but dont let this put yu off of going']
title: Loved it here

answer_text: ['Hello Oliver R, ', 'It was a great shame to read your feedback of Boisdale of Canary Wharf, although I would like to thank you for taking the time to provide it regardless. ', "You have highlighted some seriously concerning issues from different aspects of the evening which have saddened me. I would have to say, genuinely, that I don't feel that this is a true reflection on the level of standards and service that we usually pride ourselves on. ", 'Please contact me personally on gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk as I would like the opportunity to discuss in more detail. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['Have to be honest, we live nearby and have been to the Canary Wharf Boisdale numerous times and have had mixed results. I have just been for my Xmas dinner with my partner and we have reached the conclusion that we wont be going back in the near future. ', 'Being completely honest we never go to Boisdale for the food, in our opinion there are better places to go if you want a choice of good food. What we go for is the overall experience and after a few bad experiences we have had enough. ', "The overall experience tonight was poor and not worth the money at all. We have experienced poor service on previous visits (including 1 incident in which family members were rudely moaned at by a waiter for dancing near to stage, I did complain). On tonights visit our drinks didn't arrive until half way through the main meal (we did have starters), I did feel slightly sorry for the waitress who went to the bar numerous times to tell the waiter to check for the drinks. After that we were not offered drinks again throughout the entire meal.", "My partner was particularly disappointed because she booked because of the band that was performing. When we arrived we discovered that the lead singer wasn't there (she was replaced by someone not in the band!) and they would only perform until 10:30pm (closes at 12:00am). ", 'To sum up.', 'Poor choice of food, very poor table service, service charge is automatically added to bill, entertainment sub standard and finished early.', 'The cost of the experience tonight with 1 drink each was £130+ and in our opinion not worth the money at all. We said, if we were ever persuaded to go back we would start off by only going for a drink and the music and skipping out the meal experience. ', 'First time reviewing a restaurant but it needed to be said.']
title: Regular Customer Getting Fed Up With Experience - Xmas Dinner

answer_text: ['Hi Saintfreethrow,', 'It was a real shame to read your negative comments on the service you received on your recent visit. I do not feel that this is representative of the level of service that the team here at Boisdale Canary Wharf usually pride themselves on. ', 'I will of course ensure that I pay extra attention to this moving forward. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Booked tickets and table for live band and dinner for 8. Service was very poor - floor staff ignore when called. Really frustrating. Having said that the band was great and good good. But at more that approx £140 per head, the service was abysmal & ruined the evening. Not recommended. There are far better choices at this price range. ']
title: Great live music & food but very poor service

answer_text: ['Hello 629berniev,', 'To read your positive feedback on the various different elements of our offering here at Boisdale Canary Wharf was a real pleasure - thank you for your kind words. The team all work very hard to try and ensure that everyone has this type of experience. ', 'I am glad that you kick started your festive period on a high and hope that you had a lovely Christmas thereafter. ', 'Kind regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["My mate and I attended Boisdale Canary Wharf for our annual pre Christmas 'feed', our waiter was excellent his service friendly and helpful. we had a very excellent relaxed lunch, which included one of the Chefs special's a Rib Eye Steak on the bone cooked to perfection, finished off with a couple of single malts.So in conclusion, although very expensive (we could have chosen cheaper mains!!) it was a once a year treat and very enjoyable, good service , good atmosphere, wonderful single malts and of course Great steak."]
title: Great Steak

answer_text: ['Hello misamae2016,', 'It was a real pleasure to read your recent review of our Cigar library and the service you received from Filipe. Thank you for taking the time. ', 'His Cigar knowledge is such a huge benefit to the business and this paired with his perfect understanding of the needs of each individual customer second to none. ', 'We look forward to seeing you the next time you need to relax...', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['If you are looking for a relaxing enviroment for a cigar, the room at biosdale is a perfect choice. The humidor is kept under perfect supervision and cigars are in perfect condition. In case you are not sure what suites your taste Philip can give good advice on the Cigar. And all this comes with great service provided during the cigar tasting as well. ', 'So this place is highly recommened.']
title: Cigar tasting service by Philip

answer_text: ['Hello tinker186338,', 'I was disappointed to read the review of your recent visit but would like to thank you for taking the time to provide it. ', 'It is a real shame to hear that you will not visit us again as what you experienced is not a true reflection of what we offer here. The team work very hard to provide a personable and memorable customer experience and I am saddened to learn that this is not the level of service you received on your visit. ', 'I am confident that this would not happen a second time and so, should you wish to change your mind, please contact me on gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk and I can make the reservation for you. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['Food was average at best, service was poor - everything seemed too much trouble for our waiter and requests were met with an irritable "yes I was going to get that" but he would then forget and you would have to ask again 10 minutes later. Very disappointing and I definitely would not visit again.']
title: Very Average

answer_text: ['Hello Chairman1010,', 'Thank you for the feedback of your recent visit. ', 'It is fantastic to hear that you enjoyed the atmosphere here and that the prices were a pleasant surprise. You should try and come back to see our live music soon as it really does make the offering here quite special. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['Enjoyed this place for a couple of early evening drinks only. Very busy but great atmosphere. I was expecting heavy prices but turned out not much different from any where else. A lot of people were eating and it looked ok. There is a supplement for later evening entertainment but we were on a tight schedule to be somewhere else. Good to go though..']
title: Visit to Canary Wharf And Overnight.

answer_text: ['Hello Sharon C,', 'Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. ', 'I am sorry to hear that your visit did not live up to expectation. I am confident that any issues you faced have since been ironed out.', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ["8 of us went for Sunday Lunch in Septmber. The restaurant is very nice and spacious with great views. Unfortunately they were very busy that day and really couldn't cope. The service was frankly appalling and the food wasn't up too much either.... was disappointed as had heard good things about it."]
title: We were lucky we got food at all

answer_text: ['Hello ClearSkyReviews,', 'Thank you for giving us a review of your recent visit. ', 'The kitchen team were very pleased to hear that you enjoyed the Oysters and Risotto! There is lots more on our menu for you to sample so do join us again soon...', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['Lovely food, great venue and the food was great as well, try 6 oysters!!! Very nice and the risotto is great too']
title: Nice food.......have the Oysters

answer_text: ['Hello 42Gary42,', 'It was an absolute pleasure to read your recent review of Boisdale Canary Wharf, thank you for taking the time to provide us with this. ', 'To hear that your parents were up dancing and enjoying the atmosphere and offering to the full puts a huge smile on my face! ', 'The team are thrilled with your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future - perhaps your Ma and Pa can teach me a thing or two on the dance floor!', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ['Went to Boisdale (again) to celebrate the 80th Birthday of Buddy Holly. I love Boisdale (all venues) for first rate service, super food, a wonderful wine and spirit list and great MUSIC.', "Today we dined at 7.30pm on the set menu; 'dinner and a show for forty five pounds'. Great choices; the chef's salad of rocket, pear poached in red wine, stilton and walnuts was perfect. To follow a perfect flat iron steak, with extras such as broccoli with toasted almonds and sweet potato fries, a table favourite. The extra course taken was the ten cheeses plate, with crackers taken before desert, of something chocolatey. ", 'Coffee and a super show followed, with Ma and Pa (in their seventies) cutting a rug and showing two sons how to jive! ', 'We drank the reasonably priced Taittinger champagne, by the bottle and selected house reds by the glass.', 'The 12.5% service was included in the set-price experience price.', "The night was around four hundred pounds for four persons; that's dinner, a show, dancing and champagne - a bargain! We will return soon."]
title: Lovely night with parents, who remember 'rock 'n roll', dance and love GOOD FOOD.

answer_text: ['Good afternoon Sara N,', 'It was an absolute pleasure to read your recent review of Boisdale Of Canary Wharf. I have taken great pleasure in feeding this back to the team! ', 'You are right - we have some fantastic live music, you should try and join us one evening to experience the offering we have upstairs in the restaurant. You can find our music listings on the website. ', 'We hope to see you soon,', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ['I took my boyfriend here for his birthday as he loves cigars and whiskey and it has a cigar lounge. I booked the terrace because we particularly wanted to go to the cigar lounge, however when we go again we will book the restaurant and the show because the music coming from the restaurant was so good!', 'The terrace is informal - people in jeans and a tapas menu. As we were celebrating we were dressed up but they kindly let us order from the full restaurant menu. ', 'The food was delicious, the cocktails were great, the service brilliant, we thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience. It was a little pricey but that was ok as it was a special occasion. Highly recommend.']
title: Birthday trip to the cigar lounge

answer_text: ['Hello Giacomo A,', 'Thank you for your positive feedback on your recent visit. I was surprised to hear that you felt the restaurant to be dark as almost a full wall is floor to ceiling window however was glad to hear that you enjoyed the atmosphere regardless. ', 'Do join us again soon to enjoy some more tasty food and Whisky,', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes ']
content: ["This place is a bit dark and may turn you off in terms of decor if you don't like the slightly seedy atmosphere - I personally really enjoyed it! Great starters and steak, had a nice whisky, everything was very tasty and enjoyable."]
title: Great dinner and whisky

answer_text: ['Hello Steve J, ', 'Although I was disappointed to read your feedback I would like to thank you for taking the time to let me know of your recent visit. ', 'It is clear that your experience is not a true reflection on our usual standards of both service and quality. Unfortunately throughout December we do need to give last orders for lunch time earlier than the rest of the year as we need to re-set the restaurant for dinner service however this certainly should not have been happening while you were still seated. ', 'Please contact me at gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk as I would like the chance to discuss this with you further. ', 'Kind Regards,', 'Jenny Hughes']
content: ["Came for lunch to find our booked table was added as an afterthought, more in the entrance hall than the actual restaurant. It also became clear that we didn't have a waitress assigned as we waited ages for menus, wine list, drinks etc etc. Service very average, we took to filling our own glasses.", "Food ok, though nothing special. Bill eye watering!! £16.50 for a small bit of average smoked salmon starter!! The 4 of us had steaks, again ok, but not very special.
