Their website lists all the upcoming music nights so you can book when there is something on to suit your taste. A night to remember. Thank you Boisdales, we'll be back!"]
title: Fantastic venue, fantastic food.

content: ['8 of us turned up via a Groupon Voucher not knowing what to expect. We loved it all. The restaurant is stunning and very welcoming. The service was great and the waiter was very helpful. Our table was in an excellent position quite near the stage and we really enjoyed Ray Gelato and his band. It was a very entertaining night and I would definitely go again. The food was delicious, hot and well presented. The only reason for a 4 star and not 5 is that most of the dishes had supplements and the cocktails were very pricey. Our £20 a head outing turned into a £60 affair. However, it was such a fun night no one really cared.']
title: Jazzy fabby night out

answer_text: ['Dear Sir,', 'Thank you for taking time to write a review on Boisdale Canary Wharf. I was very saddened to read your comments regarding the service you received on your visit. Please can you contact me at your earliest convenience, so that I may get a better understanding of what happened. My details are gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk . ', 'I look forward to hearing from you in due course. ', 'Kind regards', 'James Hardesty']
content: ["I have been to the Boisdale a number of times over the last few years. Every time I go it's the same story. Excellent food / great music / awful service ", 'There is a reason why I am rating my combined recent visits as 2 stars', "When you spend this money you expect at least a average level of service, you don't expect to spend you entire evening with your hand in the air or trying to catch the eye of a waiter hurriedly rushing from table to table ", 'You will feel more attended to in Nandos ', "After my two recent visits I don't think I will be returning again ", '5 star prices / 2 star service ']
title: Let down by the service

content: ["Bar on first floor quite loud and raucous, unsurprisingly for a Friday night, however on entering the restaurant on higher floor, the atmosphere was totally different. Warm and inviting, even though it is a huge area. Service was impeccable, friendly but not overbearing. My boyfriend went for the haggis starter, which he really enjoyed and I had the calamari, which was a bit 'chewy'. Both my partner and I went for the Steak, which was nice, but not the best I've ever had. Band came on at 9.45 (Black Hat Band)..great entertainment and had everyone up dancing. Waiter found out it was my birthday and produced a plate with my name on and happy birthday message, candle, plus after dinner treats...nice touch. We will be back as the overall experience was great!"]
title: Great night out!

content: ['Was meeting two business partners in Boisdale for a business lunch. The service was very good (and unobtrusive), the food is excellent (I had the venison with rigatoni pasta) and there is sufficient privacy for business conversation. I have previously eaten at Boisdale for evening meals and have never been disappointed - strongly recommended.']
title: Great for a business lunch

content: ['Went for business lunch on the second floor, really nice setting on the river, good selection of food and drinks, lovely decor and everyone had a great time. Not unreasonable costs either considering the location right in the heart of C Wharf.']
title: Nice food service and setting

content: ['Convenient location for us. Excellent food. Lovely wines. Good value for money at £50 p/h for three courses including drinks. Lovely ambience with lunchtime jazz. Good background buzz but quiet enough to talk gently with the people we were eating with. Fab staff and service. Cabs ordered for us afterwards with drivers waiting for us in the lobby. A thoroughly enjoyable afternoon. Will make this a regular. thanks Boisdsale.']
title: Best Sunday lunch

content: ['My experience of booking a table for 6 on a weeknight was interesting, and not in a good way. I requested a table in the first floor bar for 6pm and was told I would have to give my credit card details. When I asked why I was told that it is their policy to charge a £25 per person cancellation fee for no-shows. After refusing to provide my card details I was put through to the manager who held the same line. It was only when I explained that in my opinion this is an offensive and money-grabbing practice AND that as one of the most popular reviewers on Tripadvisor in London this is exactly what would be going in my review did she change her tune. I was told that this policy is aimed at corporate clients and because we were just a small, private group they could waive the policy. ', "On the night we enjoyed the cocktails but the food was very pedestrian. Five of us paid £260 for 8 cocktails, 3 steaks, 6 tapas plates, 3 desserts and a coffee. To me this was not value for money: the service was slow, atmosphere pretty bland as we were stuck in a far corner and the quality of the food really wasn't anything special. Such a shame as I had high hopes based on a lovely dinner here nearly 4yrs ago. I may give Boisdale one more try but if it doesn't live up to it's reputation AND provide good customer service, I won't bother to come back. London has lots of wonderful restaurants that are hungry for success and are keen to treat customers well. I'd rather spend money in those."]
title: Nothing to write home about.

content: ["We love Boisdale, it's just such a cool place to visit for any reason, whether you are having dinner in the upstairs restaurant with a show or just in the lower bar with the fantastic veranda (which has patio heaters and blankets supplied for the chillier evenings) or visiting the cigar lounge it's a must ! the staff are so friendly and service is fantastic - LOVE IT !!"]
title: pre dinner drinks in the gorgeous bar

content: ["I've been here a few times and have always enjoyed it. The food is reasonable but I like the setting. Indoor and outdoor seating and jazz performances too. "]
title: Atmospheric

content: ["WIned and dined here 5 times since December 2015 - yes we really love going. Staff are amazing, food superb, entertainment terrific. Ambience and overall atmosphere buzzing. Can't praise it enough ...... and cant wait to go back.", 'Went with friends on Saturday 23.4.16 and saw "Suspiciously Elvis" great act, well worth going to see. Lots of fun. Whole evening was tremendous success (as were all the other visits!)', 'The Best Place to Wine, Dine, be Entertained ...in London']
title: Don't take my word for it - just go - you will NOT BE DISAPPOINTED :-) 10/10 ALL ROUND

content: ["We had a fabulous night at Boisdalebmin Canary Wharf. You can park underneath Canary Warf and just take the elevators straight into the restaurant. Split over two levels with terrace bar downstairs and Resturants upstairs. Sat by the window and had great night time views of the buildings around us. Food and service were great. Awesome wine list.mon the night we went we saw 'Suspicously Elvis' a tribute act to the King. They play at the restaurant every couple of months and are actually very good, entertaining and fun even if your not an Elvis fan. Lots of good acts scheduled over the months ahead so well worth checking out what's on via their website or Facebook page."]
title: Fantastic Live Music - Great Food

content: ["I, and my colleagues were fortunate enough to be hosted for a corporate dinner recently, and on arrival we were very nicely greeted, great table with view across to the City of London. The service, whilst prompt, was a little hit and miss and I must have been knocked at least 5 times by staff having to reach over. The food, whilst enjoyable was not wonderful with the main course cold. All the desserts that came out, plus cheeseboard were faultless. The drinks selection is great but unless you are buying vintage whisky the bar service, at the bar, very poor with 10min wait when nobody else at the bar apart from two pretentious people trying to look and act as they knew what whisky to buy! My biggest problem, and don't foget we were being hosted, our host had just settled probably a £1000 bill for our smallish (10) group, was the fact a small proportion of the party stayed on to watch the jazz band (OK, not brill) and the restaurant slapped a £30 music charge onto our additional,not the main party, drinks bill, OUTRAGEOUS, and if I were paying they would have received a few sharp words. When is my next vist, probably never"]
title: Rip off at music time

content: ['OK so he wanted to try Boisdale as we are both jazz fans and love great food. ', 'Booked a Groupon set menu for £20/pp and went for it.', "Arrived and in the lift were a party of people sniffing with a 'Colombian cold' and quite frankly had just stepped off the set from TOWIE. We ventured on...", 'The reception girl was quick to take out coats and assign us a table. However it was clear she was board due to the florescent pink highlighter doodles and block colouring on the guest list...', 'Upon being seated we were asked by three waiters (two minutes between them) if we would like drinks. We ordered the usual double gin & tonic with a large bottle of sparkling water. ', 'The decor is eccentric and warm but slightly shabby round the edges. ', 'We order ( mostly EAL staff with some difficultly in translation) drink in the atmosphere. The young male waiter by the window was very keen and attentive, perhaps we were in the cheap seats due to our voucher?!', 'Starters arrived and my haggis had clearly been microwaved as it was tough and scalding hot, yet the neeps and mash were tepid. His goats cheese salad was... skimpy but tasty. Two blobs of goats cheese puree with micro salad; we normally share but I did not want to deprive him of his 2x 2p diameter portions...', 'A splendid looking espresso floated by which prompted my order.', 'There was one server who was doing both serving and clearing (black lady with braids and such a warm smile) she clearly enjoyed her job. Although all of the servers do require a course in waiting on. ', 'Steak arrives, £5 supplement for the 28 day matured beef, I opted for the sweet spud fries with alioli (4.95 sup) but I was not given extra veg to compensate for my not having the original fries. And his arrives with no fries... they arrive 5 minutes later with his supplemented portion of mushrooms. The steak was epic!!!!', 'Espresso martini arrives... and the jazz starts 9pm ish', 'I visited the ladies room via the cloakroom to ask someone to clear our table as the plates were still sat there 20 minutes after we had finished eating. The young lady was finishing off her colouring in with gusto.', '£65 bill. Plus the voucher... £105 for well, not very much.']
title: Not quite bells and whistles...

content: ['This remains one of the best places to have a serious business lunch in Canary Wharf. OK, today we had a rather dopey waiter who forgot several things (water, mustard) and kept on interrupting, but the view, food and ambience are all great. Steak, fish and liver all great, and an excellent wine list.']
title: QUALITY BUSINESS DINING

content: ["Interesting place that smelt a bit like an old people's home when we first walked in, juxtaposed by semi naked photos on the walls. The service was good and I think that the ambience here would be wonderful in the evening. Food was delicious and they make Scottish and British food in the most inventive way."]
title: Not quite sure what this is

answer_text: ['Dear Sunshinesoul', 'I was very saddened to read your review. Please can you contact me at your earliest convenience so that I may discuss this with you in more detail. ', 'I look forward to hearing from you in due course.', 'Kind regards,', 'James Hardesty', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk']
content: ['The food was lovely but the service was awful!! I never take off service but had to. We had to literally shout down the waitress for every meal and she was incredibly odd in behaviour and rude. We made the manager aware of this but still they continued to ignore the tables. Not enough staff. No manners and just downright weird place. Shame because chef and singers on point! Let down. Not worth the money and def not worth service charge. Remove it till they prove it! Disappointed.']
title: Evening Dinner

content: ['Not enough choice on the Bar food menu. Drinks are quiet pricey but nice for special occasions. Caters for groups of people, nice view over the city of an evening. ']
title: Nice attmosphere

content: ["I love that this is dinner and dancing and that I do not feel old. We went for my birthday celebration and I loved it. I started with the scallops and then had the braised lamb. The food was cooked perfectly and the presentation was so pretty. Loved the band and danced to 80's music all night. A very enjoyable evening out."]
title: Dinner and dancing for the older couple

content: ["I booked a fabulous treat for my husband's birthday, he's Scottish and loves whisky so where else is there to go? ", "I purchased our table tickets a while ago and noticed the non refundable policy. Unfortunately, my husband has been ill all week and so I phoned today on the off chance that if the table was able to be resold for tomorrow night then maybe I could transfer my payment to another night? I was told a flat no. Even if it was resold. I was then told if my husband (or any other family member) had died or was in hospital then I would have been able to transfer it! But as that wasn't the case I wasn't able to book another night. Helpful but then a policy is a policy.", 'To top it off, after being told there was nothing they could do at all, the girl I spoke to was ending the conversation and I asked her whether she actually wanted to take note of my name so they could resell my spot, as she had not thought to ask!! She then took great pride in saying "so I\'ve cancelled all that for you".... Not even a we look forward to seeing you soon, hope your husband feels better, look online for our great calendar of events etc etc etc. Customer services hasn\'t been their strong point so far! ', "So, all in all I'm a little disappointed and I've not even got there yet. Such a shame too as my husband had been given donations for his birthday so he could indulge in some of their rare whiskies. Once he's better we'll look to rebook but whether it'll be here or not is still to be decided!"]
title: Poor customer service - and we never even made it!

content: ['Service: Amazing ', 'Food: Amazing (from starter through to desert) ', 'Drinks: One of the best rum bars in town', 'Entertainment: Live jazz as you dine . ', 'Value for money: On the expensive side but well worth it. ', 'If I had to find a negative is its not easy to find in the busy Canary Wharf ']
title: Simply Amazing!!

content: ['We visited as a group of four Saturday evening.', 'Three of us had the gravlax to start and it was magnificent. Easily worthy of five blobs.', 'For the main course I had a steak that was nicely cooked but came with a cold sauce in a little pot. Three blobs. My wife had Venison that was really a bowl of pasta with some sauce. Two blobs. We also ordered some side dishes that were ok but a bit small - not really enough to share.', "I'm not sure that it is worth a trip but if I lived locally then I would return. It's a pity that we had had a long day because it would have been nice to stay for the music."]
title: Quite good but not worth a trip

content: ['never been here before but will definitely be going again and again! What a fantastic location, the view is amazing, the restaurant is unique, a built in Humidor for those cigar loving men ! Great ambience and very exclusive feel to it. The food is to die for, the staff are on their game and the entertainment kept us buzzing all night ! This is for romantic meals, family celebrations and a perfect place for a wedding buffet!! LOVE this place !']
title: Dining with Fab Friends!

content: ["We went on a Friday night, one of Boisdale's 'soul nights'. This featured 'Kokomo', a British soul band that started in the 70s. They were tremendous, massively funky, and filled the dance floor. Great to see that it's not just tribute bands that can succeed at this type of venue.", 'We had a Premium dining table that was close to the stage. It was a little disappointing that one of our seats had a somewhat restricted view. This mattered less when we took to the dance floor.', "This being Canary Wharf, it wasn't cheap. £18 (plus 12.5% service) for a burger and fries is a lot. However, it was very good. Desserts were better priced at £7.50. My wife had a chocolate marquise, which was excellent.", "Service was very good, and more personable than I'd expected.", "All in all, I probably wouldn't return just to eat. But, with the right band, it's a fun night out, if you can afford it."]
title: Great music from Kokomo, good service and good (but not cheap) food

content: ["Visited this restaurant/bar for the first time 2 weeks ago. Amazing food, great service in a really stylish venue. However, I was greeted by a very rude receptionist, who didn't crack her face all night! All in all a really good place to eat, drink and watch live music but in need of some staff training!"]
title: Great food & music venue

content: ['We booked this for Sunday lunch with some jazz. What better. Was slightly unsure as this seemed to be in a shopping mall. However once in the lift you realised you were entering a different space altogether.', 'Great decor awaits you as you are transferred back in time to a place where jazz ruled.', "The staff were very helpful. A small trio were playing as you would except. The food was typical Sundagy roast. Don't let that put you off it was great food. We upgraded the wine selection and made a great choice. Just between you and me try the sticky toffee pudding, OMG! Shh", 'We had a blast. We were surprised as the place was not full on a Sunday. But hey we would recommend the place . We will be back..']
title: Sunday jazz

content: ['Went for dinner on Thursday night with my friend after a work event. I wasn\'t sure how crowded it would be since it was St. Patricks Day. In the states, that night is a big "AVOID" if you don\'t want to dine in a pub or party location with a bunch of drunken savages. But, no one seems to care about that "holiday" here in London. Service near the bar (bar menu) was very good. We had a few apps (Welsh Rarebit - not great; Empanadas - very good; sweet potato fries - standard). I had a salad which was really good and my friend quite enjoyed her fish and chips. I\'d definitely go back here if I needed a nice, affordable place to eat when in this area next time. ']
title: Excellent food and service

content: ["We went there for our son's birthday & had a great time. There was an excellent selection of food & I changed my mind several times plus an extensive wine list, or should I say expensive! We had a Beronia Reserva 2011 Rioja priced at £47.50, which was very nice & suited our taste but you can buy this in Waitrose for £13.49! I understand you have to pay 'corkage' but paying over three times as much, is too much. The drinks in general were expensive but we were in the restaurant & had live Jazz, although even then, we had to pay for tickets to be able to listen. Nevertheless, we had a great evening & if we went again, we would probably go to one of their bars instead of the main restaurant."]
title: Great food but a little pricey!

content: ['I am luckily enough to visit Boisdale a few times a year, unfortunately we were both disappointed with the evening that usually promises so very much, especially as this was a birthday treat for me! The singer was over 40 minutes late with no official announcement to confirm this delay, we were just told this by a member of the Boisdale staff which for a restaurant of this high caliber I was surprised, it is nice to be updated of any delay. The mood of the restaurant was something that I had never experienced before, very flat and very surprising as I have had an excellent time every time I have been here previously. We left at 11pm, an hour early, which by looking around was something that a lot of other people were also doing. Food and drinks to the high standard that we have always been served, we just both left disappointed.']
title: Slightly Disappointed - just not the usual atmosphere and experience

content: ['I got into London late and was staying in Canary Wharf. I went to Boisdale for dinner around 8, had a nice rib eye and went to the cigar bar. They have a good selection of Cuban cigars and a very knowledgeable person in the smoking room. The atmosphere is relaxed and friendly. There was a nice group of people in the room, everyone talking and enjoying themselves. I will go back for sure.']
title: Good food and an excellent cigar bar

content: ['Been a few times with live music and dance area. Meals, service and staff always very good. Music charge extra depending where you sit but starting at £10 per person. Worth a trip. Also other branch at Belgravia which I have not been to.']
title: Great evening

content: ["We visited Boisdale on Sunday 28 February... It was a very unplanned Sunday lunch after a big night out... We were feeling a little fragile to say the least. We settled on the three course set menu and upgraded to 3/4 of a bottle of wine each and a glass of pink fizz..... This proved to be a very good decision!! The food was amazing!!!!! Rib of beef cooked perfectly for me (very rare at my request) and pork shoulder with cracking plus HUGE Yorkshire puddings!!!!!! The wine flowed, the cheeseboard arrived and our amazing waiter Tim was kind enough to give me a small sample of some of the cheeses to help me with my choice. More wine flowed and we ended up with a two day hangover, missed a train stop and a lost phone!!! If Carlsberg did Sunday lunches this would be it!!! Many thanks to the wonderful Tim and his extensive knowledge and humour! We still can't believe one glass of vintage whisky is as much as £2700!!!!! Sunday lunch..... Highly recommended, can't wait for the next time... Minus the lost phone xxxx "]
title: Best Sunday ever....!!

content: ["Great food amazing wine collection. If bankers make your stomach turn then this place may not be for you, however once you get past them pompous nobody's you will love this place if you enjoy a good cigar and a good whiskey! ", 'Also they have a Jazz bar, the night i went there was Bob Marley tribute band, i had just got back form Jamaica so absolutely loved the night !']
title: Got the worlds largest Whiskey selection !

content: ['visited this restaurant for one of their entertainment evenings. upon arrival. we had to get the lift to the second floor for the jazz, soul and blues events. we had booked to see the SINATRA AND DEAN event. we booked a table to eat beforehand which was a good call because we were then able to sit back and just enjoy the show. this restaurant is very tastefully decorated, the atmosphere was buzzing and the ambiance was perfect. the staff were very pleasant and attentive even though it was very very busy this particular evening. I had the tournedos steak which is a fillet and it was probably one of the best i have ever tasted, cooked to perfection, so tender ', 'and not at all dry which so makes a change. my partner had the sirloin which too was beautiful. would highly recommend the steak dishes. most of the food that passed by us looked very mouth watering so i would say go with anything really. The show started at 9.15pm and it was very entertaining, the guys sounded very much like the real deal and it was like being at a cabaret show in vegas. the band that accompanied Frank and Dean were brilliant too. we were all encouraged to get up ', 'and dance which really made it that little bit more special and the whole show lasted for about 1 hr 20 mins. it truly was a fantastic fun evening with beautiful food, fantastic friendly staff and i would so recommend visiting this place. you will not be disappointed. thankyou to everybody at BOISDALE for a most entertaining evening. cant wait to visit again.']
title: fantastic venue

answer_text: ['Dear Christina,', 'Having just been alerted to your review although you visited in November - I would like to Thank You on behalf of the team at Boisdale of Canary Wharf - we are so pleased your experiences have been so flawless, which is what we strive for. At the same time we wish to Congratulate you & your fiancé & ask that you contact me when you next intend to visit: Katie@boisdale.co.uk', 'Best,', 'Katie']
content: ["We've only had the opportunity to visit this restaurant twice but what can I say other than that it was flawless on both visits.", "The first visit consisted of a steak tartar starter and a porter house t-bone steak special for a sharing main. Both were suggested and came highly recommend from our extremely charming waiter and we're both dishes we didnt even consider on first glance. To be honest he sealed the deal when he displayed the cut of meat to us before I final decision.", "The next time we came was for a big band evening and once again I couldn't have asked for more. The food (a fillet steak main) was once again cooked to perfection and so tender that it took no effort to cut at all. The staff were exceptionally attentive and friendly.", 'I also describe it to my friends as my lucky restaurant as during the first visit we received word that my sister-in-law had given birth to my godson and my boyfriend proposed the night of the second.', "We're coming back after the wedding and can't wait to show our family what all the fuss is about.", 'Thank you Boisdale! ']
title: Best restaurant ever!

content: ["Visited Saturday night with husband and daughter. We had a VIP table near the stage. Service was attentive from start to finish. Food was first class with our menu choices of carpaccio and baby haggis to start and slow cooked lamb and calves liver for main. Cheese board selection extensive and delicious. Cabaret was very good with songbooks from Sinatra and Nat King Cole. Great atmosphere and although a large restaurant it didn't feel overwhelming. Will definitely visit again. Whisky selection amazing. Well worth a visit."]
title: Crooning and great food - a joy!

answer_text: ['Dear 1221,', 'Thank you so much, what a lovely review. I do hope you will keep coming and hope to meet with you next time you visit! Please do ask for me when you arrive. ', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'General Manager']
content: ['Great food, amazing service.', 'Went there many times and will always come back. Atmosphere is brilliant, very relaxed and the food is super delicious.']
title: Could ask for better!

answer_text: ['Dear Maurice1808,', "Thank you for writing a review. I'm really pleased you enjoyed the act and apologise for any delays you experienced. We have some great acts coming up that you may like, keep an eye out on our website for the details. I look forward to welcoming you back soon.", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ["This was our first visit to the Boisdale and we would certainly go again. We were lucky to see an Eagles tribute band who were quite entertaining. We had the set menu which was £40 a head including the entertainment, but obviously the drinks were extra and due to the expensive cocktails we had quite a hefty bill. Service was slow, but we didn't mind as we were going to be there until the band finished anyway.", 'One big pointer is get a table by the dance floor or you will feel "out of it".']
title: Get a table by the stage

answer_text: ['Dear gmb57,', 'Thank you for reviewing us, I do hope you will come and try our restaurant and whisky bar on the second floor, with live music every night and 700 whiskies to sample, it is well worth a visit!', 'I hope to welcome you back soon,', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['A pleasant enough supper, wine better than the food tbh. And I am told the range of whisky is good, but regrettably with it being mid-week, whisky tasting was not possible. ', "Something interesting happens upstairs I'm told...but after three glasses it's all gone a bit hazy..."]
title: Business, always business

answer_text: ['Dear Jacqueline K,', "Thank you for taking the time to review us. I'm really pleased you and your family enjoyed the evening. Our head chef was very happy with your comments on the steak too! We hope to see you all back again soon,", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ["Me and my family ate here for my birthday, which was the Nat king Cole and Frank sinatra night. The food was excellent, the steak was cooked lovely. Best steak I've had! The entrainment it great. The restaurant had an olden day blues vibe. All in all a really good restaurant."]
title: Amazing

answer_text: ['Dear Sduke22,', "Thank you for your lovely review! I'm so pleased that you enjoyed and look forward to welcoming you back to sample more Whisky and live music. We have some great acts coming up - all the details are on our website.", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'General Manager']
content: ['Had a fantastic night. The food was exceptionally good, as was the vast selection of whiskey. The live band on Friday night were really good! Recommend!']
title: Great food and drink

content: ['Just fabulous.....wonderful ambience awaits you at Boisdales. Welcoming staff ....extensive Menu...can recommend the Haggis ,', 'Steak was superb.', 'Wines, cocktails ,slipped down a treat. Superb selection of wines. Attentive but not intrusive waiter ...cabaret was captivating ...jazz singer was amazing...sound of the great Ella F.', ' We had a wonderful evening. Thank you.']
title: Classy ! Cocktails ! At Canary Wharf !

content: ["Visited last Sunday on a two course Sunday lunch including a glass of prosecco and have to say it was the best roast beef I've had in a long time. Roast potatoes also amazingly good.", 'Service very good. Desserts excellent. Hope to go back as a Birthday treat.']
title: Great Sunday Lunch

content: ['Went there with a party of 6 - age range 21 - 85. Food was wonderful. Lobster/steak combo £25 was just superb. Dad had the haggis - said it was great - daughter had the burger - delicious. There is a grill bar and menu at 1st floor - we went to 2nd floor restaurant - at dusk lovely views over the lit trees at the Wharf. Just lovely.', "Service, staff, food, attention to detail all first class. Beautiful bar with extensive range of whiskies. What's not to like.", 'London at its best.']
title: Absolutely Fabulous

content: ['I have had the pleasure of visiting Boisdale several times and always been impressed by the food. Both the fillet and sirloin steaks were cooked excellently and various sides were all delicious. The whiskey bar is extensive and barman knowledgeable. Highly recommended']
title: Excellent restaurant and whiskey bar

content: ["Everything about Boisdale is elegant and charming. From the time you enter the restaurant, till you take your last bite of the cheese board - it's an experience of note!", "As a foodie, whiskey drinker and Jazz lover - this is my perfect nite out! Even more exciting if you're planning a gents nite out.", "Be warned, it's not cheap!"]
title: Masterclass - but not for the faint of heart

content: ['Fabulous food with entertainment (extra) service crisp ,wines and cocktails fair value.Bustling even on week nights. Scottish salmon venison steaks salads Vegies and desserts all good']
title: Best single malt selection outside Craigellichie

content: ["I'm slightly mystified by Boisdale. I've been to the floor with the Grill restaurant (tarten carpet and nude photos) and with a bigger group to the main restaurant (big bar, treacle-slow service). The food is hit and miss but the location is great. It comes across as a great place for a lad's lunch - perhaps that's the aim. I wouldn't object to going again, but I don't think I would push for it. I can't comment on the jazz nights, but I do get the feeling that the main business is around this and similar events, rather than lunches (which is what I've been here for)."]
title: Slightly odd - good for groups

content: ['Booked a table for 4 to see a margin Gaye and more tribute £30 per ticket no marvin Gaye covers sang']
title: Margin Gaye and more night tribute night with no margin Gayes songs not even one!!

answer_text: ['Dear youngpeteri.', "Thank you for your review, I'm so pleased you enjoyed your first meal here! There are some fantastic acts coming up, as well as Burns celebrations at the end of January, all the details are on our website. ", 'We look forward to welcoming you back soon,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['Very lovely surprise, to discover Boisdale, very good food and lovely foot-tapping jazz - will definitely come again.']
title: Good food and easy lunch jazz

content: ["A Saturday night supper in the Terrace restaurant chosen on the basis of past experience of staying at the Lamb at Hindon (sadly no longer part of the stable). I attended with both my wife an son and we have to say be were treated like' royalty'. Nothing was too much, with the Maitre de giving us a personal tour showing both the Cigar room and also the main dinning area with the whiskey collection(heaven). We can't wait to come again and experience the supper room."]
title: a Saturday night experience

content: ['The bar on the ground floor is nice, the restaurant is not bad. There is a great selection of Whisky! I would love to check the 1946 Macallan, but too costly!!! ', 'Nice place for an afterwork drink or a romantic dinning.']
title: Nice environment and great selection of Whisky!

content: ['We went there last week with my colleagues for our end of year dinner and I experienced something I have never seen before in a restaurant of this category.', "The waiter arrived with several steaks and french fries but the portions of fries were clearly not enough. He distributed the plates in such a way that half the people in the table had their portions and the other half had nothing. I was over half of my steak and had already claimed my portion but had to claim it again so I could eat them with my steak. What he did left me speechless, he literally went to the other side of the table and without asking for permission he grabbed a plate from one of my colleagues to drop it by my plate. As I was finishing my steak he decided it was not enough to remove someone else's fries so he came to my side and attempted to take the plate out again and in the plate there were not more than 5 small fries!", "I had to ask him to keep the plate there as I hadn't finish my portion and told him I had never seen something like that and I didn't expect to see it in a restaurant like this one, but he didn't even apologized to me!", "Extremely rude service! I don't think I will ever go there again or recommend it to anyone else!"]
title: Extremely rude service, never experienced anything like that!

content: ['This was our 3rd year celebrating our Christmas Party, its really such a laugh and great fun. Frankie & Dean are brilliant and everyone is up dancing after the 2nd song!! Food is expensive for the portion size, but its very good. Service is wonderful and attentive and I just love the whole atmosphere of the bar and restaurant. A lot of people here didnt realise that there is another bar underneath the main restaurant, which has a lovely outdoor area with view over Canary Wharf.']
title: Christmas Party with Frankie & Dean - superb

answer_text: ['Dear stf02,', 'Thank you for your review. Our cocktail list is varied in price due to the premium sprits used, the starting point is £9.50 ranging up to £18.50. Please get in touch to arrange another visit to our bar, my email address is below. I hope to be able to show off our cocktails to you soon.', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk']
content: ["This is a good looking bar but the cocktails are around £5 too expensive. The drinks average £15 - £17, they should be around the £12 mark. 1 Canada Square serves better cocktails at a more friendly price range. I don't mind paying for what I get, they just aren't good enough to warrant the cost."]
title: Over-priced but okay-ish!

content: ['Although slightly intimidating at first the restaurant was lovely and the service very good. Reasonably priced even with the steak option!! Not too busy and very enjoyable. The food was absolutely lovely - everyone left full and raved about their option!! ']
title: Impressive

answer_text: ['Dear Lulamugs,', "My sincere apologies that your experience wasn't pleasant or to our standard. Please get in touch with me to discuss your meal at your earliest convenience. ", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk']
content: ['Dined at CW Boisdale last Thursday with a friend for an impromptu dinner.', "Ordered a Inferno Burger and a classic burger , had to order fries as they don't come with fries! And one glass of Chablis and a glass of Merlot. Bill came to £40 each.", "I don't mind paying for good food- but the burger cam up cold- the bun was hard and the chips were soggy. More like pub food from weatherspoons. Normally I would complain and send it back - but the waiter looked like he couldn't be bothered to help and that we were lucky to get a table as walk ins during the Christmas period.", 'Safe to say I wont be going back in a rush. Way over priced for poor food.']
title: Not worth the money

content: ["Visited here on Thursday night with my husband. The food was lovely and the atmosphere great, we didn't see the live music but the place was full. My husband had a cigar and whiskey in the Cigar lounge which he thoroughly enjoyed. "]
title: Lovely!

content: ["This is the third time I have dined at boisdale Canary Wharf at it never stops giving. Staff were second to none, even when we asked to change the set menu for another menu just before ordering, they produced new and personalised menus within 10 minutes. Food was outstanding, entertainment fabulous and like I say, the staff are so accommodating, not to mention patient !! Can't wait to return in the not to distant future."]
title: Yet again, perfect !!

content: ['We booked at short notice & we\'re pleased to get a table for 2. It is a nice place & definetly has "atmosphere" in there, especially with live music on the top floor. The steak was very good but fries very "McDonald\'s". Also very basic for the price of £22 for steak & chips with nothing else on the plate. The extras we ordered was mushrooms & they were v good although hugely expensive at £9.50 a portion. Enjoyed our experience but could have got more value for money elsewhere. In short, only issue was price']
title: Price versus Quality

answer_text: ['Dear Boltac,', "Thank you for your review, I'm so pleased you enjoyed your meal! We have some great acts coming up including Burns celebrations at the end of the month, all the details are on our website. I look forward to welcoming you back soon. ", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth']
content: [' I went for a date and the band was a cameo of the blues brother', 'The musician were amazing', 'The food was good. ', 'A big choice of wine and whiskey ', 'Nice decor', 'Slightly on the expensive side.', 'Perfect to impress on a first date']
title: Good food amazing band

answer_text: ['Dear Ghaza A,', 'Please get in touch to discuss your review with me. ', 'I hope to hear from you soon,', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk']
content: ['It was a present for me and was served the starter soup which had a hair see the photo for it. I couldnt stop laughing being in a place like Boisdale and after a couple of spoons of the soup I find a surprise HAIR. HA HA HA. I got put off and it was quietly replaced with another starter but yet they carried on serving the same soup to other Customers which I found really strange. The tables were too small so small that there was not enough space to leave anything other than the meal you were having.', 'The only good thing about the place was the view from where we were sitting. See photos.', 'If you are going to get drunk, just eat whatever comes to your table as you have money to waste than visit Boisdale.', 'Go Hair Soup only at Boisdale...']
title: Hair in Soup, Dirty Old Cutlery, Scruffy Staff & definitely not worth a Visit

answer_text: ['Dear Pick_E_Diner,', "Thank you very much for your review. As you mentioned December's run up to Christmas can be a very busy time for restaurants, this shouldn't have effected your experience,I am sorry the meal felt chaotic for you . Please do email me next time you are coming so I can make your reservation and return visit special for you.", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk']
content: ['Venue great for an entertaining evening', "Pre dinner cocktails and G & T's poor.....", 'Food a little disappointing, which may be down to the numbers dining (it is pre-christmas)', 'Some side dishes lost into the ether......free ports to compensate.', 'Service was for the most part attentive and helpful.', 'Cheeseboard very good.', 'Entertainment "Frank & Dean" ..... made for a very enjoyable evening, which lifted final points given.']
title: Fun venue .... but a little chaotic

answer_text: ['Dear dkwilli,', "Thank you very much for your review. I'm pleased you enjoyed the meal but sorry that the special offer on the website had finished and not been amended. We do try to keep our website as up to date as possible, I'm sorry that this side of the experience let you down. I do hope you'll visit us again and hope you will let me know when you are coming. ", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk']
content: ["Dinner with Dean and Frank , food was pretty good and so was the wine . bit dissapointed that online there was a half price XO brandy by the glass and when I enquired at my table it was full price so on principle I didn't order it . As other people have said watch the bill !", 'also one waiter in particular has a bad habit of pouring wine at a stupid rate just to sell more wine , attentive staff fine but by commission waiters not ', "would go back I know there are more interesting themed evening's ahead. "]
title: Dinner , live music , cigar ......perfect

answer_text: ['Dear Mr Goodman,', 'I am so sad to hear this error ruined your otherwise pleasant lunch at Boisdale of Canary Wharf. This was a simple mistake that should never have happened, your food should have been ordered via our inclusive pricing but instead was charged at full price which then appeared on your bill. I do hope you will come back and give us another chance. Please do let me know if you wish to return so I can make arrangements for you.', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk']
content: ["Excellent food and ambeince.However when the bill arrived we found we had been overcharged £220 yes that's right £220 for a party of 10.they appologised and changed bill but £220 is no small amount so I don't think I will return,plenty of restaurants to spend my money in.", 'Sent e-mail to restaurant but no response from management', 'Stephen Goodman']
title: Watch the bill

content: ["Chose the Boisdale CW for my retirement luncheon, as I'd been there several times before for the music. Having made arrangements with Valerie before the event, I can't fault the service from the team. Great attention to detail, excellent food and a great location. All of my guests couldn't speak highly enough of their experience. Many thanks to all involved in my special day."]
title: Private Dining

content: ["There was 8 of us that had pre booked and we thought this looks like a nice place but the service was so slow from the start and the restaurant was only half full at this point. The starters was all good. Then they brought out the main course and gave the wrong steak to the wrong person who had started it and then the waiter said I'm sorry that's not for you and gave the started meal to another friend on our table and then walked away. We asked to be shown to the cigar room and told 2 minutes but the waiter forgot for 30 minutes and then said its just down the stairs just go yourself. When we returned to our table its was slow to get a drink again. We paid the bill which was £1800 and we left early and will not be returning in a hurry. "]
title: Don't bother

content: ["Fantastic food, fantastic wine, fantastic service! We are never disappointed in Boisdale and can't wait to visit again! ", 'Highly recommend the Haggis and Rib Eye Steak!']
title: Never disappoints - 5* all round! Haggis is a must!

answer_text: ['Dear Catpimimi,', "I'm sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your experience with us. May I kindly ask you to get in touch with me so we can discuss your evening further. My contact details are below.", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'General manager', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk', '02077155818']
content: ['Overall the food is ok, nothing exceptional. But the music charge is absolutely ridiculous. As I got home and realised that the table had been charged some 30-40 pounds for the terrible music (it was a relief when it finally stopped), I sent an email to the management to explain that I was not happy about that. Never got a response. Just poor.']
title: First time ever that I get charged for bad music

content: ['A gem in Canary Wharf. This is a huge restaurant over two floors which is well known for its love of music and live shows. The menu is excellent if not a little overpriced. The food is of a good standard and the waiting staff are well trained and very polite. Worth a visit if you have deep pockets.']
title: Expensive but worth the money

answer_text: ['Dear Kevin,', 'Thank you for your lovely review. I am so pleased you enjoyed your experience with us. We have some fantastic acts coming in the New Year to watch out for. l hope to welcome you back soon.', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['Once found, hard to find entrance. A great venue to enjoy good food and good music on the stage, making this a unique experience. The food and wines were reasonably priced. The staff were friendly. Great views over Cabot Square, a place to enjoy and relax. ']
title: Surf 'n' turf

content: ['Quite possibly, one of the finest rib eye steaks I have ever had the pleasure to eat!', "My fiancée took me here for my birthday lunch and it certainly didn't disappoint. Both the rib eye and the fillet steak were excellent.", 'Exceptional service. Cant go wrong with Boisdale.', 'When booking a table, ask for one of the window seats!']
title: Fabulous Rib Eye Steak

answer_text: ['Dear Nevleary,', 'It is a pleasure to receive such a great review, thank you so much for talking the time. I hope to welcome you again in the near future, please do ask for me on your next visit, it would be a pleasure to thank you in person. ', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['Great food, excellent service and avenue to impress. The venue caters for many needs and is excellent for entertaining after a business meeting. Great variety of beers followed by excellent choices in the menu. Highly recommended.']
title: Great evening venue

answer_text: ['Dear Fjoralba M,', 'Thank you for your review. I am so pleased you enjoyed your meal. My apologies that your server offended you when it came to your payment, I assure you this was purely an avoidable mistake. ', 'We have brought up in our daily briefings since reading your comments to ensure all our guests are treated equally and the host of the table, be it male or female is respected. I do hope to meet you next time you visit us, please ask for me or mention this when booking with our reception team.', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['My partner and I went to celebrate our first anniversary on 24th November, eating, drinking, dancing and enjoying the excellent singer. I even ordered a second bottle of wine. In the end, i asked for the bill. The waiter approached our table and i handed in my card. He took it, slipped it in and then offered it back to my partner for him to issue password and make the payment. Shocked by his gesture i very kindly offered "pardon me, i think i was the one who gave the card, not my partner\' and he then offered a very poor apology and left. It was a very offensive gesture, with no excuse. People still believe (wrongly) that it is the man who ought to pay. But, all signs were clear as to who is paying the bill on this specific occasion. And don\'t tell me i am an angry feminist! What i\'m talking about is common sense. We need to teach people (women and men) that if we want to be treated equally, we have to be assertive and clear on our social behavior. Other than that, this is the most elegant restaurant i\'ve ever been to. Excellent food, excellent atmosphere, the singer was marvelous. Definitely going back.']
title: Excellent atmosphere BUT...

answer_text: ['Dear Dash T,', 'I would like to discuss this review further with you. I also sent you an email to your personal address earlier today. ', 'As a successful Sunday lunch venue our menu is varied and accessible to suit all tastes. It is also on our website for anybody to view before choosing to dine with us. ', 'I hope to hear from you soon.', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['This has to be the worst restaurant me and my wife have visited in our entirety!', 'For the type of venue, food and drink it is over priced and disgusting. ', 'Upon entry we surrendered our coats and were seated by the window and handed the Sunday lunch menu. When reading through the menu I realised (which is not mentioned on the web site) that no steak type meals were on offer and the waitress told us we had no access to the al a crate menu. We were given a sales pitch by an oriental waitress that Sunday lunch was what the public wanted so we cannot provide you with what you wish! ', 'So we ordered our starters which were minimal.....mushroom soup worse than Heinz and salmon gravaldax which was three small thin strips of salmon at £9.00!', 'We did try and order some decent gin and tonics but were told sorry you only have a choice from three brands! ', 'The mains were just awful! Fish chips.....fish soaked in oil and over cooked chips.......gnocchi with tempura cauliflower soaked in a disgusting watery white so called cream sauce. ', "In summary ladies and gentlemen if you want a selection of whiskey please visit here but do not prefer food as it is disgusting and the when you enter the venue it does smell of vomit mixed with alcohol. I'm definitely sure a Weatherspoons pub could do far better at this venue as the management has no idea please find pictures attached...to escape from this place we had to pay £60 which was not warranted in any shape or form! Plus any form of accompanying vegetables were extra dry, tasteless and resembled leftovers! ", 'PLEASE FOR HUMANITIES SAKE DO NOT VISIT THIS PLACE AT ALL!!!']
title: Glorified Weatherspoons Pub

content: ['We had the set menu Sunday lunch with wine pairings and thoroughly enjoyed it. A glass of sparkling rose wine to begin our meal, then haggis scotch eggs as starters - a new experience for me and very flavoursome. ', 'The roast beef and Yorkshire puddings were lovely and the waiting team kept our glasses topped up as frequently as we wished. ', 'The puddings were cheesecake with blackberry sorbet (delightful) and my partner had a chocolate confection which he pronounced delicious. We finished with good coffee.', 'The service was very attentive and the jazz trio were really good. ', 'So enjoyable ... we fell asleep on the sofa when we arrived home!']
title: Really good Sunday Lunch

content: ["We booked to have Sunday jazz lunch here with friends. Efficient and friendly staff, very professional in their service. We had a window seat which overlooked Cabot Square. All the food was excellent and great atmosphere in this beautiful restaurant. Only disappointment was the live music! It really didn't compliment the dining experience. We were looking forward to some great jazz music over lunch but sadly we didn't feel this was achieved. The only minor disappointment to a fabulous lunch experience!"]
title: Great Sunday lunch!

content: ['Sunday reunion with friends over jazz. Lunch was generally excellent and at a reasonable price. Wine prices too, were acceptable for the City though the single malt prices are steep. Tim was our excellent waiter. The disappoinment was the live jazz, competent but uninspiring and not for long; unfortunate, as it was a major reason for our long journey to be there.']
title: Shame about the jazz

content: ['We enjoyed our evening at this etablishment. There was live music and the food was good,The service left much to be desired though. The Cigar bar was my personal favourite spent a lot of time in there. I would recommend a visit. ']
title: Enjoyable

content: ['Boisdale Canary Wharf is a fantastic venue but the quality of the floor service in their restaurant is not matching the rest of of the experience. It is a problem and might be the reason they unable to fill the dining area on a Saturday night. This was our second visit in the last three months and we wont be returning in the foreseeable future.']
title: Poor floor service

content: ['On the spur of the moment we decided to go to Boisdale, what a good decision. Although the restaurant was fully booked and had a live music act playing that evening they suggested we went to the bar. Although not as keen on this suggestion, we gave it a try. ', 'Service was first class, the food outstanding. We ate from the fixed price menu - a very reasonable £11.95 - but paid the supplement and both had fillet steak. It was sublime, perfectly cooked and accompanied with fries and a side order of broccoli. Boisdale is a Scottish restaurant, no doubt this is why the steak was so good, we both had "haggis, neeps and tatties" as a starter. Dessert was an apple and pear crumble. We thoroughly enjoyed our meal, the quality of the food was excellent and the staff were friendly and helpful We will be back soon.']
title: What a surprise

content: ['After a disappointing Sunday lunch at Boisdale’s in September we returned for a midweek lunch earlier this month and the food was superb. Our starters were haggis and the mushroom & tarragon soup both of which were delicious. Our mains were truffle Aberdeenshire rib steak hamburger and lamb, again both were delicious. Our server recommended wines to go with our individual courses and they complimented the foods perfectly. We had no room for dessert but had coffees. Thank you Boisdale Canary Wharf, we had a superb lunch (back to your best) and will definitely return.']
title: A Return Visit

content: ["Booked a private room all in all it was a good experience, for most of the time. The booking was painless, though it might be best to have an online form process, emailing a PDF that has to be filled and sent back is a bit clunky. Our room was nice, and just the right size for our party of 8 I feel 10 would be a bit cramped, the food was lovely, haggis was especially good as was the soup, the cheese platter was a let down, great cheeses but servings were stingy, I would have liked to have seen a better menu given the prices, chicken and salmon aren't exciting, and we were restricted to an a la carte menu, shame as other menus looked more exciting. Note: sides do not come with the dishes and have a charge. Our waitress was really nice, friendly, and attentive but she was obviously dealing with several rooms or tables, and rushed off her feet. The whiskey, wines and champagnes are first rate, sadly we didn't get to sample the cigars. Note although the brochure mentions music docks in the rooms there aren't any, a major oversight in my opinion. all the staff we met were courteous I could possibly come back. ."]
title: Great atmosphere, good(ish) food, service needs tweaking for better rating

content: ['Varied menu, well cooked and presented food. Good service, wine list. All things that you expect to get from a good restaurant but do not always get.']
title: Not disaapointing

content: ['The room we had was adequate wine was excellent . i cant say that for the salmon though the spinach was lovely, the lobster seasoning was bland was expecting a sweet / savory taste. The haggis was fab!', 'I did love the atmosphere that night of the 14th nov. I would try this place out again.']
title: Sisters Birthday

content: ["We've just got back from Boisdale Canary Wharf, and are quite disappointed. We'd been a few years ago, and felt it was a bit 'all fur coat and no knickers' then. Nothing has changed.", 'The starters were nice, but the mains arrived as we were finishing them, which meant things hung around for a while.', ' ', 'The beef rib was supposed to be medium rare, mine was very rare and barely tepid, so I sent it back. When it returned, the server disappeared without offering any condiments.', 'It turned out that both others having beef, were served cold meet. We sent one back, and again had to wait for condiments.', "All three diners' beef were tough as old boots, and mainly fat and gristle, with all plates going back with around 50% of the meat remaining.", 'Also, drinks orders were forgotten.', 'The sticky toffee pudding was dry, and lacked sauce. I had to ask for extra clotted cream, and my dining partner left most of his.', "The manager, at a push, knocked 2 of the set menus off the bill, but slipped the desserts back in. I wasn't impressed, but was muzzled by my fellow diners.", 'To be fair, the fish course was nice, as was one of the desserts. Also, the duck fat potatoes were nice, but had gone cold due to the problems and subsequent delays with the meat.', "This visit was just like the last, all style over substance, and we won't be rushing back."]
title: Bad on many levels

content: ['met friends after a meal round the corner. great cigars purchased at a big cost by one of our party which you can smoke out on the terrace . ', "went up to our table to listen to the live jazz , great easy listening music , wine was reasonable and good price , the cost is £10 ahead to listen to the jazz and we'll. worth it . will be back . "]
title: Great night !

content: ['Booked their set menu for 20+ Gents on Saturday night. Great steak, broccoli was lovely. Our main gripe was they brought one dish of chips and said it was for three people! One between two would of been just about passable but one between three was ridiculous at £45 per head so we had to order extra chips. Also watch out for the water bottles it cost us £50 in water alone. ', 'We had ordered five bottles of wine for the table as some of the guys wanted to get beers and were saving themselves for the whisky and some were driving but they brought out and opened ten bottles before we had realised and we ended up not drinking them all. All that said, we had a fantastic night and the service was well worth the £140 service charge added.']
title: Guys Meal

content: ['At £50 a ticket just for the evening "entertainment" I think I was expecting a bit more from the tribute act and the Boisdale Rooms. The photographs of the Boisdale Rooms do not quite show up how shabby this place is, in dire need of a refurb. The set menu was ridiculously overpriced for what was put before me, nothing special, "a good steak". Service on the other hand is excellent and the waiters ensured your glass was never empty! Now the entertainment.....Elvis .... Or should I say Ivor Potter...not as great as the Boisdale advertise him to be.... Couldn\'t help thinking about the only fools and horses sketch.......The singer who couldn\'t pronounce his R\'s...Roy Orbison looky likely singing Crying...I don\'t think you are supposed to take this Elvis night serious and I think as long as you drink as much alcohol as you can it will be ok and soon be over. A very expensive night. Great money spinner for the Boisdale']
title: Elvis Tribute Night......It ain't no Viva Las Vegas

content: ['Really enjoyed our night at boisdale. Delivered on the food all three courses were high quality. We had pre drinks in the bar and a cigar on the terrace. Service was outstanding.']
title: Great evening

content: ['Great steak, brilliant live acts, an incredible selection of whisky and a cigar terrace.', 'This place is as unbelievable as it sounds']
title: Steak, whisky, cigars and jazz - what's not to love

content: ["I went to Boisdale with three friends. We couldn't get tickets for the Jazz but very much enjoyed the early evening menu which I booked on open table. It was good value for London. The gluten free bread that I got was delicious! I will definitely be back."]
title: Nice Friday night

content: ['This place is really nice, wide restaurant with very fine dining and great wine selection.', 'At 9pm normally there is a jazz band playing, that is creating a great atmosphere for guests.', 'Fantastic whiskey selection, together with other drinks options']
title: Great restaurant with great music

content: ['We had the fixed price menu but the full a la carte looked quite interesting. ', 'The choices we reasonable for the price and the portions adequate. The food was average to good, but the service and room were better than average hence the score. The wine list was very good.', "It just wasn't 'engaging' as restaurant, so whilst I'd go again it wasn't the kind of place you would call a destination, in fact I'm not sure I'd make the effort to cross the road to get there. I'm not sure why this is, and I know it's a personal thing, maybe a bit weird even.", "So, in summary, it isn't too expensive, the food is reasonable, the service is quite good, the decor is OK, the wine list is comprehensive, but I found lunch there dull. Sorry.", 'Mark']
title: Lunch

content: ['This place is amazing. Wonderful band playing and delicious food. Will def be visiting again! They were also very kind to give us a great table when I mentioned it was our 5 year anniversary.']
title: Great food and entertainment

content: ['The perfect evening - really good food and fantastic entertainment! The band was White v. Wonder (Barry White and Stevie Wonder tribute) and put on a great show.', 'The food was very tasty and served by friendly and attentive staff.', 'Thank you !']
title: Great fun and good fun

answer_text: ['Dear Tina, ', 'Thank you so much for your lovely review! The staff were so please when I showed them. ', 'We look forward to welcoming you again very soon.', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['First visit to Boisdale, and it exceeded expectations. Multitude of attentive friendly staff made the experience one to remember, food was great too!']
title: 1st Class

answer_text: ['Dear Rita P,', "Thank you so much for writing such a lovely review. It is great to receive good feedback from new guests. I do hope you've since visited one of our other sites since coming to see us here. Belgravia is where it all started 27 years ago and well worth a visit!", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ["We discovered Boisdale while looking for a restaurant with live music and good food and it fitted the bill perfectly. The restaurant offers a range of fine wines and vintage whiskeys and boasts that it serves the best of Scottish food including wild duck, salmon, venison and high quality beef. Top musicians perform jazz, blues and soul. It even has a cigar library offering Havana cigars, a few dating back to pre-Castro days. The restaurant is vast with deep red and green walls so may not suit customers seeking intimacy. The artwork is distinctive with large paintings of nudes. We went to the Boisdale in Canary Wharf only to find out later that there are other branches which would have been less of a trek. Prices weren't prohibitively high, worth a visit for a special occasion. "]
title: Fine food, wine and music

answer_text: ['Dear Dawn,', 'Thank you so much for your great review! It really does give the team a spring in their step to receive such great feedback. There are some amazing evening acts coming up that you might also enjoy. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit. ', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ["Went to Boisdales yesterday for the Sunday Lunch and it really was the best roast we've ever had. The rib of beef,cooked medium rare cut like butter and was so tasty. Yorkshire Pudding and goose fat roast potatoes were crisp and full of flavour, accompanied by spring greens and buttered carrots it really was an amazing lunch. The starters we choose were beautiful, looking around the restaurant also seemed the most popular, haggis scotch egg and potted mackerel, gorgeous. Desert's looked lovely but we chose a selection of cheese,all good quality and a lovely white port!.Service was good considering how busy the restaurant was. Lovely live jazz trio played throughout the meal. Altogether a great afternoon, will definitely be returning to Boisdales."]
title: Fantastic Sunday Lunch

answer_text: ['Dear BrendaW1023,', "What a lovely review, thank you so very much. I'm pleased to hear your birthday celebrations were enjoyed and we look forward to seeing you in the near future. Do check out the website for more amazing live music listings and offers. ", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['A party of 12, my family celebrating my 70 th birthday. We had a fantastic night, the food, service and entertainment was excellent. Would love to go there every weekend.']
title: Suspiciously elvis

content: ['Last Saturday we went to the "Elvis"tribute show at Bolisdale,we\'ve been before I must say it\'s not improved much,the food is less then average,and very overpriced ,the service was ok,but very disappointed with the food,on a positive the Elvis show was fantastic,and I\'m not a big Elvis fan,']
title: Overpriced

answer_text: ['Dear Garylisap,', "Thank you for taking the time to review us. The band you mentioned are one of my favourites, I'm so pleased you enjoyed it!", 'Keep an eye out for some amazing acts coming up, Dire Straits will be fabulous on 21st November! We now have a new ticket available for some of our shows that includes 2 courses and the music. I hope you will come and see us again soon.', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['A little pricey but good food, wine and music.', 'Serpentine Fire an Earth, Wind and Fire tribute band excellent!!']
title: Great atmosphere

content: ['Service was first class. Food was delicious - perfectly cooked and served.', 'The entertainment was brilliant.', 'A really thoroughly enjoyable evening.']
title: Elvis Presley tribute act

content: ['My fiance and I went for Sunday lunch and it really was very enjoyable indeed.', 'The service was very pleasant (including not looking down their noses at an Amazon Local voucher which can sometimes happen) and staff attentive but not in-your-face about it.', "The venue and live jazz music was very much to my taste - background music so you didn't feel like you were eating during a show at all, and altogether rather enjoyable.", "As for the food. Well like any Brit live for a good Sunday Roast. Oh boy, this was good. Very good. Top top marks on the food front, really top marks - and I've been out for a lot of roast dinners!", "My only downside, and it really is a minor one, is the cutlery. This may sound silly but they were using very nice old cutlery, i think old silverware (though i'm not expert). The downside is that it was mightily blunt, making even the most tenderly-cooked of meats more of a pulling match than cutting. ", 'Overally a highly enjoyable experience and I will definitely be returning.']
title: Very enjoyable, would happy dine here again

content: ["Love the idea of this place, clubby, mixing good music with good music. Unfortunately this venue seems to fall short, food and drink while good ends up being a seriously expensive experience, from a number of visits our bill is always way more than we're expecting, and doesn't reflect in the quality of the food and service. The service in our experience is chaotic at best, they always seem to be short of numbers, hence 15 min+ waits not uncommon for service items. ", 'The venue itself is very cool and well designed, although sound quality seems to be an issue, as Band noise drowns out conversation totally (this may be the Banks issue with poor venue speakers, or maybe the acoustics of the venue itself).', 'Plenty of potential here, hopefully feedback will help sharpen this amazing potential venue. ']
title: Huge potential but falling short

answer_text: ['Dear Duncan,', "Thank you very much for your great review! It is so lovely to hear positive feedback from our guests. Please see the link below to an act you might like. Do let me know if you'd like to come and I'll happily make the arrangements for you. I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. ", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt,', 'General manager', 'http://tickets.boisdale.co.uk/pages/events/blues--boogie-woogie-and-beyond--errol-linton-and-his-band/12-11-2015/']
content: ['I was given dinner and concert tickets for my birthday. It was a great night. The food was excellent and Mike Vernon and his Mighty Combo put on a great show. The haggis starter was simply wonderful. One small disappointed was the lack of information about the timing of the show. It would have been helpful to have the details on the tickets. But this is a wonderful location and we will keep an eye out for future blues artiste so we can go back and sample more of the wonderful food.']
title: Blues and Dinner - a great way to celebrate

content: ["Boisdale's Canary Wharf is a stones throw from my place of work so I've been here on a few occasions for the odd social drink and a meal. It always seemed okay and so with an evening dinner with friends to organise I looked into booking a table for 8 people. At the time that I initially looked into this they had several large round tables available but sadly when I finally got confirmation to book they had already gone. What held me back was that certain table locations warrant a different entertainment price which depending on location and act can vary. Entertainment is optional though, but if you choose not to partake you'll be expected to vacate the floor which may mean a rushed meal. So getting to the point we ended up with a straight table for 8 people at a premium of £20pp for a decent act. The table was half way down the restaurant which wasn't that bad, but I wouldn't say it was the most comfortable I've had, with it being slightly cramped.", "As for the meal itself, hmmm! Certain dishes were worth the money, others not, with cost outstripping what you actually got on the plate. I personally think a steak should come with at least some veg and not simply on it's own with veg at an additional cost, a venison curry dish was also met with raised eyebrows, the meat content meagre in our personal view. Other than that most other dishes seemed adequate in quantity, but I thought the presentation of my Haggis main was a little poor. For the overall monetary outlay the meal was simply average, it didn't wow you. Saying that I would go again only because the overall experience of meal, entertainment and service was okay. So as the title says i'll swing with it and give it another go at another time, but i'd recommend it to be a consideration for yourself.", "Just to add, there is no specific dress code, we were smart casual and relaxed formal, but there were also people dressed more glamourously as well as those in jeans and trainers, albeit smart ones. And once the entertainment is in full flow conversation becomes a bit of an issue if you're intent on chatting rather than listening to the music. Oh and they need to learn what a Floater Coffee is, I can't describe what I got."]
title: I'll swing with it...

answer_text: ['Dear Keith,', 'Thank you so much for your review. I am always delighted to receive positive feedback and congratulate the team on their hard work. I hope you will come and visit us again and that I will be able to thank you personally for your kind words. ', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['Went for a Sunday lunch and enjoyed the afternoon immensely. 3 course lunch with drinks was not what you would call cheap but the ambiance, Live Jazz playing in the background, and the food was worth the £220 for 4 bill. Decor fitted the restaurant theme as well some of the menu options. Staff were excellent and helped with menu and drinks choices. A pleasant afternoon .']
title: Light Jazz and a hearty meal

content: ['I always go here with business for drinks before a sumptuous meal, whisky or rum, jazz and then cigars. Food, Alcohol, Wine selection ambiance and over all feeling is great here.']
title: Simply the best business dinner in the wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Sue T,', 'Thank you for your review. I am so sorry to hear we let you down on Sunday. I would very much like to hear more about your lunch. May I ask you to email me so we can discuss the meal. I hope to hear from you soon,', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'General manager', 'gm@boisdale-cw.co.uk']
content: ["Having eaten at Boisdale before, I was looking forward to returning; meeting with a group of friends making us a party of 8. Today's visit was very disappointing. The food was little better than average - having ordered the roast beef and informed it was medium rare or well done, I went for the medium rare. When it arrived if was difficult to cut and very chewy! A pot of roast potatoes came separately with the meal and other vegetables were delivered to the table but without serving spoons. Waiting staff made lots of mistakes and seemed to be inexperienced. A great shame - the venue is lovely and my previous visit had left a completely different memory to that of today."]
title: Disappointing

answer_text: ['Dear Jacqueline,', 'Thank you very much for your lovely review! It is so nice to receive positive feedback from our guests. I do hope you will come and see us again very soon. I would like to welcome you back in person. ', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt']
content: ['So cool! Great restaurant design, food, drinks and of course music. Perfect place for almost any occasion']
title: I think you will enjoy your evening here!

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'It is a pleasure to receive such a great review, thank you. Our team work really hard to provide a great experience for our customers and it is always lovely get positive feedback. I do hope to meet you on your next visit and thank you in person. ', 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt,', 'General manager']
content: ["If you're looking for a great Oyster/Whiskey/Cigar bar, with a fantastic menu and amazing jazz repertoire - then look no further!", 'Boisdale is an amazing gem, snuggled in the high rise buildings of Canary wharf.', "What's not to like about this place! "]
title: Food, Jazz, Cigars and the wall of Whiskey

answer_text: ['Dear Libby,', "Thank you for taking the time to review us. I'm glad your overall experience was positive and sincerely apologise if our service let us down. Please do come back and enjoy our live music on the second floor. The menu you initially booked for is available on our second floor where you can enjoy the live music. Do let me know when you plan to return and I can make the booking for you and ensure you are well looked after. I hope to welcome you back soon,", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'General manager']
content: ['I have been wanting to get up to this place for last couple of weeks. I booked a deal on trip advisor and went to the first floor bar. ', 'On arrival I was given a nice table. It is as lively and had a very casual easy going atmosphere. Some people were dining, some just for drinks, some even just popping in for pudding- so all sorts. ', 'I decided not to pick from the open table menu but instead off their daily two course special. This was great value at £12 - but remember service charge is automatically added. ', 'I had the salmon/ gravelaxe starter, I asked for bread- which came immediately. For main I selected the sausage special of the day.the food was good, good portions- especially the main and proved excellent value for what I thought would be a very expensive place. ', 'There was no jazz when I was there but I would try and return for a jazz night. ', 'I thought the service is as a bit haphazard and certainly slow- at one point I think my main could have been forgotten! ']
title: Worth a outing

content: ['The food here was just ok service was again just ok feel it lacked atmosphere.My burger was very average my friend had one of the home made pies which she said was nice. Generally we found this place over priced especially the drinks']
title: Average Burger

answer_text: ['Dear Mr ODonnell,', "What a lovely review, thank you so much! Have you thought about becoming a member of Boisdale? I'd be very happy to talk about it with you on your next visit. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.", 'Kind regards,', 'Elisabeth Rutt', 'General manager']
content: ['I love Boisdale - all three of them are fantastic. Canary Wharf has a great outside balcony for drinks on a long summer night and a huge bar area. The food is to die for, do not miss the Haggis, the Steaks or the Seafood. Great selection of wine and booze. Amazing waitresses all dressed up in lovely kilts.']
title: Just Stunning

content: ['Spent the evening here after my partner proposed. I would usually find this overpriced environment a little poncey but i had a great night and really enjoyed sampling some of the cigars, whiskey and champagne on the terrace.']
title: Who knew a cigar library could excite me!

content: ['Came here for a birthday dinner and drinks, the service was brilliant and music was great. However the food was so average we were all quite disappointed. The steak had no taste even smothered in peppercorn sauce it had no flavour! Really surprised as Ive always thought boisdale would have a high quality of food. ']
title: Lovely atmosphere but average food

content: ["I came here on a recommendation from a friend, who loves the idea of a Scottish menu. We ate in the restaurant upstairs and had such a fantastic time. As soon as you walk up into the dining room you're presented with a glittering bar, ambient candlelight, and fabulous decor - think tongue-in-cheek taxidermy and portraits dotted around the walls. The waiting staff are all incredibly knowledgable, very helpful, and we loved the kitsch tartan touches to the uniform. Big praise to our waitress Christina who was superb and managed to remember every single cheese on the trolley! (this latter feature is another reason it's a must visit place). We went for a birthday dinner, and got chatting to the table next to us, where a couple were celebrating their thirty year anniversary. When the live music starts it gets even better - definitely a quality place to visit."]
title: Such a fabulous ambience and great staff

content: ['Visited the Oyster Bar & Grill section of this restaurant and was pleasantly surprised. From the name of the place I was expecting an american diner type experience which was not the case at all. I had purchased the steak & lobster deal from Groupon and went with reasonably low expectations as I was told i would not be in the main restaurant section as this would cost an extra £20. However when I arrived, the Bar & Grill was still great. The steak had fantastic flavour and the Lobster was cooked perfectly. Also, I would definitely recommend the sticky toffee pudding! Will be returning 100%']
