We were not disappointed – it was an awesome atmosphere.', 'If I had to find fault, I would say the service was very slow – it was at least an hour before we were served with starters, and we were still waiting for our main course when the Bootleg Beatles arrived on stage at 9.45 p.m. (I wanted to get up and dance!! <smile>.) ', 'Having said that, the restaurant was filled to capacity. The waiters/waitresses were at all times polite and helpful, and in no way did the delay between courses spoil the ambience of the evening.', 'The food really was very very good. Hubby tried haggis for the first time and was pleasantly surprised! The fillet steak I ordered was cooked to perfection and melted in my mouth, and from the conversation around the table, the fillet steak on the bone was even better!', ' ', 'Would definitely recommend and hope I get the chance to re-visit.']
title: Amazing evening

answer_text: ['Dear Huggy27,', 'Thank you very much for your beautiful review. We are delighted to have made your evening so enjoyable. Hopefully we will be able to welcome you back very soon. ', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Boisdale is a fantastic find in the heart of London's Canary Wharf - Views when dining in the restaurant are amazing even more so when night falls and the towering buildings of Canary Wharf are lit up.", 'Menu has a great range of choices and for a luxurious restaurant; prices were definitely reasonable for the great quality of food and setting.', 'My partner and I shared Oysters to start; these were presented lovely with a selection of different accompaniments on offer too.', 'For main I had a whole lobster which for Canary Wharf was a decent price; cooked to perfection and would recommend to any lobster lovers out there. My partner had the pork belly; which he enjoyed very much and said was a great portion size and the taste was fantastic.', 'During the meal a jazz band started playing; really added to the romantic mood and setting overlooking Canary Wharf. ', "The staff were very polite and extremely knowledgeable on the wines and food, all very professional which when paying the prices of Boisdale's is much appreciated and added immensely to the evening.", 'Would recommend to all looking for a romantic evening in London - and for those lovers of Jazz music too!']
title: Fabuolous Food, Service and Views!

answer_text: ['Dear Dan L,', 'Thank you for your review. I am delighted you enjoyed your time with us.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I stopped in here with a few colleagues after meeting nearby. In addition to the standard beer and cocktails, they have good selection of wine and champagne to go with oysters which seems to be their specialty. This a modern on two levels a very lively room on the first floor and a jazz room upstairs with live music. This is good alternative if you are tired of the pubs and are look ok for something different.']
title: Good bar on Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Matt S,', 'Thank you so much for your review. I am delighted you enjoyed your evening to such an extent. We regularly have great special offers available online so do look for them and hopefully you will be able to visit many more times. ', 'Warmest regards,']
content: ["After reading reviews on here I was a little apprehensive.....I am so pleased that I decided to make up my own mind. Staff, second to none, there when you needed them but not in your face. Food, literally some of the best food I have tasted, cooked to perfection. Entertainment ( The Black Hat Band ), lets just say that I will be tracking them down again, great mix of songs, knew how to get the crowd involved, pitch perfect. Venue, a beautiful buzz about it....only wish that I could afford to go there on a regular basis. All in all, just a fabulous night that I don't think could of been improved on in any way. Well done The Boisdale !!"]
title: WOW !!

answer_text: ['Dear Alan J,', 'Thank you for your kind review. I am pleased you had a great evening. I have passed your comments onto our Head Chef and he is obviously disappointed to read about your thoughts on the fries. Hopefully next time we can deliver even better!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Walked in last minute for a table around 6.30pm, welcomed by a great host and given a perfectly acceptable table. Service was excellent, I can highly recommend the beef carpaccio and fillet steak on the bone. Béarnaise was out of this world, one of the best I have ever had... As for French fries... Hmmm, average at best, without doubt were bought in and probably frozen... For 30 quid, I expect home made fries. Everything else was great, would totally recommend ', ' ']
title: Last minute surprise

answer_text: ['Dear V P,', 'I am delighted you stumbled upon us and we were able to look after you. Remember we are here all year round and hope to see you again soon. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['All I knew was that we were going out to find some food - so what a treat this was! Delicious menu selection, attentive & charming staff, terrific music from the "Rat Pack". Tribute band.Table by the window looking out on a square filled with twinkling Christmas trees - a much-needed evening for two during the frantic run-up to Christmas.']
title: Great start to Christmas

answer_text: ['Dear AinZweiDrei,', 'The Christmas show is a live sensation so not necessarily ideal for a calm conversation as you rightly point out, however for the remainder of the year the music from Monday to Thursday is much more accommodating with Fridays & Saturdays again being full shows to replace the need of leaving to see a theatre play or musical. Hopefully we will see you again soon. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Very nice experience, first time I tried Haggis and it was delicious. Splendid selection of wines, professional and friendly service. A bit pricier than other restaurants around the corner that are also good. Live Jazz band could be somewhat problematic past 21:00 if you'd like to have a lively conversation, otherwise a good opportunity to enjoy jazz/blues and even dance by it. "]
title: Nice staff, food, music

answer_text: ['Dear LataV,', 'Thank you for taking the time to review us. I was sorry to hear we did not have your preferred tipple in stock. To put just a little perspective on it I wish we had as much whisky however it is more around the 680 mark, give or take, depending on the availability of some whiskies as well as our ability to lay our hands on vintage varietals. Our Bar manager works tirelessly to keep the bar stocked & we are looking into systems to always have an absolutely accurate list at hand, however it has happened very few times that a particular whisky has sold out on the night. Your comments regarding the team’s attentiveness have been taken into consideration and we do consistently focus on customer service. If we did not live up to our own expectations on the evening I sincerely apologise. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['This is a 2 storey venue with dining,whiskey rooms, cigar rooms and live music. We had visited the venue to experience the whiskey room and dine as well with family. We were very impressed with the ambience and whiskey collection, which they claim is over 3000 varieties and have every single one of the listed items. However very surprised when the very first one ordered i.e a 1999 edition of Knockando was not available and no suggestions were also provided for a alternative.Also the time taken for someone to take the order and the time between taking the order to getting it to the table is very long. We also observed the stewards discussing between them as to who will serve which table. In the process there seemed to be a delay in attending to guests.']
title: Great Place, but disappointing experience

answer_text: ['Dear DiscerningDiner77', 'Thank you for your review. I was irked to hear you did not rate us as highly as hoped however hope you give us one more try, perhaps during the evenings when we do have plenty of character and atmosphere. We even have a few defectors from the Victoria site coming over to us…', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Good solid restaurant for lunch in the middle of the Canary Wharf complex.', 'The menu is sound, but uninspiring, with a Scottish flavour.... Lots of steaks, haggis (good with a noggin of whisky....), salmon etc..', 'A little expensive for what you get though.']
title: Good for a hearty lunch, but lacks character of the sister restaurant in Victoria

answer_text: ['Dear Carlosthegreat1', 'Thank you for your very kind review. I am pleased that you have enjoyed your evening with us and look forward to welcoming you again and again. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Yes it's pricey, but like the old saying you get what you pay for! ", 'The food is stunning, the wine is fantastic and the service is above and beyond! ', 'I have visited numerous times and each time I have had the same fantastic experience. Our Latest was to watch the Frank Sinatra and rat pack experience.... Incredible! ', 'Honestly give it a go you will not regret it. ']
title: If you appreciate great food, atmosphere and service and don't mind paying for it then look no further

answer_text: ['Dear Barry B,', 'I am delighted we were able to surprise you. We look forward to your return. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['This is probably one of th best places to eat in the Wharf, more expensive than some but beats Plateau hands down.', 'Good steaks, very quickly served, tastes sides which complemented the main course flowed by some great deserts ', 'Fitting way to mark the leaving of a member of the team before he relocates to New York', 'I will return']
title: Surprisingly good in Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Nigel P,', 'I am irked reading your comments (there is nothing like a bit of healthy competition between us & a sister restaurant) and hope to welcoming you back next time and getting it right. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Having enjoyed Boisdale Belgravia I went along to the outpost in Canary Wharf with high hopes. And, to be fair, we had a good night out, excellent band and lively atmosphere. It's just that, well, it's not as classy as Belgravia, and both the food and service were down a notch on what you might expect, particularly given the price. I will probably give it another chance, but I wouldn't rush back."]
title: Good atmosphere, but...

answer_text: ['Dear Tord E,', 'I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the Si Cranstoun night, it really was amazing. We take great care in being competitively priced and monitor our prices very closely. It is entirely possible to dine with us for under £30 per person, however dry-aged steaks are a little dearer, but I agree; totally worth it. We hope to welcome you again soon. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['So good!', 'We went mainly to see Si Cranstoun. ', 'But the dinner itself was a wonderful experience. ', 'Very nice atmosphere, friendly and service minded staff. ', 'And the steak was absolutely fantastic. ', 'As someone said. ', 'You get what you pay for. ', 'And it was worth it!']
title: Most expensive restaurant night in years, but...

answer_text: ['Dear mary b,', 'I am thrilled by your review & the whole team is proud of your comments. Thank you! Ernest will also receive a little present, a tradition we have to reward the team for being mentioned in despatches.', 'We all look forward to seeing you again soon. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["The food, service and ambience were excellent. Yes it's expensive but a very good experience. Service was a little slow between courses but it didn't detract from the overall impression of a well run, professional enterprise.", 'We enjoyed the act and noted in the programme the many more interesting acts coming up.', 'Earnest who ran the whisky bar was very good and informative. and seems like a man who enjoys his job!', 'Will return asap.']
title: Great atmosphere

answer_text: ['Dear Andy N,', 'I was disappointed to hear you felt that both starter and dessert did not live up to standards we set ourselves, however all the more pleased you enjoyed everything else that evening. How good was Midge Ure? Hopefully we will see you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Went there to see Midge Ure on a friday evening which was very good.The venue is very attractive and situated in Canary Wharf.The service was very good the only gripe was being dissapointed with the starters and deserts that we had,very bland and expensive for what they were.The saving grace was the main course which was excellant.Had a very good wine list and overall a very good evening.']
title: Nice venue

answer_text: ['Dear Steve B,', 'I was irked to read that we had not gotten you cooking temperature for the steak right and have passed on your comments to our Head Chef for him to keep and extra eye on! However I am comforted that the waitress took action to ensure your satisfaction on the evening and thank you for letting us know on the night! ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I've been here quite a few times now and it's always great. Last night was no exception. When the three of us arrived around 9.30pm the live band was slowing down and it there weren't too many people left so the atmosphere wasn't as buoyant as hoped. Typical Monday night. However, the waitress for our table was excellent (and I'm really sorry that I can't remember her name), and more than made up for it. She was bright, bubbly, fun, informative and professional. The only niggle I had (which normally would have been much more annoying) was that my steak was over cooked. I normally have rare but last time here rare was blue. So this time I went medium rare but it came out well over. Come on Chef, please sort it out - Goodman is proving more reliable for a well cooked steak (and the place was almost empty)! Luckily your dressed crab was superb and the mushroom sauce was delicious. I made a brief comment about the steak (and it really wasn't an issue) and the waitress offered free desert. This was very kind and more than expected. We didn't take it as we had to leave but thanks for the offer. I'll certainly be back - for a great night out Boisdales is very reliable!"]
title: Another great night - almost perfect

answer_text: ['Dear disco123,', 'Thank you for your kind review. I am delighted you enjoy spending your time with us! ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I had another good lunch here this week. I really like the venue , it is perfect for formal or informal business meetings , the food is good and bar & grill menu offers everything I need. I usually have steak but this time round the fish and chips were pretty good. The service is prompt and efficient. The Boisdale brand is one I like and the style and setting make for an above average working lunch.']
title: Always excellent

answer_text: ['Dear stockdale83,', 'Thank you for your review & I apologise once again that your steak took more than the usual time to arrive. We are constantly working on improving ourselves and look to minimise errors, so hopefully there will not be a recurrence. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Went to Boisdale for lunch in Canary Wharf and the food was great. The rib eye was cooked to perfection, and the chunky chips were also of very good quality. Had the eight petit fours as dessert which ended a very nice lunch. Two negative points though: this restaurant is pretty expensive and my main took 45 minutes to arrive after ordering, which is extremely long.']
title: Very good steak place

answer_text: ['Dear TDMB,', 'I am pleased you enjoyed your evening out with us and that you enjoyed yourself. I have spoken to the bar manager regarding your comments on the whisky list & he confirmed that we had difficulties sourcing a few tipples pre-Christmas, however this had now been thoroughly resolved & I am pleased the team took remedial action. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["We were invited here by friends who'd been before and it was an excellent night out. We ate upstairs and listened to the Jazz band on a Thursday evening and it was great - busy without being too crowded - though I'd be happy to go when it was a bit busier and people were dancing. Ambience in the Oyster Bar downstairs and in the restaurant upstairs both excellent. All wood panelling and tartan carpets. Very cosy - you feel like you've stepped into a Highland retreat. Great service and amazing food - though not at all cheap! One downside was that, despite their extensive whisky collection, they didn't have either of the ones that my partner asked for. When the second one failed they did upgrade him to the next level up for no extra cost, so it wasn't all bad - but just a bit surprising given it's one of their main features. All in all I'd definitely recommend for a nice evening out once in a while."]
title: A great evening out

answer_text: ['Dear Will M,', 'I was pleased to read that you have enjoyed your evening with us. I hope to welcome you again soon. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Visited with my wife and son', 'Great atmosphere live music upstairs', 'Good good, not fancy but very nice', 'Excellent service friendly a place for something nice to eat, but not over the top']
title: Excellent

answer_text: ['Dear Eugene1958,', 'I was irked to read you did not thoroughly enjoy your meal with us. Since then we have invested in new table feet that level themselves. The bone marrow butter is served much like a garlic butter so it can slowly melt over the steak, however we have clarified this on the menu to avoid recurrence. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Decided to opt for a bit of a treat. Ordered the Rib Eye (MEDIUM) with mash and mushrooms and bone marrow sauce. I would suggest medium well in future for those who want medium. The bone marrow sauce was a lump on the steak so not quite sure about that. Service was attentive, take was a bit shaky and sawing through some of the meat caused the candle to fall over but it went out luckily. Music was very good and non intrusive. All in all a good night but not spectacular. ']
title: Good Food and Ambiance

answer_text: ['Dear GillMargo,', 'Thank you for taking the time to review us. I am thrilled you had such a good time & even a tiny little bit pleased your concert was cancelled. Next time you visit please let us know so we can say thank you personally. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["My husband and I were due to go to the O2 to see Ennio Morricone however Ennio had to cancel and we had booked a non cancellation hotel room so still had to go to London! I searched the internet to see what was on that night in Canary Wharf and came across 'Christmas with Frank and Dean' at Boisdales - we are both huge Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin fans so thought we would give it a try, boy am I glad we did. As soon as you walk into Boisdales you feel special, the restaurant is amazing and we were lucky enough to have a table right next to the entertainment. We booked our meal for 7pm, I had the terrine with Foie Gras to start with, I must say I was not impressed with that, husband had oysters which were extremely good. For main course I had the chicken dish which was gorgeous and husband had the fillet steak which was one of the best he'd eaten. Service was outstanding, the waiter was so attentive even taking our wine down to the cigar lounge for us so hubby could relax with a nice cigar before the entertainment started, the cigar bar is fantastic. The entertainment was outstanding, brilliant entertainers and a lot of people ended up dancing! We are even talking about going again next year. If you want a really good night out, great food and entertainment this is certainly the place to go."]
title: Great atmosphere, good food and awesome entertainment

answer_text: ['Dear Karolina K,', 'Thank you so much for your review. I was delighted to have been able to welcome you so often and look to the next time you visit. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I loved their lobster linguine that they had on the menu last year. I was a regular there, loved to go there and just sit, with a book or just watching people passing by. they have an amazing cigar room. As a woman I love cigars and I'm going to try the room soon ;-) the staff are great(management is always present on the floor, but not just standing and talking, they work like crazy) atmosphere is amazing (been on both floors and had a romantic dinner with my boyfriend on both floors) love, love , love boisdale. "]
title: I absolutely adore this place.

answer_text: ['Dear Nortsat46,', 'I was pleased to hear you enjoyed your evening with us. Hopefully we are able to welcome you back in the near future.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['We had a very nice dinner here, mid week. Rabbit terrine and mackerel pate to start. We both had the grouse with a matched glass of Pinot Noir for main course. Nice puddings too. ', 'Very nice wine list, with a range of prices. Good service.', 'We had a table at the front (extra cost worthwhile if you want a good view of the musicians) and enjoyed the jazz.', 'Efficient staff organised a cab home for us.', 'It was a very nice evening.']
title: Very nice evening

answer_text: ['Dear stephenmaull,', 'I can only say thank you for your review & hope to welcome you again soon. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["This place was fantastic the food is totally great can't find any falt and the Jazz band are terrific really top class evening "]
title: Fantastic

answer_text: ['Dear fashionbabee,', 'Thank you for your review. I am delighted you enjoyed your evening. I hope to see you soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Cocktails are amazing! Barstaff also take requests as I wanted a French Martini but that is not on the menu but they made me something comparable on request! Very accommodating! We only had bar snacks (calamari and a few other things) but they were really really good so will definitely try dinner! Great view of the fountain from the balcony!']
title: cocktails and snacks

content: ['This restaurant was listed as the top place to go in Canary Wharf on several of the local web sites. It is located immediately upon entry into the Cabot Place mall. The restaurant has two floors, the main floor is for casual dining, with primarily the same food, but in a more informal setting.', 'The upper floor is what the service person called "fine dining," and is where the Live Jazz stage is located. We wanted to relax and have a really good meal, so opted for the upper floor. We did not have reservations, but they seated us promptly with a great view of the stage. It all started out very positively.', 'Our server came to take our order, we ordered a Shrimp Cocktail appetizer for each of us and the 7 oz. Filet Steak. We settled in for our perfect meal. The upper floor has great atmosphere and was very busy with what looked to be mostly business men and women. The Jazz was outstanding and they have a different group every night with a brochure of who is coming in the weeks ahead.', 'We got our Shrimp and finished it off, but it appeared that our server once he took the order decided that we were no longer important enough to check back with us, so was left alone for the remainder of the night to flag down other servers and fend for ourselves.', 'Additionally, there were several couples and a large table of diners who came in after us and they all got their meals prior to us getting ours. We wondered why and asked what happened to our food. After about an hour, our food showed up and the steaks were cool, overcooked and generally not very pleasant. Our waiter still had not even thought to look at us or come and ask if all was well, he was too busy taking care of what appeared to be the more important guests.', 'During our wait time, we flagged down several other servers and staff to ask about more water, bread, butter, etc., they helped but we did not get the impression that it was willingly.', 'At the end of the meal, we spoke with the Concierge and explained out frustration. I explained that there were several other diners who came after us and received their dinner either before or just before we received ours. At first he blamed us and said our meal was so very late due to the fact that my friend had ordered his steak well-done, and that if we had ordered an appetizer, it would have spaced the timing so that the steak would be cooked perfectly. After several minutes of discussion on the falsity of that premise and telling him that we did order an appetizer, he recanted and said "that is unacceptable then, I will have to talk with the Chef."', "I think this is one of the nicer places in Canary Wharf, with the Jazz, Cigar Bar and huge Whisky offering, it is perfect for an after work Business gathering to have a few drinks and maybe enjoy a cigar, if that is your thing. I would hesitate to go there and expect a perfect meal experience though, if the Chef can't handle a simple steak I would hesitate to see what he does with the other items on the menu.", 'I must also say that my friend and I, are of a particular ethnicity, I am not sure that that had anything to do with it, but it sure crossed our minds several times during the night, considering we were the only two there of that persuasion. It was not a pleasant feeling and one we would not have thought we would feel in 21st century London.', 'Go, enjoy the Jazz, it was great, have one of the Whiskey choices and at least see what the place looks like, I think it is worth it, and, hopefully, you will get better treatment than we did.']
title: Great Atmosphere, Excellent Live Jazz, Service and Food Not so Great

answer_text: ['Dear Helvin3,', 'Thank you for your review. A lot of the produce on our menu hails from Scotland, but there are a lot of British ingredients so I hope we did not confuse too much. I was glad to read the team rectified the error quickly. Hopefully we will see you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['We were absolutely intrigued by the idea of a Scottish restaurant which is why we decided to come here.', 'It was a bit pricey for me personally but was good food overall - and REALLY great house red wine.', 'They overcooked my friends steak but they took it back and replaced it without any fuss, and even gave her a free glass of wine - so great service!']
title: Maybe not very Scottish food-wise, but otherwise great!

answer_text: ['Dear mich&co,', 'I am very pleased you had such a great night and we were able to accommodate you on such short notice. I was sorry to hear the steaks were overcooked and a few menu items had run out; definitely not a normal occurrence! Hopefully we are able to welcome you again soon and get everything right.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["We were recommence to Boisdale at Canary Wharf by the receptionist in our hotel and luckily managed to get a late reservation on a Friday night even though we were a party of eight. It was a great find as we had a fabulous night and the live band Oomph were amazing. Food was mostly perfect, my haggis starter was incredible, oysters were stunning, but both mine and my husband's fillet steaks were over done, and they had by then randomly run out of the mashed potato side dish that I ordered. This aside the whole experience was brilliant and we ate, drank, danced and laughed in a restaurant with a fun, lively atmosphere. We would return in a heartbeat!!"]
title: Great find!! But what's it called again??

answer_text: ['Dear Kitto211064', 'We are thrilled you enjoyed our traditional Sunday Roast Lunch. Hopefully we will be able to welcome you during the week for soothing jazz evenings at the Whisky Bar.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Atmosphere was tranquil with three piece Jazz band playing. Enough space between tables so as not to be disturbed by other guests. Staff were pleasant and polite, just appearing as required. We started with a Blood Mary, just perfect. Food was extremely tasty. We had smoked salmon pate followed by Aberdeen beef roast dinner with all the trimmings. Creme caramel for dessert was delicious. Certainly recommend for a special Sunday out.']
title: Excellent Sunday lunch

answer_text: ['Dear Camillymilly1', 'I am thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful time. We hope to welcome you again and again!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I've been to Boisdale's on a number of occasions, mainly with clients for both drinks and dinner - the staff are always excellent and the Bar Manager is very attentive. We also went for a wine tasting evening and it was great. They are very accommodating to any fussy guests ", 'Worth the money and would definitely recommend and come back again']
title: Excellent steak, and brilliant service

answer_text: ['Dear Ibadanboy,', 'I am delighted to hear we have become our local jazz venue and thank you for your review. Do not forget to visit our website to check out all the amazing upcoming bands & events.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Boisdale Canary Wharf is an excellent.long awaited addition to the entertainment & dining options in Canary Wharf/ Isle of Dogs neighbourhood. Overlooking Cabot Square in a space that has multiple floors, this venue is ideal for business functions, private parties, romantic dinners - and the list could go on & on. That live jazz music played here every night is simply awesome. No we have a real option to the Central London venues (Ronnie Scott's, Jazz Cafe, Barbican, etc). Better yet, this place serves up excellent food (we had superb steaks last night, washed down with a nice bottle of Malbec. Yolanda Brown was on last night and she put on a splendid performance. Bosidale is a great place, the restaurant area is spacious, the decor is nice and service is OK. Very highly recommended."]
title: My local jazz club - Wonderful

answer_text: ['Dear netty120', 'Thank you for choosing us to celebrate with. I apologise if the team did not respond to your comment in the way you had hoped however I am thrilled you enjoyed everything else about your evening.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Had a fantastic evening with friends', 'Great food and entertainment from jason isaacs and his ambassadors of swing. From starters to desserts the food was delicious amazing steaks the cheese board looked even better but we were to full to have any , I did ask them to move the cheese trolley as the stinking bishop was overpowering and right next to me, they just covered it with a dome but it still bothered me I did ask again but it was only removed later in the evening during the entertainment this reflects in my score for service otherwise a almost perfect evening will definitely be back ']
title: Birthday celebration

answer_text: ['Dear DeepJet', 'I am delighted to hear you enjoy being looked after by Filipe. He has a little present waiting for him; something we do for our team when they are mentioned in despatches! Until the next time…', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Food is always great. Great freshly made dishes served in a timely manner.', 'Worldclass selection of Cuban Cigars, available to purchase as single cigars or as a box.', 'The most impressive aspect of the establishment is the service & attention to detail. The staff all seem happy in their work & this reflects in the service they provide their clientele. One member of staff in particular "Philip" cannot rate his service highly enough...']
title: Absolutely Faultless...

answer_text: ['Dear Tony K,', 'Thank you for your very kind review. I am thrilled you enjoyed yourself. As for the opening times: They may change once it is easier to travel westbound once the tube runs longer…', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["3 couples out for my birthday celebrations, and I must say paying the little extra for the better table was well worth it. Food was good all round, and the entertainment (black hat band) were awesome. Shame it didn't stay open a little later !"]
title: Food, Fun and Entertainment

answer_text: ['Dear menelik5,', 'Thank you for your feedback, though I was irked that you did not rate our fabulous Scottish lobsters. They are indeed dearer than the American counterparts and prices have been rising drastically the past few years. I can only apologise if yours was small and hope that you give us the opportunity to make amends. Hopefully until next time', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['I been in this nice old-fashion Scottish Restaurant with my partner and her family. The place is quite nice and warm, as a Chef with Michelin star background I can tell the food is good and simple.', 'The only bad note of this evening was my Main Course. I ordered a whole Scottish Lobster on the grill, on the Menu priced for £37,50.', 'When the main course arrived, I was Shocked!!!!!! The plate was full of watercress salad and I had a very tiny small Lobster on the shell. For almost £40 I just had two bites, the Lobster was tasty but for my point of view really small for a Main Course. Imagine if I was ordering half Lobster!!!!', 'If you go at many Michelin & Rosette Restaurants in London for less of that price you can have as Main Course a Juicy Lobster Tail with the Claws with an impeccable presentation.', 'I left the Restaurant very Disappointed!!!!']
title: Do not go for the Lobster, I was shocked.

answer_text: ['Dear Gingabarn,', 'Thank you for your review. I am delighted you had a great evening!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Went to Boisdale for dinner with friends. Once again great food & excellent jazz. The sirloin on the none was superb. Highly recommend, if a little pricey. ', ' ']
title: Great food & Jazz

answer_text: ['Dear Conrad c,', 'Thanks for your review. I am delighted you enjoyed the dessert. I am disappointed that you felt our whiskies were overpriced as we try hard to make them competitive and keep the prices down, especially for the slightly older stuff that tends to increase in price by the month. We operate a standard 12.5% service charge which is discretionary. The £9.00 ‘cover charge’ would have been the music ticket which must be purchased in order to stay for the performance on the second floor, and is purely designed to cover the cost of the performing artist. I hope this clarifies the situation.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['The last time I was here with with office folks, the cheque was picked up by my boss. This time I was here for some dessert and whiskey post dinner. The Choc fudge pudding was just wonderful but the remaining items on the menu were not that appealing. The Whiskey was over priced and the service charges were really high too. Overall i would say go here only if you want to impress someone. There was even a cover charge of 9 pounds on a Thursday night!! ', ' ']
title: Expensive but worth it

answer_text: ['Dear Jan P,', 'Thank you for choosing us to celebrate. I am thrilled you had such a wonderful time. We all look forward to welcoming you back.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Four of us went to celebrate a birthday. Have heard only very good things for other friends that had visited before, and I must say it lived right up to expectations. Loved the feel and looked of the placed real old school, felt like being in an 1920/1930's supper club. The food was excellent (only small gripe was that they bought the courses out to quickly) but think this was maybe because once the singer started doing his thing, the whole place was up and dancing which I guess made it difficult to navigate the restaurant with trays of food. Would like to add there was the most extensive and fabulous cocktail list (Yes I tried one or two) and the biggest selection of whiskeys I have ever seen. Absolutely loved the place in every way and will 100% be going back, hopefully very early next year. Great night, great food, great booze, great music, great vibe."]
title: Birthday Celebration

answer_text: ['Dear Kristina-NT,', 'Thank you for your kind review. It is our pleasure to look after your manager, as it is to look after you!', 'We hope to see you again soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I always book a table in this restaurant for my manager. And Andrius is very nice always helping he is always remember the names and service just excellent!', 'Kristina']
title: Best for Businnes meal

answer_text: ['Dear James E,', 'Thanks for your review. We try to keep the menu small so we can change a little more often and we can keep the produce seasonal. I am delighted you enjoyed your visit.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Excellent food (albeit limited choice) and super wine (albeit too much choice!). Service and band A+', ' ']
title: Pricey But Superb

answer_text: ['Dear Jen2013717,', 'Thank you for your wonderful review. I am pleased to hear the team looked after you so well! I hope to see you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Had set Sunday lunch with large group of friends. Price includes wine with meal and a glass of sparkling rose on arrival - that was served ice cold in a perfect glass that actually meant it didn't matter it wasn't champagne. Fantastic.value. Jazz, great food,service and free flowing wine. Recommend the beef Organised before as 20 of us seated in lovely room connecting to main dining room. Groups department couldn't do enough for us. The staff stood out as exceptionally ", "We'll trained Everyone said they would go back. An afternoon to remember."]
title: Faultless

answer_text: ['Dear Limey91,', 'You will be pleased to hear the two course menu is now priced at £11.95 and is available Monday to Saturday on the first floor Bar & Grill.', 'We hope to welcome you again soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Food was amazing value, 2 courses for £13.95 (dined there on a Monday evening)', 'The Cigar library is fantastic, staff very knowledgeable and the Whiskey menu is substantial. ', 'Will be going again!']
title: Lovely place to eat and chill out

answer_text: ['Dear pwd1960,', 'I was delighted to read you had such a great time. I am sure the team look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['We ended up in the brasserie below the main restaurant.', 'Met by a wonderful (manageress we think) pretty lady with blonde hair.', 'Excellent service and value for money. ', 'The two course menu and the extra for the rib eye well worth the £8.00.', 'Food was fantastic as was service.', 'We will be back and thank you young lady for looking after us.', 'The couple from Scotland.']
title: Casual dinner after movies.

answer_text: ['Dear Maggi49,', 'Thank you for your review. I am delighted you enjoyed your evening. If you are looking for a more casual dining experience why don’t you try our first floor Bar & Grill?', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Overall a very enjoyable lunch with friends - great views, friendly and helpful staff, very reasonably priced and acceptable house wine (the wine list did read like a chapter of the New Testament - ridiculously huge) food prices Ok but once you tacked on vegetables, the bill did seem over the top. Would love to return but next time would search out the deals!!!']
title: Table with a view

answer_text: ['Dear Kyp K', 'I am delighted you enjoyed you Sunday lunch and hope to welcome you again in the near future. Bear in mind Sunday lunches are very popular during the winter months so please do book in advance to avoid disappointment.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['8 people for a Birthday Lunch on a Sunday.', 'The Staff and service was excellent from start to finish. We had the fixed price lunch with wine at £45 per person. We we offered a glass of pink sparkling wine on arrival at out Table. There was live Jazz music playing in the background. My starter of prawns with boiled ekk was fine but nothing special. The Roast Beef and Potatoes was excellent.', 'Then a quick visit to the outside area for a smoke and break as we were all very full at that stage.', 'Then back upstairs to the restaurant for our desert. I had Apple crumble and ice cream which was very good.', 'Finally back downstairs for a cigar smoke and coffees on the terrace. We were there from 12.30 to 4.00pm. The restaurant is not full on a Sunday so you are not rushed and the service is very good.', 'I will be going again and think its a great place for Sunday lunch especially for smokers.']
title: Great Birthday Lunch

answer_text: ['Dear Tokencollector,', 'I am so pleased you enjoyed your time with Ernest at the bar. He was really delighted to guide you talk with you and was very impressed with your knowledge. Indeed we too look forward hopefully welcoming you back.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ["Saw this listed as one of London's top whisky bars. After checking their list online, I saw that I could knock off a tough one from Ian Buxton's original 101 Whisky's book. I was alone at the bar and received wonderful service. The selection of drams is phenomenal and the prices are reasonable relative to any I've seen in the world (perhaps the best). That's not to say they are inexpensive, but they are a great value relative to most other Whisky/Whiskey bar's I've visited.", "I enjoyed a tour of the bar with small tastings of a number of whiskies beyond those I ordered, The sommelier is very knowledgeable and has a real passion for his craft. Given the chance, I'll definitely return here again!"]
title: Awsome Whsky Bar!

answer_text: ['Dear TripAdvisor Member,', 'I was sorry to read that you were not aware of the music charges. We work very hard to ensure we communicate our music charges clearly to all customers. Should this have not been the case is apologise profusely and am happy to hear the team reacted on the night. That said the music tickets are not serviceable and our system does not allow service to be added to music tickets. ', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Great food good service , very dark ', 'Excellent jazz band , we went for a family birthday , be careful when paying the bill they tried to charge for music £7.50p x 7 = £52.50 plus service charge % on the music again total rip-off , be fair after querying the service charges and the music They removed by charges . Left us all with a bitter taste ']
title: Music Charges ????

answer_text: ['Dear Afoxa,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write. I was pleased to read you enjoyed your steak and I have passed your comment regarding the sausages & spinach also onto our chef. That said I am delighted you enjoyed the remainder of your evening with us and hope to see you soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['My husband and I went here for a late night, 10 PM, dinner. I had a very nice filet cooked perfectly and my husband had sausage which he said was just okay. He ordered cream spinach which took two tries but was good when it arrived. I had wanted a Pink Cadillac cocktail which the bartender was not familiar with but he came to our table and asked what was in it. I googled it and he went and made it. Very impressive to take the time to do that. The other plus was the band. This is a Jazz place. The music was great with very talented group playing and singing. I top the meal off with a very yummy Sticky pudding, warm and tasty. So I your looking for a late night outing near Greenwich this is the place. Near the tube and we felt very safe walking at night. Enjoy']
title: Great Late Night

answer_text: ['Dear ian_the_bear,', 'Thank you for writing your review. I was sorry to hear you did not enjoy your visit thoroughly. I would be grateful if you would contact me directly via falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk to discuss your evening in more detail.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['This was our 3rd visit but the service was attrocious on this occasion - a Friday night.', "Although the main course was served promptly, we waited over 1/2 hour for the waiter to notice we were ready for the dessert menu. Ultimately our waiter didn't come and we had to summon someone else instead as he just kept walking past without looking towards us. ", "As we'd paid £20 per head music charge in advance, we didn't expect to be seated at a table right next to the bar. Once the music started, our enjoyment was spoilt by the constant drone of people standing at the bar talking increasing loudly to make themsleves heard above the music. All the seats further back were empty - why let them stand right next to diners and spoil their enjoyment?", 'When the waiter tendered the bill, we objected to paying for service and when asked if there was anything wrong with the food, we told him it was because the service was poor.', "He didn't apologise - he just said he was busy. Ah OK, that's alright then - when a place gets busy, you can expect poor service - but they still put service on the bill, hoping you'll just pay it?", "Get more staff it it's busy, surely?", 'Advice - ', '1 - Check table allocation if paying for music in advance.', '2 - Avoid on busy nights.']
title: Generally good but disappointing this time

answer_text: ['Dear Sally H,', 'I am pleased you had a great night and thank you for choosing us to celebrate. I hope to welcome you again in the future.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Enjoyed a really nice evening here. Food was great as were the staff and they even treated our birthday girl to her favourite pudding.']
title: Great night out

answer_text: ['Dear Cheryl V,', 'I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your night and look forward to welcoming you again in the future. If you contact me directly under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk I would be happy to assist.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Service was lovely , not pretensious and food was tasty. meat dishers are mouthwatering and wine selection is very good with reasonable price. Highly recommended this restaurant. My friend and I agreed we would bring our partners along our next visit.']
title: First visit wont be last

answer_text: ['Dear Paul G,', 'Thank you for choosing us time after time. I am pleased you enjoyed the food and I have passed your comment son to the chef who is needless to say happy. I hope to see you soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Love this restaurant. Every time I have been the steak has been cooked to perfection. The burger is excellent too and the service has been great. The added bonus is the whiskys with over 500 to choose from.']
title: Great restaurant

answer_text: ['Dear Pochums,', 'Thank you for your feedback. I am delighted you visit us so often and have found the service & food previously great. I was disappointed to read that the service has not lived up to our expectations on this occasion. We work very hard to ensure you have a great time every time our customers visit so reading of your experience will make a difference for the better.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Boisdale has always been a solid favorite of mine. Just based on FB check-in's alone I've been there 93 times (and that's only when I remember to check-in!). On this occasion I had friends over from the US and I wanted them to try haggis (and my favorite bar in the wharf).", 'As always, the food was amazing! Since we only wanted drinks and bar snacks we sat at the grill. The spicy scotch quails eggs are a small mouthful of heaven. The crackling is yum and the haggis is great. ', 'The service, however, was SO disappointing! After I had talked this place up to my friends, I was actually embarrassed with the service we received. ', 'First of all we asked for the haggis starter which is no longer on the menu in the grill but they have always been happy to serve it to us downstairs. After much fuss we eventually convinced the manager to sell it to us. Then after the other snacks and drinks were ordered we were met with surprise at how little we were ordering! How ridiculous!!! Then to add insult to injury, we were asked for a credit card before the food and drinks were served! Just absurd!!!', "I'm sure I will be back to Boisdale as this was only 1 out of over 100 visits where the experience has been so terrible. But I really hope they do some sort of review to make sure this does not become the norm."]
title: Still great food but awful service

answer_text: ['Dear EastLondonKiwi,', 'Thank you for choosing us to celebrate you special event. I am delighted you enjoyed you fantastic Sunday Lunch offer. Next time you return, let us know so we can make sure to go easy on the wine for you, I would not want you to miss out again. ', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['My wife took me here for a birthday lunch.', 'We had a beautiful view in a window seat out over Cabot Square. A 3 peace Jazz band played on the main stage which was some distance from the tables. This meant music wafted through the large space without drowning out any possible conversation my wife and I were engaged in. It reminded me of something out of a 1950s gangsta movie, it felt very posh.', 'We chose to take up the offer of the Sunday lunch special. 3 courses and loads of free wine (listed as unlimited on the menu) for a set price.', 'I started with the Beef Carpaccio, I then moved to the roast ribs lunch, then on to the sticky toffee pudding. Everything was well presented and lovely. I was a bit surprised by the rib offering when it arrived as it looked more like slices of beef than the rack of ribs I was expecting.', 'The staff are great, and very attentive. They even sent my pudding out with Happy Birthday written around the edge of the plate in chocolate, and a small candle stuck in my pud. We also got an extra glass of champagne each.', 'The place has a huge collection of whiskeys and cigars. And had it not been for the special plying us with such a large quantity of wine, we would have indulged in a few drams.', 'This is certainly a restaurant I will keep the number of, and I can see myself returning for a go that the selection of whiskeys.']
title: Birthday delight

answer_text: ['Dear Tanya-N-London', 'Thank your for your review and for converting to Haggis! The outside area is not strictly for members, merely divided and one area is exclusive to our members so we can ensure some spaces for them, but we could not possibly not share our fabulous terrace with everyone! Visit our website for great upcoming acts; for example the magnificent Midge Ure is visiting us for his only London date!', 'I hope to welcome you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I've been here a few times for drinks after work with colleagues, and it's a great bar with a sophisticated feel. Service is great, and I have to say I've had some of the best chips in this bar! I've also tried the haggis (not my usual choice of snack!) and it's been great!", "There's an outside balcony area for drinks and food (which I believe is for members only), and you get given blankets when it's cold.", 'It tends to be less busy here than some of the other bars in Canary Wharf (this is a few more minutes walk from the Jubilee Line station but close to the DLR station), which is always a nice if you want more of a relaxing drink.', "I haven't myself been here for any of the jazz performances but I've heard they're brilliant"]
title: Sophisticated Bar

answer_text: ['Thank you Raj C.', 'I am pleased to hear Filipe looks after you so well. As a thank you to him, courtesy of your review, Filipe will have a bottle of Boisdale 1er Cru champagne to collect; a gift to all members of staff that get mentioned in despatches. We all look forward to welcoming you back again soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['once again I took some guests here and they cant stop raving about it. Excellent whisky, rum and cigars......as always we were given great service by Fillipe who makes the visit perfect every time. Thanks. Brilliant night']
title: another perfect visit

answer_text: ['Dear RSLAL,', 'Thank you for posting your review, though I am irked you thought the food expensive. We do have fine things available, for example our dry aged steaks. It takes time and effort to mature the beef and as a result it is dearer however the flavour is far superior to other steaks. At the same time we also work hard to be great value and it is not difficult to have a two course meal for under £25.00 and a set menu is available for £19.95. ', 'For your next visit make sure to also look at our incredible whisky list & perhaps you could also enjoy a cigar on one of our terraces.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Great hearty food, quite expensive', 'I visited here with two colleagues for lunch and although the food was great, the price was far too much. I would happily take clients here though and indulge in the bar and the great wine list!']
title: Great hearty food, quite expensive

answer_text: ['Dear LAG22', 'Thank you for your review. I am delighted you enjoyed your evening with us and am pleased to hear your thought on our service. We all look forward to welcoming you again very soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['This is the second time I have visited this restaurant', 'The first visit was for an office XMas party and it was ok, however the place was full of other parties and a set menu', 'The second visit was with some work colleagues', 'We started with some drinks in the bar - a little crowded but very pleasant lots of choices of whisky and spirits', 'We had booked one of the private dining rooms, there was no additional charge for this however we did have to have a minimum number of people', 'The staff were very attentive, explaining the menu and making recommendations when asked ', 'The meal was very good, fair sized portion and great taste', 'They did explain the menu does change with the season to ensure ingredients are as fresh as possible', 'It was expensive, not the most expensive for the area, but was worth the expense', 'I will be returning at some point']
title: Good Food, Great Venue

answer_text: ['Dear BMSAH', 'I am pleased to hear you have had such a wonderful time on your second visit. Please let me know when you plan to return via falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk, I would like to thank you personally', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Second visit and we were not disappointed. We had great seats the band were great and the food excellent. The service was spot on. Our waitress was knowledgable about the food and left us time in between courses to enjoy the show and have a relaxing time. I will most definitely be back.']
title: Love the music

answer_text: ['Dear ukfowler,', 'Thank you for your kind review. I am delighted you enjoyed Sandy’s recommendation and I hope to welcome you back soon.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['I had dinner arranged at Boisdale for me by a contact in Canary Wharf- Sandy Madhvani @ David M Robinson. Fantastic service- table and champagne waiting. Impressive menu, great food. Great atmosphere later on with music and phenomenal bars.', 'I have subsequently visited for drinks only and was extremely impressed with the professionalism and knowledge of the bartenders- Daniele was great and kept me entertained and topped up for a long while.', 'Will definitely call back when in CW.']
title: Great Venue all round

answer_text: ['Dear Captain B', 'Thank you for your second review. I would like to say that we are not a steak house rather than a British restaurant that serves excellent steaks, which have been on many occasions commented on by customers as the best they have eaten. Still we serve more than fine steaks and offer a wide variety of seafood and turf equally. As with all foods they are natural product and we do have checks in place to ensure that oysters meet a minimum size, should you have felt otherwise, I always recommend customers to comment on the night so we can rectify a situation then and there to avoid a bitter aftertaste; though I can understand that you chose otherwise. The partridge should have been served with a steak knife to help carve it, however cooking it more has a detrimental effect on texture and taste however I am delighted your guest enjoyed our Haggis. I am delighted you enjoyed the Picpoul de Pinet and agree that the price point is excellent. We price our whisky selection very competitively and £15 for a whisky of that age is very reasonable, still it may vary greatly from one distillery to another. We are a music venue and we are restaurant alike so we pride ourselves on great food and music. I am disappointed that you felt the quality of our offer below par on both occasions but am happy you enjoyed the music.', 'Do not hesitate to contact me in the future should I be able to assist in any way.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I came here in July and had what I described as not the best steak in town. Since then I have been to other steak houses, mainly the Hawsmoor chain and each one unquestionly better than here. When I was told the the Bogus Blues Brothers were playing here, my fist thought was that I really wanted to see them but wasnt sure about if I wanted to pay up for average food again. Given the circumstances, I went for it. It was a fairly expensive night, with the food and drinks bill at £340 for 4 of us but then another £100 for our table as the band was playing. Im still not sure if thats right, but the place was full so I guess its working for them. ', 'First the food... We had Jersey Rocks to start, my wifes favourite oysters. They were surprisingly small, some actually really should not have been served as they were tiny. That sort of soured things a bit for me, My guests had Haggis which was described as excellent and Partridge which was probably a little too undercooked as she was struggling to carve it. My wife and I had the "special" Sea Trout, which wasnt. It was really very average and as such very disapointing. ', 'We were recommended a most excellent Picpoul de Pinet which came in at a reasonable £32.50 which was pleasing to see listed. The cocktails were under a tenner which was good but the 15 year old whiskies at £15 seemed a little rich, but i cant complain...They were very good.', 'The band were wonderful and great fun. The room was beautiful, warm red walls, low lighting and candles made for a lovely atmosphere. Sadly, they decided to put the £50 per head tables at the very front , which was fine for them, but at the expense of the dance area which was about 4 sqm. As you might imagine , it got pretty crowded in there. ', 'It has been pointed out to me that generally if you go to a music venue, you should consider yourself lucky if the food is half decent. I dont really consider Boisdales as a music venue , but more a restaurant that has music..As such the food really should be bette rin my opinion. Maybe I shouldnt have such high expectations , it is a great room with fairly priced drinks, which just happens to serve average food. Nothing wrong with that I guess.']
title: Great room, fantastic band, food still average.

answer_text: ['Dear AlexA,', 'Thank you for your thoughts on our offer. I am happy you enjoyed the terrace and the service. I was sorry to read that you felt the service rushed, we have had some unexpectedly busy night and have taken precautions to counteract. With regards to our cigar offer, I would like to think we are very competitive when it comes to pricing when you compare us to similar cigar venues. Thank you again for your thought and I look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["In Canary Wharf there is some great dining. Boisdale isn't ideal for families with children given the artwork and the jazz and bar scene but for covered outdoor seating it's a good choice and has decent food. Burgers are good, service is rushed and if you do venture to the cigar bar area be prepared to pay a premium unless you've brought your own."]
title: Good Burgers, Pricey Cigars

answer_text: ['Dear Martijn V,', 'I was disappointed to read that the service did not meet the standards we set ourselves. The night in questions was particularly busy with an unusually large number of diners turning up without a booking. Sadly you were the one is suffer. Friday & Saturday nights are our big show nights that have been designed to substitute our customers having to find various venues to attend. Pre-dinner drinks, dinner, show and post dinner drinks all combined into one. It is on these nights the music tends to have more volume than during the week. Should this have disturbed you, you will find that Boisdale is more to your liking during the week. 12.5% service charge is a standard throughout most of the hospitality industry in London and you are, as you have done, welcome to omit it should you feel it was not deserved.', 'Hopefully we will have the opportunity to welcome you on another night to show you our other side. Please feel free to contact me directly under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk should you wish to do so.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["At first glance the Boisdale seems to have it all: a great location, a decent menu, fashionable web-site, beautiful whisky cabinet and access to London's crème de la crème of business people.", "In September of 2014 we, a group of eleven former students, flew over to London for a long weekend to celibrate our 25th anniversary. We went cycling, went shopping at Harrod's, had our picture taken at Buckingham Palace and went to the Boisdale for our main dinner event. What a deception.", 'About ten minutes into our meal the live band that had been promised started playing. I have to hand it to them: they were on tune, entertaining and had a nice repetoir. The problem was with the Boisdale: the volume was horrendous. For the full length it was virtually impossible to talk to eachother without screaming at one another.', 'After the initial pouring of the wine we were left to our own devices. This meant that if someone wanted a refill he had tp get up, find the wine, pour himself a glass and them return the wine. Apparantly the waiters were paying attention at one point, because they did materialize to bring new bottles, but pour them? No sir.', "But the worst was the audience. Don't get me wrong, as a former student, I have been guilty of many a transgretion in restaurants. Maybe I am getting old, but when the other guests start annoying even us, then they are obnoxious. After the live band the Boisdale turned on the standard bunch of golden oldies and around us the guests started singing along and dancing. Enthusiasm is great, but definately not you are looking for in a restaurant like the Boisdale.", 'We skipped desert and deleted the 12.5% service fee they give themselves by default.', 'In conclusion: delicious food, terrible service and repulsive clients.']
title: A missed opportunity

answer_text: ['Thank you for you wonderful review,', 'I am delighted you had such a lovely time & that Richard looked after you so well.', 'Please let me know when you return so I can thank you personally.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I've been to a lot of 'luxury' restaurants all over the world, Boisdale outdid all of them. The food was amazing, the live music and venue were superb and the service was absolutely outstanding. We visited for my father's 60th birthday and our server Rich made sure it was a memorable and enjoyable night. Honestly cannot heap enough praise on this place. Fantastic! "]
title: Can't recommend highly enough

answer_text: ['Dear Ken B,', 'Thank you for joining us on Atila’s Sinatra Night. It was a real pleasure to meet you and your charming wife. I look forward to seeing both of you return soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['My wife and I have just had a cracking good evening at this smart yet relaxed supper club. Walking in is a bit like stepping back in time. The room is a warm red, with soft lighting and every type of alcohol one has ever heard of, and many more that are both rare and rarified. The walls are covered with unique pieces of art, including photos of movie stars of the 1940\'s and 50"s. The entire ambiance announces "sophistication".', "The tables are comfortably spaced and candle lit, reminding me of the supper clubs of old movies where each table has it's own small lamp. I half expected to see Bogart and Bacall come strolling in.", 'There is an entire room devoted to the finest cigars to be sampled after dinner.', 'The menu is largely fine cuisine Scottish stye. The steak was expertly prepared. Wait staff are plentiful, polite and available while never intrusive.', 'But wait...it gets better....much better if you like jazz. There is live jazz most nights. We had the pleasure of hearing a young vocalist call Atila who has devoted himself to the American Songbook in general and Sinatra in particular. Tonight was two sets of Sinatra standards, many of them difficult pieces to sing (unless you happen to be Frank). This fellow did an outstanding job. Wonderful voice and presence and backed up by a swinging quartet.', "When you visit be sure to meet the maitre d' Falco. He is a wonderful host who understands the old fashioned art of looking after his guests."]
title: Music and Dining Not To Be Missed

answer_text: ['Dear cdi_review', 'Thank you for taking the time to review us. I would appreciate further information regarding this incident. Kindly contact me via falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk.', 'I look forward to hearing from you.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ["The food is good, I mean its an oyster bar... but this review has to do with the staff... rude. Witnessed how a member of staff was treating a person on the elevator that was not a boisdale customer. Mr. if you are still working for boisdale you should get fired. You were rude. The customers, that actually have money, didn't say a word but you thought you had the right.... Disrespectful and a low-class, that is what you are. Hope I'll never see you again."]
title: Food is good, staff ....

answer_text: ['Dear Anthony K,', 'Thank you for taking the time (finally) to write a review! I am delighted you enjoy visiting us over & over again. I hope to see you soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I've been going to Boisdale now since they first opened about 2 years ago and it's constantly brilliant.", "I've been for the jazz nights , New Year's Eve dinners , valentine dinners , burger and rugby afternoons ,eaten on the first floor many many times as well as popped in for a well needed beer.", 'I went again on Wednesday , just a straight forward steak this time with a few sides. Brilliant.']
title: Quality time and time again

answer_text: ['Dear Tennisbanch,', 'thank you for joining us on a Sunday. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the food and service so much! I hope I can welcome you back soon, maybe on another day of the week the music is more to your liking? See our website for all the upcoming acts.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['We booked for the Sunday 3 course which was £35 or £45 including unlimited wine. Fantastic food one of the best roast beef Sunday meals we can remember, staff were attentive and friendly and atmosphere welcoming. Music was nice as well but it is probably the food we would go back for. Definitely be back on a Sunday']
title: Fab Sunday roast

answer_text: ['Dear EliseBanks,', 'I am delighted that you enjoyed the First Floor Bar and had such a good time trying to figure all the pictures out. Next time your want to join us let me know under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk . I would love to say hi personally.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I went on Saturday 23 August with a friend for dinner but the restaurant was fully booked BooHoo!!', 'But was told we could eat on the first floor Terrace Bar on arrival our waiter was very charming and we ordered burgers that was soooo delicious, that we ordered another one to share between us yummy!! then we had dessert for four people!! Mega yummy!! Great food and lovely wine.', 'Will definitely be back!! Great setting amazing pictures had a fun time naming all the stars!!']
title: Just Great!!

answer_text: ['Dear Don T,', 'Thank you for following you friend’s recommendation. There can be no better praise for us than others recommending us. ', 'When you are next in town, please make sure to stop by so we can thank you!', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Friends suggested this restaurant to us, and we were not disappointed.', 'Located on the second floor of the Canary Wharf building, this posh restaurant has outstanding decor and fantastic service. We were seated with a nice view of the park outside, and enjoyed both the view and the live jazz.', 'But the best part was the food. I ordered salmon and my companion had chicken breast. The salmon was prepared perfectly, and with tangy seasoning. I loved it. My companion said the chicken was the most tasty and tender she could remember.', 'The price is a bit on the high side, but not exorbitant and well worth it.']
title: Great Food, Great View, Great Jazz

answer_text: ['Dear Kazzer2014', 'Thank you for posting your review. I am sorry to hear you did not enjoy the music on the night. We have quite a strict booking policy in which we only commit to book great artists with a proven track record; so it is unfortunate to hear you felt disappointed. On the upside it is great to hear you enjoyed food and drink. I hope to welcome you back soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["The whole evening was lovely, we went on a Saturday evening, with a tribute band playing, although they weren't that good it did not spoil the food and wine which was lovely, I had the duck which was cooked to perfection, good choice of wines and if you love whiskey this is the place to go, it has hundreds of them all along the back of the bar, beautiful view they say by the window is the cheaper tables because the view of the stage, we booked for another space to see the stage, but they asked us if we wanted the window seat which we did and was pleased it was a lovely summer evening where we could people watch eat good food and drink good wine."]
title: Excellent

answer_text: ['Thank you for taking the time to review us.', 'I am delighted you stayed on for the music and managed to have a great time. Regarding our pricing, the deal you enjoyed is obviously wonderful, however you can manage to have a two course meal and a bottle of wine for under £30.00 per person so I would argue that we are able to provide great value, next to the finer things in life, too. Nevertheless I look forward to welcoming you again soon for one of our exciting upcoming acts.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Dined here on a 50% off the food deal which made it manageable as otherwise it would have been a very expensive evening. The food was very good and the waiter was just the right side of attentive and chatty, which gave a nice friendly feel to what could have been quite a cold formal restaurant. ', 'The wine list was very expensive and other drinks likewise. ', "We also visited on a Saturday night when they had a live band. It was £10 per person to stay for the band, but I'm glad we did in the end. It turned a nice meal into a great four hour evening. The staff even (unbidden) reset a table closer to the band when they saw us turning round to see them. All in all a great time. A bit pricey, but if you can get a deal ( which seem to come around quite often) it is well worth a visit."]
title: Great night

answer_text: ['I am so delighted you enjoyed your evening with is.', 'We do strive to give it a cool Supper Club feeling so I could not agree with you more. Make sure to check our website for great upcoming acts & events like our ‘In 80 drams around the world’.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ["This review is a tad overdue. Came here for my wife's birthday dinner. Lovely surroundings with a Jazz Club feel (as it is) and outdoor balcony terrace for the cigar aficionados. It was early on a Saturday evening so It wasn't terribly busy. I cannot exactly recall exactly what we both had bit it was off the Fixed Price menu and was delicious. I recall Having the Smoked Salmon with Octopus (yes, OCTOPUS) slices and it was excellent! Our waitress Luz, was very attentive and even though we were perched at the side of the restaurant, she came running to us when needed! Will be back with the boys sometime, as they have a great selection of Cuban Cigars and special Jazz nights to boot!"]
title: Nice place for the hustle & bustle of the Wharf!

answer_text: ['Dear RachChap72,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write such a lovely review. I am really pleased to hear that you had an amazing time. Please let us know when you return under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk so we can say thank you in person!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I had the best night out for a long time at this restaurant. We had a great start with a drink in the oyster bar on the first floor followed by a three course meal in the main candlelit restaurant. We were fortunate to be seated at the front of the restaurant near the stage where we were entertained by an absolutely fantastic jazz session. Excellent food and drink, the staff were friendly and knowledgable of the food and drinks menu, and the music made the night. Can't wait to go back with friends!! ", '16/08/2014']
title: Amazing night out!

answer_text: ['Dear iDuck85,', 'Thank you for such a lovely review. I am delighted you had such a pleasant time on our terraces; thankfully the weather has been fabulous the last few weeks. When it gets colder later on in the year there are plenty heaters to keep you warm, in case you were wondering. We look forward to welcoming you again very soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Went here late in the evening after a theatre. The entrance is somewhat unassuming, inside some sort of shopping center. Staff was very pleasant, and immediately seated me at a good table on the terrace. Whisky selection is of course extensive, and you can smoke both your own cigars, or purchase some from their collection. Staff was very attentive. Pleasant for solo travellers, but would also be recommended for business or friends.']
title: Perfect for late night cigar on the terrace

answer_text: ['Dear AVLux,', 'Thank you for choosing us to celebrate your anniversary. I am delighted that you were looked after by our team and hope to welcome you back in the near future. For all our great music check out our website, one of my personal favourites is coming up on the 6th September for a Sinatra Night when Atila swings easy. Sublime!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['My wife and I had Sunday Lunch at Boisdale to celebrate our anniversary, with our friends, Brady and Rachel and it was our first visit to the restaurant. The lunch menu is excellent value, with 3 courses and unlimited wine for £45 per head, however we opted to order our own drinks and the wine and food quality was very good. We were sat on the terrace overlooking the fountain at Cabot Place and we were even offered sun glasses if the glare on the terrace was too bright. On a lovely Sunday afternoon the service was excellent and although the waiter splashed some gravy over Brady, soda water as produced in order to remove the stains and free drinks and the offer of dry cleaning also made, at the end of the meal we we were given a 20% discount on the overall price of the bill. It was a genuine accident but the staff dealt with the situation in the correct way and efficiently. ', 'Food', 'The starters were tasty and the mains which included roast potatoes cooked in duck fat and side vegetables were very well cooked. The sticky toffee puddings and creme brûlée was wonderful with no complaints whatsoever. Finally we were giver a tour of the cigar lounge and humidor and we are already discussing another visit to the main restaurant in order to take in one of the music shows. A really pleasant afternoon.']
title: Great Sunday Lunch

answer_text: ['Dear Renelekonk,', 'I am pleased you enjoyed your lunch with us and thank you for taking the time to write a review.', 'We look forward to seeing you again soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Visited here for Sunday Lunch, but booked a late table unfortunately did not realise it closed early on a Sunday. Had a great time here with friends in a very relaxed but lively atmosphere.', 'The service was top notch and the food cooked to perfection. I must return to enjoy the ambience and the live music another time, next time I will be booking an earlier table so I can soak up the surroundings a little better. The Bar is quite a spectacle, probably one of the smartest I have ever seen, and believe me I`ve seen a few!']
title: Must return

answer_text: ['Dear Linda B,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. I would like to point out that although we of course have items on the menu that are a little dearer, think Fillet on the Bone, there are however plenty options to choose from that let you have two courses for under £25.00 as well as more than 6 wines prices under the same mark.', 'Have a great week and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Have been here a few times and if you are a jazz lover it is a good venue. Food is a little pricey for what it is and so to are the wines, but a great selection of cocktails. It is great on Sundays for lunch for all the family. ']
title: Evening of Jazz

answer_text: ['Thank you chandler132 for you review.', 'I am happy you enjoyed yourself with us. As I have mentioned in the previous review there are also many excellent value wines to choose from. With regards to the waiter keeping your glasses filled, this is a truly personal opinion and we try to walk the fine line between keeping you well looked after and not being too intrusive. Should you feel we get it wrong, just kindly notify the waiter and he or she will happily adjust their service for you.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['It was an very pleasant experience.', 'The lobster cooked to perfection, the wine was good but a bit pricey.', 'The service was very good, but waiter was pushing la bit too much into the consumption ! Service & charge!!!', 'The music was really good, that create a great atmosphere.']
title: I will be back

answer_text: ['Dear Batch65,', 'Thank you for your review. I am delighted you thought our service to be attentive. For the summer season we have adopted a new menu with more lighter choices available, I am sure more classic dishes will return in the near future as the weather changes. For additional information about the music, do have a peek on our website for exciting upcoming bands.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Had dinner here recently. The staff were very attentive and whilst the menu is not as varied as some others I have experienced I personally thought it was a good mix of traditional Scottish fare and the usual steaks. I had the potted smoked mackerel and a main of haggis both of which were very good, in fact there were no issues with our food. ', 'I would like to agree with some of the other contributors, in that, I thought the wine a little expensive but I think this is the norm in Canary Wharf.', 'The addition of the live jazz to the atmosphere was very welcome and the trio we saw were very good.']
title: Good food with Jazz thrown in

answer_text: ['Dear Christian D,', 'Thank you for visiting us and for taking the time to write your review. I was disappointed to hear that your steak was not cooked to perfection & you thought the salad was not value for money.
