We have recently changed our menu to provide many lighter and seasonal items that should help make a choice for any preference. I am sorry you feel differently. To address the topping up of glasses you found irritating, I apologise if you felt that way; we try to strike a balance between attentive and discreet, but is remains a highly personal opinion of where that balance should be and it remains at your discretion to notify the waiter.', 'In case there is a path that leads you to return to us, I would be happy if you would let me know under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Dinner was a little disappointing. If you do not like steaks I do not think the alternative mains were particularly appealing . The dressed crab starter was good but the minced venison with pasta, while tasty, hardly looked appetising. Extremely dull presentation.', "My partner had a steak. Frankly, it looked dry and unappealing. It was supposed to be 'medium rare' but was more medium-to-well done. Her salad comprised a few items with some oil drizzled them them. Hardly value for money.", 'Service was good but the constant re-filling of glasses bordered on irritating.', "OK, adequate, but not a place I'd beat a path to return to. I had lunch at Jamie Oliver's Barbecoa the same week and the choices, steaks and atmosphere were a standard above."]
title: Power dining in Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Dear AmberK,', 'Thank you for your review which I enjoyed reading. I am delighted you found the food lovely and enjoyed you evening in general. Depending on the day of the week the music ranges from gentle background tunes to full on live performances on the weekends designed to substitute you having to find a theatre or such. These can be quite loud at times and should you not have been interested there is always to option of moving to our Bar & Grill on the first floor or our heated and covered terraces to continue you evening with us where you can of course enjoy some of our nearly 1000 whiskies.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['There are two places to eat in the same building; the oyster bar and the main, upper floor restaurant . We ate in the upstairs restaurant and made a reservation through Opentable.', 'We were a party of 5 of diverse tastes and yet everyone was able to find something on the menu that appealed to them. The food is generally sourced from Scotland. The mini haggis as an appetizer was quite tasty and a nice intro to a traditional dish for those who want to try it.', 'My companions found the food very good. I was less impressed with my selections but everything was hot and well prepared and presented. Prices were quite reasonable. ', "We were too full for pudding but the cheese tray passed by several times and it looked amazing. Next time I'll forgo the starter and wait for cheese.", "We quite enjoyed our evening until the live band came on stage. Apparently this is customary and somewhat of a draw. It wasn't for us. Far too loud to even shout above. We quickly asked for the cheque and left. ", 'That was a shame as the bar has 150 types of whiskey and we would have loved to have sat around tasting various whiskeys. ', 'Overall cost was very reasonable. Look for specials on Opentable.']
title: Very good meal and service but mind your ears when the band gets going

answer_text: ['SimonPainter123,', 'Thank you for your review. I am pleased you enjoyed food and service to such an extent. As I have mentioned in the previous review the music ranges in volume and intensity and I apologise should you have thought it loud and unpleasant. We only book some of the finest artists around in the UK and the styles of music vary. Luckily you did move to the first floor and were able to continue your evening; something I always recommend to customers not wanting the music.', 'I hope to see you soon,', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['The food was excellent and the service very attentive. Cannot fault the menu; I had a perfect rib eye after a delightful haggis starter. Good food, good wine, good whisky, good cigars and of course great service from a friendly team.', "Only gripe is the music, it was too loud and a bit rubbish, we escaped to the terrace to get away from it so we didn't have to shout to have a conversation."]
title: Ditch the music

answer_text: ['Dear Zoe W,', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the performance but am irked that you thought the food was below the standard we set ourselves. Should you wish to provide me with additional information, please contact me under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk. I look forward to hearing from you.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Food was average , wasn't overly impressed. The Michael Jackson tribute we saw was fantastic, created a great atmosphere as we were up on our feet dancing the whole evening. Overall a great night"]
title: Great Entertainment

answer_text: ['Dear SeonaCallanan,', 'I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your meal and the drinks. I was however irked that the service did not live up to expectations. Should you wish to discuss you experience in more detail, please contact me at falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['The food was really good, duck and steak were great. Desert was Devine and so was the baileys coffee! Only downside was having to pay for the service, or lack of..had to flag down the waitress to get stuff - fair enough she was very busy - lack of staff perhaps?? All in all food was good but the bill zoomed upwards with service charge.']
title: Good food - but overpriced

answer_text: ['Dear Sue O,', 'Thank your taking the time to write your review and also for commenting so wonderfully about our team. I am thrilled to hear you had an amazing time. I look forward to seeing you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Heard of this through a friend so gave it a try, food excellent, service great and the entertainment as a bonus was amazing! Was a Michael Jackson tribute with Celena Cherry, they had everyone up dancing definitely a night to remember and better than I expected for a meal out.']
title: What an evening

answer_text: ['Dear turkishtraveller2014', 'I am delighted you had such a great evening and thank you to your partner to choosing us! We are conscious to providing excellent value for money and also more refined options, so please do see our website for detailed information on set menus, offers and a tremendous variety of foods and drinks for all expectations and occasions.', 'I look forward to welcoming you back soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I had a suprise event booked by my girlfriend in this restaurant.I normally dont like suprises however the guys really put on a good show really got the crowd moving and overpriced food didnt seem that bad by the end of the night...Excellent evening and definetly want to see what other shows this place can conjure up :-)']
title: Excellent night and entertainment....MJ all the way :-)

answer_text: ['Dear robert j,', 'What a wonderful review; thank you! Please let me know when you plan on retuning at falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk, I would like to thank you personally.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Excellent in every way. Quality of food,presentation, surroundings, staff, atmosphere - all were excellent. This is a quality establishment that is most definitely worth visiting. The staff were fabulous, attentive without being intrusive. The food was superb. Quality of ingredients was excellent, very talented chefs. Yes.. you occasionally have to block out the "white noise" generated by some of the pretentious City Boys who meet and eat here... but even that cannot detract from a great ambiance and really pleasant surroundings. Meal was good value and pretty much everything about Boisdale feels like quality. If you are in this part of London this should be on your list.']
title: Touch of Class

answer_text: ['Thank you Nima S four your kind review.', 'I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your evening so much. We always work hard to make sure your guests have a memorable evening. ', 'I look forward to your return.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I loved the food and atmosphere was amazing! The Michael Jackson tribute performers were great!! Loved everything from the costumes to vocals and music in general. Will be back for more!']
title: Great night out and MIchael Jackson performance was awesome!!

answer_text: ['Dear Jack A,', 'Thank you for taking the time to review. I am delighted you enjoyed your evening with us to such an extent.', 'Hopefully we will see you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Great food and the entertainment was top notch. The service was also excellent, I will keep an eye out for the show's return"]
title: Michael Jackson show rocked

answer_text: ['Dear Sdwoo,', 'I am delighted you enjoyed you lunch with us and the sun shone on you. Being located on the first and second floor only does have its challenges as you point out, but we have added signs around our entrances to make it as easy as we possible to locate us. Hopefully you can agree that finding us was worth your time and I look forward to welcoming you back soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I'd heard good things about this place, so decided to try it out for a lunch meeting. It is not the easiest place to find, unless you know what you are looking for. In Cabot Place shopping centre on the Ground Floor head for the City end, take the last corridor on the left hands idea which has a red Boisdale sign on the roof. Take the lifts up to the 2nd floor. We were shown to our table which overlooked Cabot Square with the Cheesegrater and Walkie Talkie in the distance. We opted for main meals only, I went for the truffle burger, which had a strong flavour, and was very filling, but enjoyable. With some wine we were pretty full and only managed coffees. The price wasn't too bad either. The food was good, the best part was the view out on a sunny day."]
title: Great business lunch location

answer_text: ['Dear WGibson648,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write your review. I am delighted to hear you regularly visit and find us consistent. We work hard to keep our standards up and high to ensure each customer is looked after well. I agree that the whisky and wine lists are expansive, but would like to point out that there are also a large number of wines under £30.00 per bottle and a vast selection on whiskies under £15.00 per large measure. With the exchange rate varying constantly in both directions this will, fortunately for us, affect any other establishment you visit.', 'I look forward to welcoming you back soon to enjoy the fabulous weather in London at on our terraces.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I have visited Boisdale at Canary Wharf (and Boisdale of Belgravia) many times, and have found it a consistent meal. Be forewarned, however, this is not an inexpensive restaurant. The selection of single-malts is extensive, and the wine list expansive (and expensive); the exchange rate in July 2014 is $1.74 to 1GBP, so be prepared. The steaks are from grass-fed animals, so sometimes have a lot of gristle. But they are tasty!!', 'The Cigar Bar and humidor is very enjoyable, with a wide selection of Cuban cigars. Enjoy them on the patio, and appreciate the sunset over Canary Wharf.']
title: Scotch, Steaks, and Cigars

answer_text: ['Dear Captain B,', 'Thank you for taking the time to review. I was disappointed to hear that your experience did not live up to the high standards we set ourselves. All our steaks are dry aged and have repeatedly been commented on as very tasty indeed. If your steak was below par I do sincerely apologise as well as for the wrong spinach being served. I too believe it was a coincidence that you had to suffer from. I hope you can be tempted to return and if you do please let me know under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['In years gone by, when I wanted a steak, Boisdales in Victoria was the place i went. A lovely and atmospheric place where the food was never great but always fun. When the urge for a steak hits me nowadays there is so much more choice and pretty much all of them are good. I guess over the years i have become spoilt buy Goodmans because the food there is always first class. When considering a steak in Canary Wharf, I thought I would try this moderately new branch of Boisdales to be different but I can safely say it wont be my first choice next time the urge comes. ', 'The setting is great, especially on a warm summers day (yes we actually are having some) so we sat outside on the terrace. The table we were offered had zero leg room so we were "allowed" to sit in the members area, which offered great room.It was nicely secluded and a perfect temperature.', ' We started with Jersey rocks which were excellent and both went for our old favourites..the Rib-Eye. My colleage went for medium rare , which I have always been advised not to do with this cut as the extra cooking produces more flavour from the fat. As such I opted for medium. This as it transpired was a massive mistake as it was overcooked, dry and a little cold. As my colleague was happy with his rarer one I did not send it back...but it resulted in a very indifferent meal. The creamed spinach turned up as wilted instead, which again wasnt the end of the world.', 'It could have been just an off day so I am not making this an offical complaint more of a niggle...The wine list was excellent and offered a great range of wines and prices, something I always approve of. ', 'Its a nice restaurant..and on a summers day, I might be tempted to return, but in all honesty, if I want a steak...Its Goodmans every time.']
title: Not the best steak in town

answer_text: ['Dear Gabriella W,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write your review.', 'I am pleased that you enjoyed our food; however was vexed by your comment regarding flies in the restaurant and our service.', 'We take every precaution to prevent such a problem & have rigorous cleaning procedures in place. As a result we have been awarded 5 out of 5 in the Food Standards Agency rating for food hygiene 4 years running. This year we are challenged. We are open from 11am to midnight and as we have had a fantastic start to the summer with high temperatures blessing us daily. The doors to our terraces on the first floor are open all throughout this period. Coupled with the Thames being close by this generates high humidity & provides flies ideal conditions to thrive in. We are working very closely with our pest control contractor to minimise the impact and using all methods available to food premises. ', 'Should you wish to discuss in further detail please do not hesitate to contact me under dgm@boisdale-cw.co.uk. I look forward to hearing from you.', 'Yours sincerely', 'Falko']
content: ['It is hard to give an overall review to this restaurant because on one hand the food was really amazing, we were 4 people at the table and we all enjoyed our meal very much. However, the service was terrible, our waiter was not providing good attention to our table, for instance there was a period of time about 40 mins where our empty glasses were sitting at the table with no one to offer another drink. ', 'We also had the unpleasant experience of having mosquitoes flying around our table, we mentioned this to the floor manager and he said : "It is the time of the year, is very hot and humid, nobody complained of having mosquitoes AT THIS TABLE before, do you want to switch tables?". I think, this is an unacceptable at any restaurant.', 'We stayed for the jazz band and it was really amazing too. We all enjoyed the music very much.']
title: Excellent food, but mosquitoes flying around the table and not great service

answer_text: ['Dear chris l,', 'Thank you for your kind review. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay with us. We all look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['This restaurant has it all, formal dining, informal dinning, great oyster/drinks bar and great music evenings. Restaurant is fabulous with stunning views over one of the CW water features. Opt for the table by the windows. Food, wines superb and service tip top. Definitely a place to celebrate a business deal, celebrate a special event or propose! ']
title: Best Dining Experience at Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Agie01', 'Thank you for your praise. It makes all of us proud that we were able to make your visit so memorable. I cannot wait to welcome you again very soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Our visit to Boisedale was a wonderful experience. Wonderful food and drink with beautiful music and top quality service. The cigar lounge was also fantastic with a huge range of whisky to choose from. Unforgettable experience. ']
title: World class experience

answer_text: ['Dear Charliecakez,', 'Happy belated Birthday! I am thrilled you had such a great evening and I have already passed your comments onto the team in our daily briefings.', 'We all look forward to welcoming you again.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Went on Saturday for a birthday treat and that it was ! Great atmos , great good, staff were lovely and brilliant entertainment ! The Michael Jackson show was brilliant. Will defo go again ']
title: Great food and loved the Michael Jackson entertainment !

answer_text: ['Dear Mwills2,', 'Thank you for your review. I am happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, but would like to hear more. We are currently working on our wine list looking to expand our new world diversity. Please contact me directly under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk should you like to elaborate on your experience.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Nice environment, eager service, solid food. You won't have your sox blown off but the overall result is fine. Wine list needs some work."]
title: Solid place for a steak

answer_text: ['Dear J_Anniston,', 'Thank you for your review. I am delighted you enjoyed our food and service. We work hard to ensure that all our guests can enjoy the very best of hospitality.', 'With regards to the show on the evening, we did have a technical fault of equipment despite a thorough sound check being conducted in the afternoon. We were able to fix the issue and as a result the performance was much improved in the second set and we received a lot of positive feedback for the event. Should you wish to discuss further, please do contact me directly under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk.', 'The car park is managed by Canary wharf estate and they do grant 3 hours free parking on weekends and bank holidays when the ticket is stamped; any additional time will need to be settled. I hope this clarifies your issues and I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.', 'Warm regards.', 'Falko']
content: ['Visited Saturday 5/7/14. Service, venue, food faultless. However the Michael Jackson entertainment was so poor we had to leave, his mike didnt seem to be working but his voice was awful so probably a good thing. To add insult we paid £10 each to see the show. We had our car park ticket stamped and when we left the car park it wouldnt work and had to pay for parking. Could have been a great evening if we hadnt had these 2 issues.']
title: Great food, disappointing entertainment

answer_text: ['Dear M W', 'Thank you for your kind review. I am delighted that you enjoyed your evening with us. Although we enjoy the finer things in live very much, we also aim to provide excellent value for money and we currently have some great special offers; so do check out our website.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon to Canary Wharf.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Excellent atmosphere, service, food, entertainment. Not a cheap evening, but something different and worth the spend and trip out to Canary Wharf.']
title: Worth the trip

answer_text: ['Thank you for taking the time to review and for commenting so positively on the evening.', 'We aim to provide the best entertainment and service possible and want the staff to enjoy working too. I am glad that it shows. To quickly comment on your thoughts for the tickets, there are different ticket class and prices all varying on the type of show. Some acts encourage dancing, others are more relaxed intimate sets that invite to listen. Our music tickets start from £4.50 upward and rarely exceed £50.00 for the VIP tickets. In any case detailed information may always be found on our website. I look forward to welcoming you again soon', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I've given this restaurant 5 stars for the whole package, be prepared to spend money. So I would suggest this for a celebration.", "On reserving a table you effectively need to pay for your seat when there is entertainment. You have a choice of £10, £30 or £100 - the £100 seat comes with a goody bag. I plumped for the £30, but in fact the £10 one is just as good, yes restricted view/no view of the entertainment, but it doesn't stop you from moving round the restaurant or dancing. Some of the £10 seats also have a great view over Canary Wharf", 'The food, service & entertainment were great. With a separate cigar room for those that want to indulge and an outside seating area to have drinks/cigars quite decadent. ', 'A really good atmosphere with the waiters/waitresses clearly enjoying their job as well as having a little dance themselves. The whole Boisdale experience comes together perfectly', "Sadly one of our guests couldn't attend so we effectively lost the £30 we paid, it would of been nice to have had that refunded or taken off the bill as I've stated previously a tad expensive. I would definitely go back though"]
title: Great night out

answer_text: ['Dear Jaydeeman,', 'I am delighted you had such a wonderful night and thank you for your comments on our food and service. I look forward to seeing you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["First time at the restaurant on Saturday night; came to experience the food and also the famous MJ Eternity show starring Danny Oliver. Food was great; service reasonable, can't really fault it. Amazing intimate setting for the show. Was close to stage; by the end of the evening everyone was on their feet dancing. A real good feel. Let's do this again!!! Credit to all the performers and the team."]
title: Great food - 'Michael Jackson' show a winner!

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you for choosing to visit the first floor bar & terrace with your voucher, I was sorry to hear that the service you received was well below the standard we set.', "The terrace menu has been designed to enable fast production in the kitchen, despite cooking everything to order as the need to be in and out is obviously high on the list of priorities for our Canary Wharf business customers. Getting the waiter's attention and prompt processing of the bill are basics which we clearly got wrong on this occasion. I would like to reassure you that this is certainly not the norm and would be grateful if you could contact me directly on Nathan@boisdale.co.uk so I can have an opportunity to restore your faith in our Canary Wharf business.", 'Your sincerely,', 'Nathan J Evans']
content: ["We went there with some colleagues for a quick lunch at the Bar & Grill. Equipped with a 50% off good voucher, we thought we'd be in for a treat. ", 'The food (burgers) are quite good. Main problem was the service. The drinks took 20mins to arrive, the food another 40mins. It was very difficult to get the attention of the staff to get the bill as well.', "We ended up spending well over 1h30mins there and paying 20% service charge on the bill (as the charge is calculated on the non-discounted amount). That is pretty unacceptable for the service we received. But we were in too much of a hurry to get back to meetings to argue it (which undoubtedly would have taken a long time). We are disappointed by the experience as the food is good. But we won't be back for a work lunch."]
title: Very slow service

answer_text: ['Dear Jenaurelia,', 'Thank you for you wonderful review. I am delighted you have had such a lovely visit. We all work tirelessly to make our guests as happy as we can and it makes us proud when we receive praise for it. I would love to say thank you personally when you visit next so please do contact me under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you plan on returning.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["The staff are literally the most pleasant and professional people I have come across. We bought a bottle of wine for the table and didn't lift it once. A lovely young man kept an eye on the level of our glasses and refilled when needed. It is all the little things that count for example, moving out of the way when someone is coming through and generally just smiling and giving off positive vibes. ", " We watched a blues show which we had to pay extra for as well as an un-restricted view. I'm pretty sure the booking itself cost £10. The restaurant had a really good atmosphere and the food although a little pricey, you definitely got quality. ", ' I would absolutely visit again. ']
title: Amazing

answer_text: ['Dear IJ83', 'Thank you for reviewing your experience with us.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed food and service as well as the atmosphere to such an extent.', 'I was sorry to read about the oysters and have passed your comments on the kitchen team so they may prevent a recurrence.', 'See you soon hopefully!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Lovely atmosphere, delicious food, excellent wine menu, beautiful live music and wonderful view. (reminded Manhattan)', 'Started with oysters (could be little bit cleaner though) accompanied by cup of Boisdales champagne,', 'Lobster for main courses with lovely and light tomato&avocado salad, grilled portobello mushrooms on the side… mmmmmmmm...', 'For the first time ever tried as well haggis - reminded me my childhood (my grand mum was making that dish - LOVED it!', 'Thank you, Boisdale!']
title: Delicious meal!!!

answer_text: ['Dear Steve B,', 'Thank you for reviewing and I am very pleased to hear you had a great night overall especially that you found the team to be so very helpful.', 'I would like to also briefly talk about your views of Fabien. It was an exceptionally busy night and Fabien was suffering from toothache and had not slept at all the previous night. His appointment at the dentist was not until the following day; yet he did not want to let the team down by not working. As a result he undoubtedly was not on his finest form. I am sorry you felt that he was rude as I can assure you he is most helpful and always dedicated to ensuring our guests are looked after. ', 'I sincerely hope you look past your experience on this occasion and we all look to welcoming you again soon in the near future.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ["My wife and I had an excellent night at Boisdales. It's a great Scottish restaurant with some top food and top live entertainment. It's not cheap but worth the money for sure. The staff were also excellent especially the blonde haired manager/sommelier. But they have to sort someone I found out to be named Fabian. This guy was so very poor at his job he made me laugh. He struts around the place like the lord of the manor, refusing to make eye contact and refusing to be helpful. He is clearly too important to work there - or at least he thinks so. Despite the comically bad waiter/manager, I still give this place top marks and highly recommend it. Check out the live music schedule online to ensure you see something you'll enjoy. "]
title: Excellent night - but what is Fabian all about?!

answer_text: ['Dear Nasalean,', 'Thank you for taking the time to review us even though I am saddened to hear you did not thoroughly enjoy your evening. Please contact me directly under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk, I would like to hear in more detail of your evening.', 'To briefly touch on the music tickets: Prices start from £4.50 but may go up when we have larger shows particularly on weekends. For a quality live band many of whom are part of the finest the UK has to offer, I would argue that this represents excellent value for money.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Food and service is very disappointing, the only good thing I could find in this restaurant is the good music which is life, but for this u will have to pay 20 pounds per person......']
title: Food is disappointing as the service!!!

answer_text: ['Dear RickyTracey,', 'Thank you for visiting and reviewing again!', 'I am delighted we were able to convince you after your first visit to return. You can also look forward to our Sunday Lunch moving to the first floor on the 22nd of June when hopefully the weather is sunny so we may serve our fabulous Summer Sundays on the terraces.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Thought we would try sunday lunch at Boisdale's so glad we did. Fabulous value, food was delicious and wine flowed very freely, or at least for an all in price of £45. Stefan was our waiter and served us a delicious three courses, it was faultless."]
title: 4th Visit, this time Sunday lunch - WOW

answer_text: ['Dear Jonotter,', 'I am sorry to hear you did not enjoy our service.', 'We work very hard to ensure that our guests are looked after to very high standards. The team have to reach over the table when the group is seated on banquette seats as we are unable to serve from behind in this instance; still these seats are very popular as they provide a very communal feel to the table. That the petit fours were eaten by other diners is very unfortunate and we would have been happy to replace them for you; I agree that ideally they should have been served with the coffee. I apologise sincerely if you have found our service below par on this occasion. It certainly does not reflect the standard we aspire to.', 'Of course our menu has a large quantity of whiskies, wines, spirits and cigars; it is what we are along with great live music known for. There is however also a varied and seasonal menu to dine from and we are able to provide soft drinks and should you wish fresh juices.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Food was exceptional, service was poor squashed in and waiting staff who reached across to serve seated customers on inside seats. PetitS fourS served and eaten by other diners before the coffee arrived. Perhaps I should had ordered a Whiskey at £1,368.30 per measure. Menu seem bias towards alcoholic drinks and Cigars.']
title: Poor service.

answer_text: ['Thank you Ann P for your kind review.', 'I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the evening with the fabulous Elio Pace.', 'We work hard to ensure we can provide excellent service and we enjoy our weekends even more when excellent musicians create such an amazing atmosphere. Thank you for choosing us to celebrate!', 'We all look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['A birthday night out for husband, with daughter, son-in -law and myself. Beautiful setting excellent ambiance and the live music was fab - Elio Pace / Billy Joel. (Dancing in the aisles).', 'The food was amazing, good portions, well cooked and well presented. The staff were super, very helpful and nothing was too much trouble. A good selection of wine was available and thoroughly enjoyed.', "I happened to mention to the Maitre'd what a good evening we were having and that it was a birthday celebration and 4 glasses of Champagne appeared - A lovely gesture.", 'You will need to book in advance to secure a table. Look on the website for music schedules.', "We're going back soon for some more. (Jazz next time, I think). I would highly recommend even though it's not cheap - It's sooo worth it.- There is also a Bar and Grill on the lower level with an outside area for smokers and a lovely view over Canary Wharf..", 'Ann P']
title: Jazz, Blues and Soul with Food.

answer_text: ['Dear Ryan G', 'I was sorry to read about your disappointing experience. This certainly does not sum up what we aspire to. Please contact me directly at you convenience under falko@boisdale-cw.uk. I would like to know more.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['The best aspect of this overpriced and overrated Resturant is the whisky bar and the bar staff themselves. ', 'My food consisted of Haggis to start and T-Bone steak for main. Both were average, at least the haggis was moderately priced - the steak was supposed to be rare and came more medium to well done and did nothing to satisfy my taste buds. I suppose that is why Boisdales have a large selection steak sauces.', 'The food service was poor. I was forced to to to the bar to get my own drinks.', "I won't be going again. Very unsatisfied."]
title: Average food and poor service.

answer_text: ['Thank you for you kind review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed it so much. We felt the same way about Sunday lunches, so we launched our own in September. I am very pleased you share our thoughts. From the end of June we will be moving our lunches to our terraces so keep your fingers crossed for great weather!', 'We look forward to seeing you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Its difficult to get a decent Sunday lunch ( ie not cheap, crowded or just dull and mass produced) but Boisdale pulls it off ! The £45 set menu has a choice of starters ( asparagus and ham, prawn cocktail for the retro amongst you, mackerel terrine etc) and a range of mains ( rare roast beef, chicken, pork, fish and a veggie option) and choice of deserts. The bill includes a glass of pink bubbles on arrival and as much house Sauvignon blanc and claret as you can drink - and they don't skimp ! Never an empty glass. Live music is pleasant inthe background, and a decent dessert selection or £5 extra for the rather fine British cheese trolley, means its a quality, well cooked Sunday lunch in spacious surroundings, and is very good value for money. The service on both occasions we have been was absolutely excellent. Despite being all in for the price, you wait, and want, for nothing. For £55 per head you can upgrade to Sancerre and a Rothschild red but the house option is perfectly pleasant. It's spacious, hot well cooked food ( of a traditional Sunday lunch variety) and good service. Give it a go - better than a pub and. More comfy."]
title: Surprisingly good Sunday lunch

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'I was sorry to read of your disappointing experience at our Canary Wharf restaurant.', 'I have spoken to the team to try and ascertain what went wrong. Firstly with regard your party being accommodated on two tables. This is a pre-requisite if you are not taking one of our private dining rooms as the largest single table in the main restaurant would be 12. The email sent to you on 29th March clearly states that you would be accommodated on two tables. Table 82 and Table 76 where you were sat are indeed next to each other.', 'As for the ticket charges, all tables on Friday & Saturday night are required to purchase their tickets in advance. Unfortunately leaving before the show begins, leaves us with no chance to resell the tickets hence we were unable to offer you a refund. Had you bought tickets to see a show at the O2 and decided not to stay, no refund would be offered. The same is true of Ronnie Scott’s or any of London’s theatres.', 'I was very sorry to read that rhubarb crumble was well below par, during this part of the season, when the forced rhubarb, which is a lovely pinkish-red colour ceases to be available we use standard rhubarb which lacks colour and could be undistinguishable from the apple, but you should still have tasted it. Clearly the recipe is not right and I have spoken to the kitchen. The dish is being removed as we are heading into the summer.', 'Cold coffee is obviously a very basic mistake that clearly should not have happened and for this I apologies.', 'I have sent you a private email in the hope that we can restore your trust in our Canary Wharf business.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan Evans']
content: ["Booked in March 2014 for 24 May for a party of 16 for 7.00-7.30 on the 24 May and explained it was for my birthday. Charged £10 a head for 'restricted view' of the band of the evening and told I had to pay a proportion in advance - I paid £100 on my card. Arrived to find they had seated us on two very separate tables, behind each other, which totally wrecked the atmosphere. When I asked what time the music started I was advised is was 9.45. After more complaints to staff that coffees that were cold and bitter tasting and that a rhubarb crumble, that had no rhubarb, we decided to leave. No apology for any of the above and when I asked for a refund as we would not be staying for the music, I was advised that I could only have the £60 cash back I got asked for as I walked in, the £100 was non-refundable. Would I recommend it.............absolutely not. If you have a group booking and want to have good conversation (with all members of your party) and a good atmosphere. Give this a wide miss. Awful"]
title: Boisdale or BOOOdale

answer_text: ['Dear Kabir D', 'Thank you for taking the time to review us.', 'I am delighted that you have had several great meals with us.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Not the first time I have eaten at Boisdale and each time it never fails to disappoint - food, wine and atmosphere are all exceptionally good! ']
title: Exceptional evening

answer_text: ['Dear godot1,', 'Thank you for your charming review. I am delighted you had such a pleasant time with us.', 'Hopefully we are able to welcome you back in the near future.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I loved this restaurant. My two daughters took me there for Mother's Day and we had a superb dinner. It was 3 courses for £55 and champagne on arrival with all wines included. I had the beef which was delicious. There is a nice homely cosy feel in the restaurant and a good ambience. I especially liked the sole singer who had a great voice. There is a small dance floor which was well used. I would thoroughly recommend this restaurant."]
title: Great restaurant for a special occasion

answer_text: ['Dear oi-roy', 'Thank you for joining us on the Bob Marley tribute night.', 'I am disappointed to hear that you did not have the seat you had hoped for. We are very careful with the placement of the tables and work hard to ensure that we get it right. If this was not the case I profusely apologise.', 'There are many fabulous evening coming up and I hope you will give us the chance to restore you faith in us.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Haveing book a table foe four,we went on the terrace to meet our company and have adrink and chat.we was told our table was ready when we were,we went upto the dinnig area and wasshown our table,which was supposed to be primem viewing for the show the table cost £30 a person,our freinds were faceing the stage but did not have a good view,my wife ad self had our backs to the stage and could not see a thing and had to keep turning our heads and necks,which gave us both neck ache', 'Book table for four primum veiwing this cost £30 a head,our guests were faceing the stage but could not see to much,my wife and myself had our backs to the stage and could not see a thing with out turning our heads which was uncomthable very disapointed food was good and service not to bad the parking was good value.', ',.']
title: legend

answer_text: ['Dear JanDLondon,', 'Thank you for returning! I am delighted we were able to restore your faith in us.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon and thanking you personally.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["So I posted a bit of a negative review last time came. Falko the manager picked it up and offered us a comp lunch. It was fabulous. So my last review was all great except food. Now food amazing too. We will be returning again and again. The manager Glen King didn't even know we were a comp until the end and he was amazingly proactive with all the diners"]
title: I have changed my mind!

answer_text: ['Dear indipendente,', 'I am happy you had such a great time. The seats at the front are very popular and often taken by customers who wish to be the first on the dance floor.', 'I am also pleased you found the overall food experience good, but was irked that our crab linguine was too salty on this occasion. We have a very wide range of wines available with prices starting at £18.90 per bottle for the house wines, there are however a further 6 wines available under £30.00.', 'Our opening times from Monday to Saturday are from 11am to midnight, in my opinion it is quite extensive for a restaurant to close at that time even on Saturdays as we are not a club, we will however on request pass on recommendations on venues that are open longer.', 'We hope to welcome you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Came here attracted by the good reviews for both music and food and was not disappointed. We had a very good table near the stage and could enjoy the show to the max. Maybe the volume was a bit too high.', 'Getting here is easy and the underground parking is convenient. Remember to get your parking ticket stamped to get some free parking time.', 'Food was very good. My bisque of lobster was very tasty though it did not contain any bits of lbster, which I would have liked. Reasonably priced at £ 9.50. My tartare was also excellent and passionately prepared by my Portuguese waiter in front of our eyes. My friend had crab linguine which was slightly salty. My other friend had a superb lamb cutlet.', 'Good selection of wines, expensive but this is to be expected in a restaurant like this. We had a good Chablis Fevre at £ 49.50 (why not just say £ 50!) and were happy with it.', 'As customary in London these days, "tip" was included automatically in our bill. Their website advices to "delete it if you are unhappy" but that was not an option presented to us and in any case a very impractical one. Anyway we were very happy with our waiters and would have tipped no matter what. In the end about £65 per person, money well spent.', 'They have a great choice of cigars to be smoked in a terrace that however closes by midnight. Very strange to close at midnight even on a Saturday night!']
title: excellent food, ambiance and service

answer_text: ['Dear Meekat1984,', 'Thank you for writing and thanks to your friend for brining you here.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed our food, the service, our lovingly made cocktails as well as one of our many drams. Please do not wait for your next birthday to return!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I was brought here by my girlfriend for my birthday, predominantly for my love of whisky and their extensive selection.', 'We had a lovely table by the window with a view of The Shard. ', 'I had a steak with a bloody mary sauce (which was really good with a great chilli kick) my girlfriend had the lamb which she said was delicious.', 'Throughout the evening I drank beer, a top notch manhattan and the piece de resistance a Dalmore limited edition that I had never even heard of before going to Boisdale.', "The service throughout the evening was fantastic, we were never rushed and enjoyed soaking in the Friday night atmosphere. I'll definitely be coming back."]
title: Fantastic Birthday Treat

answer_text: ['Dear Jaqueline b,', 'I am disappointed to hear of your experience with us and would like you to contact me personally to discuss your experience. Please feel free to contact me under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk at your convenience.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['We booked a table a few weeks in advance via opentable -- chateaubriand, lobster, prosecco and dessert - The day of the reservation we received a telephone call that we can not have this offer for that evening and can only choose from the normal menu. Also we have to leave before the Jazz band starts playing.... Can you make up your mind within the next 10 minutes otherwise the table will be cancelled. Not surprisingly we cancelled the booking . 15 minutes later she ( Maya?) called again with the same message. She did not apologize and came across quit rude .', 'As we havent seen the restaurant from the inside and most likely will not book again, I am not able to review the food but manners wise the Plateau is a better option in Canary Wharf']
title: didn't manage to get our pre-booked meal

answer_text: ['Dear Barbara_Yang,', 'Thank you for your review and for stopping by after work.', 'Our first floor is designed to be a comfortable space to grab a bite of great food. We have now launched a new summer menu providing more healthy and seasonal dishes, whilst keeping our fabulous steaks and burgers. If you want to have a more cocktail and whisky focused experience, why not try to visit the second floor and be looked after by our bar team there with excellent live music every night?', 'I hope to welcome you soon,', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Came here for a drink and grabbed a quick bite to eat after work. Definitely attracts the CW crowd. Can't say it was anything spectacular but I can imagine that the terrace will be great for the summer.", ' ']
title: Drinks and a quick meal

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review.', 'I am delighted that you were looked after by the team so well.', 'Please visit us again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["We were served by Gervais and our cocktail was made by John. They were more than happy to make our Mai Tai's to our own recipe, which after a disappointing evening was very welcome. Thank you very much!"]
title: Wow, what wonderful service

answer_text: ['Dear Raj C,', 'Thank you for returning again and again. I am delighted you are looked after by Filipe; he is one of our stars.', 'I hope to welcome you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['have been here many times. love the food, the drink, the service and the ambiance. it is well worth a visit. Big thank you to Phillip who is in charge of the cigars....provides a great service every time and goes well above and beyond to look after us. Thank you.']
title: great place

answer_text: ['Dear Joan I,', 'I am delighted your husband chose us to celebrate your special day with. Obviously, I was even more pleased to hear you had such a fabulous time. With any luck we do not have to wait another year to welcome you back.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['My husband booked this restaurant as Ray Gelato and his giant were appearing on my birthday. We had a great table with only one other between us and the stage and centrally placed. Ray is a fantastic entertainer and the dance floor was jam packed with all ages. The food was good too and the service efficient and friendly. A great evening.']
title: Good Food And Live Music

answer_text: ['Dear KarenDenney,', 'I am delighted you had such a wonderful evening and enjoyed all we had to offer.', 'Why don’t you check out our website for exciting upcoming acts, such as Ben Waters on the 16th May?', 'We all look forward to welcoming you back soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Myself and three girlfriends enjoyed a wonderful evening here celebrating a birthday.', "We had a great table very close to the stage and we were entertained by the fantastic Jordan Marsh's Rockin Three. To watch him playing the piano is an absolute joy! ", 'The restaurant is beautiful, service is spot on with lovely staff and the food is to die for! We all had the 9oz rib eye cooked perfectly and loved the cabbage with chorizo. ', 'After dinner we hit the dance floor and were joined by a lovely lady from Sweden who was dining with her husband. She thought the band were great to, and said it was the best night out in London that she had ever had.', "Thank you to all for making it such a special evening and I can't wait to return!"]
title: Fabulous in every way!

answer_text: ['Dear martin g,', 'Thank you for your kind review. Ray has been with us many times & always enjoys great attendance. We have received great feedback for his performance so I am happy to say your impression was not shared. With regards to our menu I appreciate your comments & would like to draw your attention to a new summer menu we will be launching on the 15th May with lots of new contents and exciting price points!', 'We look forward to welcoming you again soon!', 'Falko']
content: ['I entertained at the Boisdale, i have been there on a few occasions , Ray Gelato was the attraction for me , although he gave the impression that he was not enjoying the evening. The food was ok but expensive, i would always recommend Boisdale as a venue, with live music good whisky, there is a shortage of good jazz venues in London, go for fun .']
title: a jazz evening

answer_text: ['Dear Mark G,', 'I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your evening and the resulting complimentary entertainment. I was surprised to hear that you were at no stage informed of the music tickets that are chargeable to all customers. Our staff is well trained on ensuring we communicate this clearly. Our website clearly states the charges, as do all confirmation emails and the reservations team is spot on in clarifying the charges. Still, mistakes are made and we did waiver the charge on this occasion, so I am delighted the team reacted promptly.', 'Why not check our website for an upcoming music act that you may enjoy & start planning you return? We look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['We had a very nice meal and the service was excellent. They had a fantastic selection of wine and the waitresses were very smartly dressed in their short kilts. The only thing you have to watch is if you start eating earlier, as us ten did and the jazz band comes on whilst you are eating they want to charge you for listening to the music which we were not informed of. In our case they wanted £75.00 but were very happy to squash the charge once we complained. All in all excellent all round.']
title: Good night out....

answer_text: ['Thank you for taking the time to review us.', 'I am grateful you are considering us for a family dinner however would also like express my regret for the service not living up to the standards we set ourselves. I cannot bear the thought of the team prioritising guests over others. It is far from what they have been taught; should you have felt that way I do apologise sincerely and will emphasize this with the team.', 'Do let me know when you are planning to return under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk. I would be delighted to help with any arrangements needed.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['I had a super meal here with my son . We were seeking avoid food in pleasant surrounding s as he\'d just moved into a new flat and for myself having spent all day helping him I had high hopes for Boisedale which is very familiar to me in Bishopsgate. The food did not disappoint at all, and jazz as usual complimented our enjoyment of the evening. However, we did rather feel that the staff paid significantly more attention to the "suits" who to be fair are probably regular customers than was paid to ourselves. The bread took some time to arrive and the butter never made an appearance despite a couple of requests. I was considering this venue for a family birthday dinner and I will persevere but I trust that on this occasion the service experienced was just a blip. I would just counsel staff to bear in mind do not always judge a book by its cover and bear in mind that all Customers are equal.!']
title: Great meal, superb music, just a slight niggle

answer_text: ['Thank you for your feedback.', 'I was sorry to hear you felt we were not friendly; usually one of the things we are most praised on. I have already reiterated with the team how important it is to always focus on the customer. While the waitress of course has to prepare for dinner service, her priority should have clearly been on you. Your comments of the food have been passed on to our Executive Head Chef and are appreciated. I would like to add that our steaks are premium dry aged & from grass fed cattle. In terms of flavour they are superior and we feel that we are very competitive in terms of pricing in this area.', 'Should you return in the future, please do let us know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk we would love to show you why so many customers enjoy our service.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['My wife and I walked in without any booking, as we happened to be in the vicinity at dinner time. We were attended by a young lass who was more interested in setting the tables for the night than waiting on us. Granted that the restaurant is located in a business district and mostly patronised by suits, and we had walked-in in our civvies. But that should not relegate us to less attention that the business-types. The steaks we had were great, but with prices to match. Chips and steamed brocolli were extra, but they could have been a bit more generous with the quantity. All up it could have been a better experience, but it failed to hit the mark for me.']
title: Good food, but less than friendly atmosphere

answer_text: ['Thank you for your great review; I am delighted you enjoyed your stay here.', 'We have just made some excellent changes on our terrace and it now looks like a cosy English garden. You should definitely see it for yourself.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Boisdale Canary Wharf is lighter and more airy than its Bishopgate brother, with a glass front over Cabot Square, and an outside balcony for drinks. The great cocktail menu, live music, and fantastic steaks from other Boisdales are still all present. Seriously, this is probably the best steak I've had outside of New York."]
title: Great steak in Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Westbnd,', 'Thank you for your review & for enjoying our offerings. We look forward to welcoming you back.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['we were lucky to get a table on a Thursday night, good place, nice atmosphere, food ok, sigar lounge excellent and a rarity in London.']
title: nice one in CW

answer_text: ['Thank you for you lovely review.', 'I am delighted to hear you had a marvellous time and would appreciate you letting me if you are planning to return under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk. I would like to thank you in person.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Nice atmosphere. The food portions were a little small, but the quality of the food more than made up for that. Nice Jazz music, and followed by a cigar downstairs in the cosy cigar room. Great dining experience and would certainly go to again if in the are in the near future.']
title: Great food, music and experience

answer_text: ['Andrew G,', 'Thank you for your review. I am happy you enjoyed it.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Recently had dinner at Boisdale's in Canary Wharf. Good Oysters. Good Steaks. Good Cocktails. Enough Said!"]
title: Oysters. Steaks. Cocktails.

answer_text: ['Dear DorisDiner,', 'Thank you for your comments on your visit.', 'I was alarmed to hear that you did not find the welcome on the first floor friendly and I will certainly be focussing with the staff on making sure no repeat of your situation arises. That said I was happy to hear that the remainder of your visit turned out to be exactly what we like to achieve.', 'We hope to be able to welcome you back soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I had lunch here on a Friday with a colleague. As it was my first visit I wasn't quite sure where to go once inside the building and there were not many members of staff around. When I eventually did find someone, they were not particularly welcoming (bordering on unfriendly) so I was starting to regret the choice of venue before I had even sat down.", "That said, the food was good, as was the service and the wine list. The restaurant wasn't at all busy, which surprised me a little - I had expected it to be packed. Overall, the meal itself was really enjoyable. We then went to the balcony area and had drinks - the bar service was excellent. The staff were quite the opposite to the person I had met earlier and this made up for the previous disappointment. I would have happily stayed long into the evening, to soak up some more of the vibrant atmosphere. I'll definitely make a point of going back, most likely for one of the live music events."]
title: The atmosphere made it...

answer_text: ['Dear Charles,', 'Thanks for your review.', 'I was sorry to hear that service was slow on the day in question, but pleased you enjoyed the food. I would love to have more detail on your booking so I could dig a little deeper and prevent a recurrence. If you get a chance drop me an email at Nathan@boisdale.co.uk.', 'Best wishes,', 'Nathan']
content: ['Great location over looking Cabot Square. Had a McSween haggis and a Loch Duart smoked salmon to start. Service was slow and impersonal. The claret and the whisky was also impressive. The desserts were also very lovely. Overall we were both mostly impressed.']
title: Great location although service was a little slow

answer_text: ['Dear Christine,', 'We were delighted to read your review of Sunday Lunch.', 'Since September last year the lunches on Sunday have gone from strength-to-strength and we are committed to continuing with our set menu with inclusive wine offer so we can deliver a great value Sunday lunch in convivial surroundings, to the soundtrack of classic jazz performed live..', 'We look forward to welcoming you back to the restaurant very soon.', "Perhaps your son may consider treating you to our Mother's Day special menu with a bigger band & gift for deserving mothers!", 'Best wishes,', 'Nathan']
content: ["Following a recommendation, we decided to try the Sunday lunch my son had enthused about and we weren't disappointed. Lovely welcome as we entered the restaurant and at the bar where we were not hurried to our table but allowed to take our time. Great table by the window and we opted for the all inclusive three course lunch with wine priced at (I think) £49 pp. Excellent value as the waiter was generous with the wine (good quality), included a glass of Champagne before lunch and a choice of starter, main course and pudding with a choice of cheese for a small supplement. Worth mentioning is the roast served with lovely well cooked vegetables, delicious pudding and a truly sublime English Cheeseboard selection from a well stocked trolley. Probably wouldn't bother again with the prawn cocktail as this was really rather average. Having the jazz band play throughout lunch was the icing on the cake. We will definitely be making a return visit."]
title: Gorgeous Sunday Lunch

answer_text: ['Thank you for you lovely review.', 'It was nice to read that you took advantage of all our offerings. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed yourselves so much. Please let us know when you return under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk. W We would love to say thank you in person.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['The restaurant is nicely split up and we enjoyed a drink in the Oyster bar, dinner and Jazz in the restaurant and spent time in the cigar lounge. Staff were attentive especially the whisky master and our host in the cigar lounge. The oysters were very nice and all our courses were well presented and value for money considering the location. I was given a blanket to allow us to sit outside in the terrace while my partner smoked his cigar, you cannot drink alcohol in the lounge itself. all in all nice evening. We will definately be back']
title: Great venue and food

answer_text: ['Thank you for taking the time to review us.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the setting and service. With regards to the food I am very sorry we did not live up to you expectations on this particular night. Scallops are sourced from Scotland and are diver caught. It may have been very popular on the day or the weather in Scotland may have been too bad to go out and dive for them. With regards to both salmon dishes, I cannot help but be surprised that you though them flavourless. All of our salmon is hand reared and the closest thing to wild salmon; the fish being able to roam freely in vast waters. We only ever receive positive feedback on the quality of this fish. The crab linguine not only has a crab claw sitting on top, but also white and brown crab meat through the sauce, which is shellfish based, so it should provide you with lots of intense shellfish flavours. Again I would like to apologise if you felt this was not the case. On another up I was pleased to read you enjoyed the crumble and the cheese selection. Mistakes may always be made and I hope you will visit us again in the future. Should you wish to do so, kindly let me know under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk. ', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Walking into the restaurant you are quite over-whelmed with the beautiful decor. A wonderful looking bar decorated with an amazing selection of whiskey. The table was well presented and the staff were extremely attentive. Once seated we looked at the menu and were pleased with what sounded like a lovely choice of foods although we were told that there were no scallops which my wife had been looking forward to. i plumped for the salmon for starters which was average and i must say i have had better when in Scotland. My main selection was the crab linguine which i was very much looking forward to. What came out was a tasty sauce although very thick and one piece of crab sitting on the pasta. My partner went for a second choice potted smoked mackerel which was standard followed by salmon which could have done with more flavour. Desert was the crumble which my wife informed me was wonderful whilst i decided to go for the cheese board which was the highlight for me. A great selection which were all wonderful. Overall an average experience but that it just my feelings although friends i know love the place and are regular visitors.']
title: Nice setting however average food

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review of Burns Night.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed your evening as well as the entertainment. Our Burns Nights have become more and more popular and it is always on of the busiest evenings of the year. I recall the dance floor being quite crowded, however I always feel it is a good sign if people want to dance. The issues on your bill should not have happened of course and I am very sorry that you feel this spoilt your evening. I am sure that the management were as fast as possible to rectify the problem with your bill; though I appreciate if you felt this took too long. We would all be happy to welcome you back and if you let us know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk which night would be of interest, we will be happy to assist with all the arrangements.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['We went on Burns night and had a good time. The rat pack duo were as entertaining as always and the small dance floor was overcrowded but still a lot of fun. The food was good and the service reasonable. The only issue was a dispute with our bill as we had been charged with another tables wine and it took some considerable time for the management to acknowledge the error which totally spoilt the night and as it was my birthday it left a sour taste. We will go back but will be very careful to note what we have next time as we were not the only ones with errors.']
title: desrves 5 stars because of the entertainment but lower because of billing issue

content: ['Visited Boisdale last night with a large party of people. Booked by another family member who had numerous problems with booking prior to arrival. Told we could have a la carte and then told was a mistake. Then agreed to let us have a la carte provided we pre ordered. No problem but the choice sent to us was less than the original menu - all the cheaper options were removed. Eventually after negotiations were given the normal menu. Then we asked if we could bring a birthday cake for an 80th birthday and were told that they would charge us £2.50 per person. That was going to be £65.00 just to cut a cake and put on plates! What on earth do they charge the 12.5% service charge for.', 'As for the food, very disappointing. Braised lamb very fatty, lamb chops very tough, scallops overcooked, chocolate fondant powdery, sticky toffee pudding over microwaved as became tougher when eating. Very expensive too for the quality of the food.', "Entertainment - Frank Sinatra. Also disappointing sang for the very most for 70 minutes and actually wasn't all that good. I have seen many tribute Frank Sinatra/Rat Pack shows and he was not a patch on all the others.", 'Overall not good value for money - having said that we had a great night but that was because of the fact we have a fantastic family who always have a great time and make the best of a bad situation. No-one complained on the night as we wanted the special person whose birthday it was to have a fantastic time and thankfully she did!']
title: Disappointing!

answer_text: ['Dear SCSLondon,', 'Thank you for your kind review, I am happy that you enjoyed your meal and the ambience. When we chose our buns we tried many varieties and collectively chose our bun. We felt that the slight sweetness actually brings out the flavours in the burger better than any other we tried. I am sorry you thought it too sweet. While we do offer finer items on the menu that have their deserving price point, I would reason that we offer house wine starting from £18.90 a bottle and it is easily possible to have a two course meal for under £25.00 per person so while we are definitely able to provide that special occasion, we can also deliver excellent value meals; hopefully you can agree.', 'I look forward to being able to welcome you back very soon.', 'Warm regards.', 'Falko']
content: ['We ate in the restaurant as we had booked for a music event and the only way to guarantee a seat was to book for dinner. The decor and ambience of the place was nice with the tables spaced out well allowing for a good view of the stage. We were greeted warmly and quickly given menus. We were given two small pieces of bread each but no butter. The waiter quickly brought us some when we pointed it out. He was very friendly and pleasant throughout the evening. We selected oysters to share for starters, which were nicely presented on ice and tasted fresh. We chose the classic burger and truffle burger for mains. Both were cooked really well and I enjoyed the truffle flavour of mine. I was much less impressed with the burger bun which was too sweet. The fries were good. I would say that the portion size was on the small side, particularly as the burgers are quite pricey. For desserts we had the chocolate fondant and crumble, which were both nice. The wine was a malbec which went nicely with the burgers. Overall we enjoyed the evening but spent around £100 on top of the price of the tickets, so it is an experience to save for a special occasion.']
title: Pleasant evening of music and food

answer_text: ['Thank you for your delightful review.', 'I am pleased to hear you thought so highly of us. Naturally we are all looking forward to welcoming you back in the near future, maybe for our Mothering Sunday Lunch or perhaps to enjoy Breakfast on the first floor when we open for the London Marathon this year. You will have great views as the field is running just below our terraces.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['We book this restaurant as we wanted a Sunday ', 'Lunch with Live Jazz and this came up on an internet search!', 'Our aunt & uncle were celebrating 60years of marriage and the love Jazz! ', 'I was more than pleased with our choice, the food was great,the ambience perfect & the service second to none! ', 'We opted for the £45 Sunday lunch with drinks. Sparkling pink wine aperitf and free flowing white & red wine throughout! Excellent value for money I thought.', 'I will definitely be back here with my girlfriend to one of the other evenings,', 'Thank you for making the oldies feel special! ']
title: Very enjoyable Sunday Lunch Celebration

answer_text: ['I truly sorry that the food was below standard on you visit to Sunday Lunch.', 'I would be grateful if you contact me under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk to discuss the issues further.', 'Thank you for taking the time to relay your experience.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Sunday Jazz brunch. Roast beef was raw - hey I love it rare but it didn't look like it had even been in the oven. Yorkshires were burnt. Duck fat potatoes were dry (yes, how did they manage that?) and carrots so hard they were almost raw (again I'm loving al dente but you need to cook them a bit). Everything was cold. Such a shame as I would have returned again and again."]
title: Everything is right about this place except the food!

answer_text: ['Thank you for sharing your thoughts.', 'I was disappointed to hear you found the toilets in a poor state; I have already taken this to the duty manager as they perform checks though all areas, this must have not happened & I am truly ashamed of this.', 'With regards to your feelings on the service & food I am surprised as we receive so much great feedback on the warmth & quality of the service, and selling in excess of 500 hamburgers a week the vast majority of customers comment that they are some of the best burgers they have tasted.', 'That being said, mistakes can happen and it seems that you had to suffer on this occasion.', 'Please let me know directly under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk should you wish to return for the mentioned visit to the first floor.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['1930’s splendour greeted me in the vibrant and elegant Boisdales restaurant. On entry the first thing that struck me was a sparkling bar, heaving with top end whisky’s and crystal decanters. We were seated at a leather booth table with a curved glass window opposite boasting dramatic views of Canary Wharf. Throughout the afternoon we were serenaded by live jazz music from an exuberant band on a spot-lit stage.', 'Sadly, the impressive décor is where the breathtaking elements of this restaurant halted. Although the service obeyed all the rules of high standards of etiquette, it was cold, and unfortunately so were our orders. The food arrived at different times, was confused and chaotic. The shiny façade of Boisdales was cracked by the substandard food reflected in the £17 truffle hamburger which was below average and a poorly presented undercooked plate of lamb.', 'That said, the encyclopaedic wine list and covetable cocktail menu coupled with a second to none ambience means that Boisdales would serve as a fantastic place to visit for a drinks with friends.', 'Should you wish to visit, you will find that the restaurant has a car park below in Cabot Square, although this appears to have no allocated disabled parking. A ramp with automatic doors leads up to the lifts, which take you directly into the spacious lobby of the restaurant. The restaurant is bright and airy and the flooring is wooden. There are no awkward doors or passageways. The tables are a good width apart from each other and there is a free cloakroom. There is a wide entrance to the disabled toilet, though there is an annoying little ridge to get into the toilet, which takes a bit of force to get the wheelchair over. Sadly, the disabled toilet has been neglected, and was dirty, smelly and unkempt. ', 'Personally, I would visit the oyster grill on the 1st floor of Boisdales sooner than the restaurant. It boasts the biggest cigar humidifier in the world, a balcony that overlooks Canary Wharf and a selection of the finest caviar that I’ve always wanted to try. In terms of access Boisdales ticks most of the boxes for a fairly stress free night out, although beware it does get very busy.']
title: Disabled Access and Review of Boisdales

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'I was very sorry to read that you had such a disappointing time at our restaurant.', "We sell hundreds of burgers a week, including between 60 - 100 takeaway on Fridays to the offices in Canary Wharf and normally receive excellent feedback. I can only imagine that you received a substandard product and for that I am very sorry. You will see from the majority of our reviews that service levels are high and we received a tripadvisor certificate of excellence last year, I'm sorry however that the service fell so short on this occasion. ", 'Perhaps you could contact the restaurant directly so I can find out more about the booking and respond in an appropriate manner.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan J Evans']
content: ['Had a evening booked with some friends had not read any reviews before going and was looking forward to it.', 'menu was very expensive not worth the money we paid, I can honestly say I have eaten a better buger in Mcdonalds the service was poor asked for some sauce with my meal but the waiter never even came back.', 'I have never writen a review but felt I had to on this occasion,on the train on my way home!']
title: Very disappointed with the evening poor service poor food

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', "Thank you for taking time to review our restaurant. We were delighted to hear that you are happy to recommend Boisdale, but did want to clarify the ticket breakdown for Valentines' night and the service charge procedure.", 'The £100 ticket per person (including vat @ 20%) was made up as follows:', 'Glass of Dom Perignon 2004 Vintage Champagne £22.50', 'Ticket for the show £20.00 ', 'Five course dinner (Including Fillet of Beef Wellington) £57.50', 'Tea or coffee was included', 'I have looked at your bill which shows a final total of £238.45. The service element of your bill was £22.05. When you deduct the music tickets of £40 from your bill which does not attract service charge the percentage is 9.2% not 20%.', 'We have received excellent feedback on the Fil Straughn show and service on the evening and feel that the ticket price represented good value for money.', 'We currently have an excellent set menu at £17.80 for two course and house wine starts from £18.90. So outside of special nights like Valentines we are very accessible.', 'We look forward to welcoming you back to Boisdale soon', 'Warm wishes,', 'Nathan']
content: ['The Valentines evening set menu with Luther Vandross tribute was quite expensive at £100.00 / person plus your drinks but when they then add on a 20% service charge it gets very expensive.', 'An average meal with good service and a fantastic band / singer was totaly spoilt be getting hit for the service charge.', 'Happy to recommend Boisdales but be aware that they realy do know how to charge and what you pay for your ticket is not actualy what they will charge you come the end of the evening.']
title: Add on another 20%

answer_text: ['Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.', 'I was pleased to hear you visited us on a number of occasions.', 'With regards to your ranking of the restaurant values, I would like to address the order of importance to us. We are firstly a British restaurant with Scottish heritage intent on delivering great food & drinks to the highest standards. Our service should go along hand in hand with this. Then additionally we provide the music, which should always be first class.', 'We constantly review bands that have joined us. This helps us find the right music for us. As you have mentioned the Strictly Steve show was with us twice in the prior year and both occasions sold out. They have a great reputation and all three visits (including this) have provided great feedback. I am sorry they were not to your taste. Should your wish to discuss your thoughts regarding the food on this occasion further, please contact me directly under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk. ', 'I look forward to hearing from you.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Myself and my friends, booked a table for the Stevie Wonder night featuring Strictly Stevie. I have visited Boisdale Canary Wharf 5 or 6 times and Knightsbridge once. ', "I always start off with a few drinks downstairs in the bar and then moving upstairs for dinner. On this occasion I was really looking forward to the entertainment for the evening but after a few numbers with little or no introduction I said to my friend this must be the warm up band or something or maybe the singer has been held up or delayed. No such luck, after a few more songs we realised that this was it for the night, the guy just can't sing and the lady was holding the act together.", 'This band may have played to packed houses twice in 2013 but there were a number of empty table this night, 2 right near the stage. ', ' My friend commented that they were no better than a pub band. ', 'As for the food at venues like this I put the order of importance as Music, Drinks, Food, on this particular night the drinks and service were great the food was average and the music very average, my 3 stars are only for this night in particular as I have had some great nights here but I think if a restaurant is charging a couple of thousand pounds for entertainment I would expect something a bit better. ']
title: GREAT VENUE, GREAT SERVICE, AVERAGE FOOD, VERY AVERAGE BAND THE NIGHT I VISITED

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review.', 'I am happy to hear you enjoyed service and music; though was rather disappointed that you chose to mark us down so heavily. You are the first customer to have raised this issue and I have already taken action to amend the situation.', 'E-cigarettes are made predominately from vegetable extract and the vapour is harmless, unlike smoke. They have been specifically designed to enable smokers to care for their needs in places where cigarettes are banned. They do not contravene any smoking legislation and a number of very public places allow their use such as Gatwick & Heathrow airports.', 'While it is perfectly legal for their use in any form of restaurant I have decided to restrict the use of e-cigarettes in the dining area of the restaurant, but will still allow their use on the first floor & the second floor bar area.', 'I hope this clarifies the situation and hopefully you can see that we take your feedback seriously.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['The food was good, the music by TJ Johnson was excellent but the evening was rather spoiled by the person smoking an e-cigarette at the next table who was constantly blowing smoke in my direction. I raised the matter with the restaurant staff and asked, if it was a non smoking establishment, why was smoking e-cigarettes allowed. Unfortunately I just got a shrug of the shoulders.']
title: What a shame

answer_text: ['Thank you for your wonderful review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed your evening and since you live just around the corner I hope to welcome you again in the very near future. ', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
