content: ['Great food, great evening...great music, thanks to Si Cranstoun.', 'Living across the water in Greenwich, had always wanted to visit Boisdale and finally got the chance.', 'Wait was worth it.', 'Considering the surroundings, v reasonably priced food and excellent, unstuffy, friendly service.', 'Had an juicy rib eye (although could have done with a few more chips).', "Next time I'll go with my daughter's dish, a taste-sensation risotto.", 'Make sure u get your car parking ticket stamped before leaving - you get three hours free parking.', 'And have a spicy Bloody Mary...bloody delicious.', 'All in all, a great venue.']
title: Excellent!

answer_text: ['Thank your for your great review.', 'I am delighted you and your wife enjoy visiting us. We are obviously proud you regard our food offering in such high regard and can appreciate the wide selection of luxuries we have to offer. I would however like to point out that while certain items are dearer than others (grass fed 40 dry aged Fillet Steaks from Scottish beef is more valuable than most corn fed American rivals) there are plenty excellent choices that enable you to enjoy a dinner or lunch on a budget ranging from Crab & Chilli Linguine over Salmon with caponata to excellent Scottish rib steak Hamburgers.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['When working at Canary Wharf, this is one of my wifes and I favorite place. ', 'We have tried nearly all the fish and seafood, and it is impeccable, considering that its close to Billingsgate fish market I would expect nothing less. ', "We have been here numerous times, even on a Frank Sinatra night which was really very good. The steaks here are some of the best we have ever had. The selection of wine, cigars and whiskey is extensive and something for everyone's palate.", 'The place is expensive, but it is satisfying and very pleasant.', 'Would recommend the fruit de mar if you love sea food!']
title: Love this place

answer_text: ['Thank you for your charming review.', 'I am delighted to hear you have tried the Lamb and as a result joined us. The Sunday roast lunch offer is indeed great value for money. Having only started serving Sundays in September we tweaked our initial offer and are now more than pleased with is and as such we are happy to hear you are too!', 'Thank you for also mentioning the service; something I take great pride in on delivering with the team.', 'We look forward to welcoming you back.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Having stayed at "the Lamb" and enjoying stunning food, come this valentines we decided we simply must try the Boisdale Sunday roast, as a belated valentines dinner.', 'Fabulous lively surroundings and lovely staff giving great service.', 'We had a lovely afternoon and fantastic food, although we struggled with 3 generous courses the food was simply divine.', 'We will definately book again and look forward to our next visit. ']
title: The best value 3 course Sunday roast!

answer_text: ['Thank you for your charming review.', 'I could not help but smile at your surprise of the ambience; it is great to hear the eclectic but classic décor is appreciated. I look forward to welcoming you back soon! ', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Very surprised at the lovely surroundings and view from tis restaurant : food was lovely and the staff were very helpful: ', 'Expensive but worth it ']
title: Beautiful restaurant

answer_text: ['Thank you for visiting us and writing about your stay.', 'I am happy you enjoyed food and service to such a degree. I would be delighted if you could join us again soon. Please let me know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk should you wish to visit again.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Visited recently for a meal and wasn't disappointed. The food was all very nice and the service excellent. Our waiter was very helpful and pleasant. No complaints at all and would happily return"]
title: Loved it, great impressive venue.

answer_text: ['Yes! Thank you for your lovely review. I am thrilled you had such a good time & obviously happy to hear the team looked after you so well. Please let us know when you return to visit under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk and we will make sure to thank you personally!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["If I'm visiting London any time soon, then this is where I'll head for a good evening. Great food, helpful staff, malt whiskies galore and jazz of course. In particular, the fish is excellent and cooked with care. This is rather a famous club and deservedly so."]
title: One of London's Best Venues

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you so much for your lovely review which filled the team with pride.', 'We have passed on your compliments to Jorge - the Portuguese waiter who served you that afternoon and to the kitchen and very much look forward to welcoming you back to Boisdale Canary Wharf very soon.', 'Best wishes,', 'Nathan']
content: ['We wish it were possible to give a better rating than "excellent". Everything about this restaurant was excellent+++ ', 'The street level entrance is very modest, but get the lift to the second floor and it opens out into a cavernous restaurant. The first thing that you notice is the stunning central bar feature with several hundred varieties of Whisky!!', 'The tables were set with crisp white linen tablecloths and napkins.', 'We had booked for the traditional Sunday lunch and had a table for two by the window overlooking the Canary Wharf concourse. For Sunday lunch there was live jazz entertainment. The restaurant filled up quickly - clearly being very popular and there was a lively atmosphere.', 'We chose the traditional Sunday lunch three-course menu costing £45 which included a starter glass of Champagne plus unlimited white and red wine and they were most generous topping up the glasses. For non-wine drinkers, the lunch is also available without wine for £35.', 'We were served by a Portuguese waiter who was personable, attentive and highly professional', 'For starters we had ham hock & foie gras terrine and potted smoked mackerel. Both of these were exceptionally good. ', 'For main course we both chose roast rib of beef carved from the trolley, which was accompanied by crisp Yorkshire puddings, duck fat roast potatoes, whole carrots and wilted greens and again was excellent. ', "For dessert we chose the cheeseboard trolley option costing an additional £4.50. The Maitre D' was impressive not just naming but also providing descriptions of the around 20 cheeses on the cheese trolley. - excellent at his job.", 'For the overall experience of atmosphere, quality of food, presentation and attentiveness of the serving staff we would say that Boisdale Canary Wharf was definitely the very best Sunday traditional lunch that we have had and we cannot rate this restaurant more highly.']
title: Oustanding. Excellent. Exceptional. Impeccable service.

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the atmosphere of the venue & the service provided. With regards to your comments on the food I apologise should it not have been to your standards. We sell a great amount of the Seafood Bisque, made only of finest Scottish seafood it displays a rich, intense flavour, and we receive tremendous feedback for it. Over the past 2 years we have seen a big shift in our customer base preferring lighter, healthier & more carefully seasoned dishes, so we do err on the side of caution when preparing our dishes, however Maldon Salt and Pepper grinders are available at every table; so additional seasoning may be added according to personal preference. I am happy to hear that our chocolate fondant hit the sweet spot! Our menu has been designed to provide ample choice for all diners and tastes & a wide variety of price ranges are available starting from 22GBP for a three course lunch. I hope to welcome you back in the very near future.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['I went with my friend to experience a quality scotish sea food. Atmosfear is great abd staff are good too. We ordered lobster seafood soup which was average then we had grilled salmone for the main was okay,salamon was not seasoned and plant with eggplant souce which was nicely seasoned but not going very well with the salmone. We had chocolete foundate for desserts which was lovely. I will go again to listen to the band as we left early that day. I recommend the place for the nice atmosfear though its a bit pricy for what you get. ']
title: Good experience average food

answer_text: ['Wow!', 'Thank you for you lovely & extensive review.', 'We pride ourselves on our service and British food, so your comments went down a treat! I am delighted we were able to compensate for the terrible weather, something I unfortunately cannot control, yet. I am also very pleased to hear you booked because of the review posted by other members of TA. It is nice to know that our reviews are making an impact. When you do get the chance to come again, please let us know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk and we will make sure to say hello & thank you personally!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I took a chance on booking a surprise dinner at Boisdales for my husband's birthday in December as didn't know of anyone that had been and made my decision on the basis of the reviews here on TA! I was a little apprehensive as we were with two friends, it was a filthy night and due to train problems we drove from Essex. I was therefore hoping we were not going to be disappointed. ", 'I need not have worried. We had a fantastic night. The decor is fab with tartan carpet, sounds awful but works brilliantly, moose heads and so many whiskies displayed I thought it was an optical illusion!! ', 'My husband had the haggis which was amazing. Two of us had the smoked mackerel which was a delight. For mains my husband and I both had the fillet steak burger with black truffle mayo, field mushrooms and gruyere. Oh my - heaven on a plate. Accompanied with probably one of the best home made fries ever!! They were nicely salted, crispy and cooked with the skins on.', "I had emailed the restaurant in advance to say it was a birthday but had totally forgotten and it was a lovely surprise when a complementary sticky toffee pudding plate came out with Happy Birthday written around the side of the plate. He wasn't going to have a dessert but this would have been the one he would have chosen. Thanks very much for doing this for him, however sadly for him we all dived in and it was delicious.", "There is live music every night here and the patron is Jools Holland so although we had to pay an extra £4.50 per head for this with restricted view, I wasn't concerned as am sure Jools wouldn't put his name to an establishment unless the quality of the perfomers were excellent. And they were. I'm afraid I can't remember their names but they were superb and made the evening such great fun.", 'I have no hesitation at all in recommending this great restaurant - really refreshing to have great live music, great food and the staff were very friendly and helpful which is so important and can make or break a meal in my opinion.', 'Well done we will definitely be back.']
title: Great place. Great Atmosphere. Quirky - loved it!

answer_text: ['Thank you for your great review.', 'I am really pleased you enjoyed the service as well as the band. We have a very extensive menu, thanks to the many wonderful ingredients Britain has to offer. To ensure our services run as smooth as possible & minimise the impact for all our customers, we have to narrow down the choices. This is customary in most restaurants. I hope this clarifies the situation & look forward to welcoming you soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Frank Sinatra tribute night with a big band. The entertainment and service was fantastic. The food was good, but as we were a party of twelve the choices were not great']
title: Wonderful experience

answer_text: ['We have only started serving Sunday lunches at the end of October, so I am delighted you enjoyed the afternoon. The Sunday lunch really is amazing value for money & the dry aged Scottish beef being slow cooked for hours in the oven is just what you need on Sundays. Why don’t you try one of our sharing roasts (whole roast suckling pig, saddle of venison or leg of lamb, just look on our website for more details...)', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Four of us went for Sunday Lunch. Started with Bloody Mary's which were excellent then went for the set menu which included as much red or white wine that you wanted to drink. Very good choice of food considering it was a set menu. Two of us had the beef and two had the pork both served with a good selection of vegetables and it was all very good. My friends assured me that the puddings were extremely good but I opted for the cheeseboard and wasn't disappointed despite having to pay a little extra for it.", 'Live music playing in the background throughout the lunchtime period also added to the experience. All in all a very nice afternoon !']
title: Great Lunch

answer_text: ['Thank you for your charming review.', 'I was pleased see you return and more so that you again enjoyed yourselves. I can only agree that Jordan was fabulous and we cannot wait to have him back on the 6th February! Hopefully I will be able to see you then.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Have been to Boisdales before and had a superb evening so reserved a table for seven situated at the front of the stage as we heard the same band, The Jordan Marsh Band, were there again. Once again, the food was great, a new menu with plenty of choice, the lobster bisque is wonderful and the steaks are superb! Our waiter was attentive all evening making sure everything was ok. The restaurant has a great ambience and the atmosphere when the band started playing was electric! Only into the second song of their first set, people we up and dancing and that is how the evening progressed. We all agreed that we had had an absolutely wonderful evening, culminating in the men of our group retreating to the cigar lounge once the band had left the stage. All in all a fantastic evening, can't wait to return."]
title: A great start to 2014

answer_text: ['Thank you for your lovely review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the New Year’s Eve night. We ourselves enjoyed it so much it did not feel like work at all! Suspiciously Elvis really knows how to put on a show. For the next time around we’ve already booked a certain legendary Swedish pop act tribute… ', 'Please visit again soon and let us know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you plan on returning.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Absolutely superb night to see in the New Year! ', 'Started with drinks in the bar, gambling on the casino tables, dinner in the restaurant which was lovely, food was great, then Elvis impersonator and his band and dancing girls rocked the night away till the bells chimed. Then could see the lights and fireworks across London from the terrace.']
title: What a night!

answer_text: ['Thank you for visiting again and sharing your experience with us.', 'I am delighted Fernando looked after you so well; he has been wonderful since joining us as a food runner almost two years ago, and now he is one of our most popular waiters. As all our staff are rewarded when mentioned in despatches, Fernando can look forward to a small surprise next weekend. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Following my previous review I said that Boisdales had the potential to be my new favourite place. Well after last Saturday night it is. We didn't have the best seats or the best view but we had the best waiter, (Fernando) the best cocktails and the best steak whilst listening to a fabulous singer. Thank you, we plan on visiting on the 30th January, like I said my new favourite place !!!"]
title: so much better, service was fantastic, food and cocktails oh yes !!!!

answer_text: ['Thank you for commenting on your experience & for choosing us to host your Christmas lunch. We roast our Haggis for maximum flavour so I am pleased you enjoyed this. I was saddened to hear your steaks had been overcooked; I can only apologise profusely for this as this should not have been the case. Our meat is cut from highest quality grass fed Aberdeenshire cattle and dry aged between 21 and 40 days depending on the cut ensuring to ensure best flavour and texture, having been slightly overdone will have impacted on the flavour and as such may lead to you preferring others on this occasion. Still I am delighted you enjoyed the atmosphere and the service we particularly pride ourselves on. ', 'I look forward to welcoming you back soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Took some clients to Boisdale Canary Wharf for Christmas lunch for a group of 8. Most of us had the haggis as starter, which was excellent. We all opted for steaks as the main. The quality of the meat was good, but I'd say probably not as good as Goodman and Hawksmoor. Also they were cooked more well done than we asked.", 'Nevertheless the service and the atmosphere was good.']
title: Great place for business lunch

answer_text: ['Thank you for your kind review.', 'I am happy you enjoyed your evening with us. We tend to have a wide variety of music on display ranging from classic jazz tunes over blues, to soul a little rock (&roll)… so see out website for more detail of upcoming shows. Personally I am looking forward to the return of the ‘Bohemians’ a Queen tribute; they were just sensational last time.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Had a chance to get tickets to the Las Vegas night, atmosphere was great and the people there on a Saturday night were all having a great time!']
title: Great Xmas night

answer_text: ['Dear Roger,', "Thank you for your recent review. We were delighted to hear that you are both a frequent visitor and that you find the service 'excellent and very friendly'", 'I was sorry to read however of your disappointment with the Fillet Steak on your last visit.', 'The pre-cooked steak weights are approximate and we randomly check all the beef at the point of delivery. What you must consider is the weight of the bone which if removed is at least two ounces. leaving the weight of the meat itself at 8 - 10oz. So actually only a few ounces more than the tornado fillet at 7oz. One also has to consider the cooking temperature as the longer it cooks the more prone to shrinkage. What you are really paying the premium for, is the additional flavour that is derived from the bone marrow as it leaks into the meat during the cooking process, giving it, in my opinion a far superior flavour. There is also the possibility that it slipped through the net and was simply under-weight, for this we apologise. ', 'I would be very grateful if you could contact us on manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk so we can ensure your next visit is memorable on the beef front!', 'Kind regards,', 'Nathan J Evans']
content: ['Went here last Saturday night with friends.Have been several times before so knew what to expect.Firstly the service is excellent from very friendly staff.The entertainment like last year was a great way to start Christmas however the ability to dance on these nights which most people enjoy is compromised by the minute area allowed for dancing.The food was generally good with a couple of exceptions from the norm.Two of us had the fillet steak,one on the bone and the other not.The on the bone steak is supposed to be 10-12oz and the other half that.Despite paying a premium of well over £30 it was very small,in fact smaller than the 6-7oz one.An establishment that prides itself on the quality of its meat must make sure that portions reflect the price one is paying,not leaving customers feeling overcharged for a small piece of albeit very good steak.']
title: Start to Christmas

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'WOW - thank you so much for a lovely review which filled the team with pride.', 'We were delighted that you rated it a five star experience and look forward to welcoming you back very soon. ', 'Be sure to send us an email on manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk before your next visit so we can thank you personally.', 'Best wishes,', 'Nathan J Evans']
content: ["We went to Boisdale with friends for the first time on Saturday, for the christmas show - and what a great way to start the festive season! Everything was superb - the service, the food, the show and the great atmosphere, we just couldn't fault it. ", 'At some places with music the food plays second fiddle but not here, both were excellent - I can highly recommend the truffle burger.', "I can't understand how we've only just found this place and we plan to be back soon!"]
title: everything was 5 star

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review. I am delighted you enjoy visiting us. Music wise we do have many nights of jazz but will also host bands playing blues, soul and many of the related genres. I feel this way we can provide a more interesting mix of atmospheres in the restaurant while also offering more choice to our customers. I am disappointed to hear that you have had slow service in the bar and want to assure you that we are working hard on improving this. Hopefully you can understand that December has been extremely busy and this should not reflect the norm.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Very good place for food and drinks. The music is good but not always jazz and the bar on the lower level can be quite busy with office workers with the service sometimes slow. Wide range of whiskeys.']
title: boisdale canary wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review.', 'We were delighted that you have enjoyed drinks with us at the bar, but was sorry to hear that you experienced delays on service. ', 'We pride ourselves on our attentive customer ethic and we are constantly working to improve the guest experience. ', 'Perhaps you could join us on the second floor in the main restaurant or take in our live show.', 'Please do email us ahead of your next visit and we will be sure to say hello.', 'manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk', 'Best wishes,', 'Nathan']
content: ['I only went for drinks a few times, and the set up and atmosphere ressemble more the city than Canary Wharf area, which is refreshing! Good service, but as the place fills up and gets busy, service starts lagging and orders might get seriously delayed! But definitely worth a visit!']
title: very good and trendy place

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'I am delighted that you enjoyed the entertainment and thought it good value, I am obviously disappointed that the service fell short.', 'Firstly in regard your table: Tables are allocated in two ways, firstly premium ticket holders (these are the front section closest to the stage and were sold at £25 pet ticket, though these sell quickly and may have already been unavailable when you booked) then we allocate the remaining tickets based on the date the tickets were purchased. I appreciate that as a result you were near the back of the room and I would agree that there are better places to sit, though you do still have a good view of the stage from there.', "We are obviously trading very heavily at Christmas, but that should not have been to the detriment of the excellent service that we pride ourselves upon. I am thrilled that you are considering us as your 'new favourite place'. Please contact the General Manager under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk and we can find out more & restore your trust.", 'Nathan J Evans']
content: ['Booked a table and paid £15 each for entertainment, which was good value and good fun. However the service at the table was not excellent. The waiter was nice but too busy to give any individual attention to us and we waited on many occasions to order more drinks. Food was very good but missing items meant we had to wait to catch the waiter again and again for the missing items to be delivered. This is not marketed as a low end restaurant and this is just not good enough. ', "Our table seemed to be an 'extra' placed in the thoroughfare to the exit and toilet and my chair being bumped constantly did not add to the ambience of the evening but did not ruin it.", 'This venue has the potential to be my new favourite place but needs to reduce the number of tables or increase the number of staff if attentive, professional service is their aim.']
title: Good fun but service only OK

answer_text: ['Dear Yvonne,', 'I was sorry to hear that you felt £15 to see ten very experienced and well respected musicians & singers, expensive. Yes they are all middle-aged, and were offended by your ageist remarks.', "The members of the orchestra are some of the best jazz musicians in the UK and play regularly with Jools Holland and as part of the Ronnie Scott's house band. There were no Michael Buble songs in the set.", 'The Christmas shows sold out every night for 16 nights and I am delighted to say your view is not shared.', "Our bartenders have had cocktails featured in Difford's guide - the definitive cocktail book, for the quality of the cocktails that they consistently produce. The Boisdale Mojito contains 50 ml of quality rum and it is indeed charged with ice, limes & mint - as all the best Mojitos are. Only badly made cocktails taste of the base spirit to the exclusion of anything else.", 'Far from being run by accountants we are a small independent restaurant company still being run by those that started it 25 years ago. What we have never lacked is heart or character.', 'The capacity of the restaurant is 250, with additional space in private dining and a further 100 seats in the Oyster Bar & Grill on the 1st Floor. 800 covers is obviously a total fabrication.', 'I hope you find somewhere more to your taste in terms of ambiance, cocktails and entertainment.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan J Evans', 'Deputy Managing Director & Shareholder ', '.']
content: ["Imagine paying £15 each for some middle age men to perform Frank Sinatra and Michael Buble and then another £80 on top. Not a cheap night out to say the least. It was bursting at the seams, apparently they can seat 800 people and felt like more like a bustling airport lunch than relaxing place to eat. I suppose it is Xmas party week so it's out of the ordinary with dozens of office parties. Avoid the mojitos, they were non existent and full of ice, when I complained they said they couldn't remove the ice and put more of the cocktail in because they were measured and it just wouldn't work. I think that sums the place up. It felt like it was run by accountants, working to a money-making formula. No heart or character."]
title: Mediocre disorganised and expensive

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review.', 'I was pleased to hear you enjoyed the evening on the whole. During the Christmas period we obviously trade heavily & the weekend in question our busiest since opening. Should there have been a bit of confusion regarding you booking I would sincerely like to apologise, still, I was pleased to hear it was rectified. We constantly strive to better ourselves and your comments on our service have been noted. I hope I can welcome you again soon to Boisdale of Canary Wharf & hope you have had a great start to 2014.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ["We went to Boisdale because I won a bottle of wine there and had a good evening - excellent music, very good food, nice ambiance. Two cautions: initially they tried to sit us in a bar which isn't even on the same floor as the music venue until we protested. This isn't 'restricted view' it's 'no view at all and no sound either'. Also service was somewhat variable - sometimes attentive, other times hard to get attention. ", ' ']
title: Fun Friday night in Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Thank you for your fabulous review.', 'I am thrilled you had such a wonderful time with us. We are very fond of the steaks we serve, mostly from grass fed Aberdeenshire cattle and dry aged for up to 40 days to ensure deep, intense flavours. Equally only British cheeses make sense as the island produces an array of high quality cheeses. I am especially proud to hear you received excellent service from all our staff. We strive to provide the best experience possible and we are all glad to hear our work has paid off for you. Please let me know when you are back under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk, I would like to thank you personally.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['The atmosphere puts you back in time when cruise liners were transatlantic liners and bars were for men and women who smoked', 'Excellent food - some of the best steak I ever had (10/10) with simple but matching sides - good chips perfect mushroom sauce', 'An Englsih only cheese trolley which was great value and well matured cheeses - expensive but outstanding scotch selection, Bar Men who knew what they were doing. It is worth noting for people loca to the area that they offer a membership which gives significant discounts on the expansive wine list entertainemnt.', 'On the evening we went we had despite a late booking an excellent table not too cloe not to far to the music and nice views over cabot place. The Show was good and spirited', 'We enjoyed our evening and I will be back', 'Outstanding, well trained service staff who know what they are doing and serving- thank you']
title: In summary a perfect evening

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you for your recent review.', "I'm sorry that you found the background noise from other guests disturbing, it is the nature of the time of year that we are at capacity with many very much in the festive mood, which we very much encourage as we seeing us providing a night out not just a romantic dinner. The date in question was the busiest day of the year.", 'I am surprised that you were so put off by the band. We have live music every single night and you had purchased tickets at £15 per person for the show. ', "May I suggest a table in our Oyster Bar & Grill next time, where there is no live music and therefore no ticket purchase necessary. You can still see Cabot Square from the first floor. The Christmas Show has received hundreds of compliments and has sold out on all, of the 16 nights. I am sorry you felt it 'not-so-good' & 'not so welcome'. I was also very sorry to hear that your turkey came without gravy. I have spent the last two weeks at the pass, in our kitchen at Canary Wharf so I could see every plate. Maybe you had requested no pork, which would not only have excluded the pork chipolata sausages & stuffing but also the gravy that is made from both pork and turkey stock. We are increasingly seeing a real move towards reduced salt from our customers and as a result we have adjusted the seasoning of our food, airing on the lighter side. We have Maldon salt & pepper mills on the table so guests can adjust to their own tastes.", 'I hope this addresses your concerns.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan J Evans']
content: ['We went to this restaurant for a Christmas dinner, mainly because of the scenery such as the lit-up trees that you can see from the windows. However, overall it was a disappointing experience, I guess mainly due to the fact that if you have to cook for hundreds of people at the same time, you can\'t get it right. The starters were ok, however the "turkey with trimmings" was not seasoned, didn\'t come with any gravy and was basically dry. The roast potatoes didn\'t taste of much either. We could already hardly talk to each other due to the loud noise of all the other guests when not-so-good and not-so-welcome even louder music started. I know that many people like this place, but I prefer quiet places with good food.']
title: Too busy at Christmas time

answer_text: ['Thank you for your very kind review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed your time with us. Perhaps you would like to return in December when we will have our fabulous Christmas show running? In any case, please let us know when you plan on returning under manager@boisdale-co.uk and we will make sure to say hi!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Visited Boisdale for Drinks & dinner on Thu night, fab bar scene with good collection of whiskies & the restaurant above had good jazz music to accompany along with good food! overall great experience:)']
title: Great Bar Scene & Jazz Music

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for taking the time to write about us.', 'I was happy to hear you thought our service and food was great. When it comes to the music on Sundays the emphasis is more on accompanying the lunch as opposed to being the main focus, so our musicians generally play with very little amplification. Should the music on this occasion have been too quiet I sincerely apologise. I have already made all managers aware to keep a closer eye on music volumes. When you book next, let us know that you would like to appreciate the music and we will aim to get you a table closer to the stage.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Have been here 2/3 times, most recently this weekend, and i havent been able to find much fault, good service (we had a table issue that was dealt with very well), food is well prepared, high standards and excellent meat quality', 'my only small bug bear, is with the sunday Jazz event, the place gets too noisy to really appreciate the music', 'but as a dining experience, fantastic']
title: Simple meals but dont exceptionally well

answer_text: ['Thank you for you great review.', 'I am glad you are enjoying the Oyster Bar & Grill on the first floor & our wonderful Hamburgers (I’m all for the “Caprese” with Pesto & Mozzarella at the moment). The bar on the first floor is also really lovely on a Saturday with low lights and plenty seats at the window available for drinks in the evening; now that the Holiday decorations have been put up on the streets it is an even more magical sight!', 'The team and I look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["I work in Canary Wharf, so this is a local haunt. Go lots of lunch to the more casual restaurant for the best hamburgers in town. The bar is nice as well for after work drinks. The restaurant upstairs is very nice, but a bit more formal than i'm usually looking for. However, did take my wife for dinner and jazz for her birthday. ", "As a relaxed place for a good burger with co-workers for Friday lunch, can't be beaten."]
title: Regular lunch spot

answer_text: ['I am delighted to hear you had a lovely evening & thank you for taking the time to review us.', 'Our Head Chef is happy to hear you enjoyed the food, especially the Crab Linguine, whilst I am equally pleased that our Service Staff were able to make you feel comfortable. Saturday was a really good night, and Stephen Triffitt, who impersonated Frank, is the best I have seen! There are other nights like our ABBA Magic night on Saturday the 16th that may be civilised, but there is much more energy in the room with plenty of dancing expected, so make sure to check our website for the upcoming bands!', 'When you plan on visiting us again, please let me know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk so we can make sure to say “Hello”.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ["Took my girlfriend on Saturday and had a really good time. We were sat near the stage where a Frank Sinantra Tribute band were playing and it created a nice atmosphere for dining. I had the steak and chips with green peppercorn sauce which was nice. My girlfriend had the crab linguini which was out of this world. Great food, great friendly service and the atmosphere was just how i hoped from this place. I would recommend Boisdale for anyone who wants a great civilised evening with your other half, she really enjoyed herself and couldn't wipe the smile off her face. Thanks Boisdale"]
title: Really great night

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you for taking time to review our restaurant after your guest won, one of our social media competitions. I am only sorry that your evening fell so short of your expectations.', 'Firstly to clarify the Facebook prize value:', ' ', '1. Three months membership to the Boisdale Club @ £20 per month £60.00', '2. Bottle of our excellent Boisdale wines from Chateau de Sours, Bordeaux £12.50', '3. Premium Whisky miniature £5.60', '4. Handmade chocolates £2.00', '5. Boisdale Blue Rhythm Band CD £10.00', '6. Two glasses of Prosecco @ £6.50 a flute £13.00', '7. Two premium tickets for the show @ £20 £40.00', 'Total £143.10', 'The three month membership entitles both the member and a guest to attend at least 6 free events over the period and significant discounts off members dinners, 20% off wine & cigars and as such is worth considerably more than the £60 cost for the three months. I am completely confident that the prize offered was as stated.', "That aside, I was very sad to hear that you thought the service, unfriendly and the food to be 'incredibly poor'.", "The Haggis is our best selling first course and we sell over a metric tonne a month across our three London businesses. It is made by Macsween in Scotland and is widely regarded as the best haggis and regularly wins in blind tastings. We roast it for a more intense flavour. It certainly does not herald from a packet. The haggis is very peppery and seasoned by Macsween. We only lightly season the 'neeps' & 'tatties' as customer's tastes vary. There is a salt & pepper mill on every table. I was sorry that the burger fell so short. The meat is Scottish and of the same quality we use in our steak cuts - the best. Again this often proves to be one of the most popular choices. The menu you ate from is our £19.75 set menu for two courses and burger sales run into the hundreds per week, with over 100 sold as take-away most Fridays. It appears on this occasion that the burger and bun was not up to the usual high standard. The chips are hand-cut and fried, never from the oven. While this leaves you with the usual variations from potatoes across the season, they should never be anything other than excellent. I'm very sorry that both the burger and the chips were well below par.", 'I would be grateful if you could contact us on manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk where we can deal with your complaint directly.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'NJ Evans']
content: ['My friend managed to secure a VIP Table, "£100 Goody Bag containing a £50 bottle of wine" that we were told and two glasses of Prosecco.', 'Initial thoughts and impressions were good; no welcome of any kind but stunning decor, and a high quality soul band that were of exceptional quality.', 'Unfortunately, that was very much the high point of the evening. We received the goody bag when we ordered a table, which contained a cheap looking "Boisdale" bottle of Red Wine, a cheap ballpoint pen, a CD of the house band, a pamphlet and a chocolate brownie in tissue paper - I would say that the contents total value was around £8.00. Very disappointing and quite insulting.', 'We ordered food, which was very expensive indeed. The service was very poor - a disinterested, miserable waitress attended us - no greeting, no welcome, no smile or kindness of any kind, just a formulaic way of going about their business. I ordered Haggis to start - very poor quality, tasted very much as if it had been taken from a packet or frozen; it was very bland, as were the vegetables - not even basic seasoning of any kind. ', 'Then we ordered the main course. The Steak Burger was £15.00 - very expensive but I thought it would be a "safe bet" after the disappointment of the starters. It was probably the worst quality meal I have ordered and tasted at a restaurant - the bun was burnt and tasted cheap, again, very much as if someone had taken it from a packet. The burger was incredibly, incredibly ordinary - I have tasted far better in Wetherspoon\'s and even in Burger King; the chips were just bland oven chips with nothing to get excited about at all. It was astonishingly poor quality - I can\'t quite believe they would serve this in Canary Wharf. My friend had the chicken, which was also astonishing bland with watery side dishes.', "We didn't bother with desert due to the extraordinary low quality of the food. We had another glass of wine and watched the band who were very good and the best thing about the whole evening. We voiced our concerns at the end of the evening and we were refunded one course, which was appreciated but the whole evening left a very sour taste in our mouths. We travelled a long way from the Kent area on the promise of the table and goody bag, but it felt like a huge con - if the food had any kind of quality, it would have been worth it but it really was much worse than you can get in any chain pub.", "Overall, I certainly wouldn't return or recommend it to any others. Extremely disappointing that a restaurant, which clearly has delusions of grandeur, can't even get the most basic of things right; there can't be many worse places to go in terms of service and food in Central London."]
title: Great band, great decor, poor service & incredibly poor food

answer_text: ['Thank you for your fabulous review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the food and service. We pride ourselves on our standards. To hear we have hit the spot is very rewarding. I cannot wait to welcome you again soon!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['A group of us went to Boisdale of Canary Wharf on Saturday for dinner and the Abba Mania tribute. The food was fantastic - my saddleback pork dish was simply delicious! The atmosphere was so good with the Abba guys doing a really good job. The staff were so attentive and polite - service with a smile goes such a long way. Cannot recommend this place more highly! ']
title: Abba Mania

answer_text: ['Dear Nina,', 'Our booking for, exclusive use of our restaurant tonight was confirmed on the 23rd June 2013, though had been recorded as a provisional booking for a two months prior.', 'We do not have anyone named Lisa working on reception and have never taken a dinner booking for 12 without written confirmation, a deposit and pre-purchased tickets for the show.', 'I can only imagine that you have made a booking elsewhere in error.', 'As you can see from our previous reviews, we pride ourselves on our levels of customer service', 'NJ EVANS']
content: ['On 24th October I made a booking for a table for 6/7 people over the phone with Lisa. I have called to amend the timing of the booking only to be told the restaurant is booked out. When I made the booking I requested a table by the window, which she clearly stated she said she would try and accommodate, there was no mention of completing form to confirm a booking AND IMPORTANTLY there was there a mention the restaurant was booked out. Today I am being told the restaurant has been booked out for months, this is completed untrue as I recall the conversation quite clearly and if the restaurant was booked out for months why was there no mention when I called on 24th October?. Quite frankly this is appalling customer service from yourself. Just to make you aware I have previously made a booking for 12 + people and never had to complete a form it has always been done over the phone. I do not want to be told by your member of staff - who has made an error that she appreciates what I am saying - when completely she is covering her own mistakes as you have received a booking for the whole night and have not bothered to contact us to cancel our booking. Also, to be told that maybe I was enquiring when I called. I know what my intentions were when making the booking - the difference between a confirmation of a booking and an enquiry. Your staff need to be clear what the process is in a booking and cannot make it up as they go as and when it suits them. Nothing more than a shambles of a service!']
title: Shambles of a Service

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review.', 'I am pleased that you thoroughly enjoyed yourself.', 'I look forward to welcoming you back soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["A gorgeously decorated restaurant with friendly, efficient staff, lovely food and great music! I can't wait to go back :)"]
title: A beautiful restaurant with great staff & music!

answer_text: ['Thank you for your kind review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the food and our great whisky selection. You shouldn’t worry about joining us for a romantic dinner though! While Christmas time is certainly a bit busier, we have an array of different evening shows so please stay on the lookout for something a little more subtle. Should you plan on visiting for such an occasion, drop me a line under falko@boisdale-cw.co.uk, I would be happy to make a few suggestions.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ["So this is where the beancounters go to party or so I thought when entering the gaudy halls of Boisdale's at Canary Wharf. I duly enjoyed the evening. Food was great, especially the little Haggis I got with a glass of whisky accompanying it. All in all this place has an overwhelming choice of Scotch and other members of the whisky family. Lovely wines, too. It's great for big group events. Going there for a romantic dinner might fell a little strange."]
title: Nice Haggis

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your lovely review.', 'Richard and Anna also extend their thanks as they have already received a little something from me; as is always the case when staff members are mentioned in despatches. I am absolutely thrilled you have enjoyed your birthday celebration! We all look forward to welcoming you again soon. ', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["WOW....we has such a good evening here last night celebrating mu birthday. Excellent food drink and above all service...a special mention to our waiter Rich and our waitress Ana (who was on her 1st night) they couldn't do enough for us.....we chose the Langoustines and Haggis for starters and the Rib Eye Steak for main course all of which were presented fantastically and tasted divine. I was given complimentary glasses of champagne and a beautiful dessert wishing me Happy Birthday. We watched the Motown band and enjoyed it so much they really were fantastic and very professional and did a great job of getting everyone involved. Couldn't recommend this enough....everything 5 star, we will definitely return and recommend to our friends. thank you for a truly brilliant night Boisdale and especially Rich and Ana...you were both stars."]
title: FABULOUS ALL ROUND

answer_text: ['Thank you!', 'Your review makes us very proud. We all work incredibly hard to make your evening one of the most enjoyable you can have; so I am delighted we have achieved just that.', 'Kindly let me know when you plan on visiting again under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you plan on returning I would like to say "Thank You" personally.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['We went last night, the service, the food, the entertainment, and the atmosphere was superb...', 'Everything for me was 5 out of 5..', 'Awsome, will be back regular no doubt.']
title: Superb/Stunning/Brilliant

answer_text: ['Thank you for your lovely review.', 'We are delighted you think we can compete with the best. As we have recently changed our burger offerings, so receiving great feedback on them is brilliant. We recommend to order different varieties when out with friends and then share them so you can get to taste them all!', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon!', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Great bar, really enjoyed it! One of the best bars in the area! Great burgers too! Highly recommended!']
title: Great Bar

answer_text: ['Thank you for your marvellous review.', 'The Head Chef and I are delighted you had such a wonderful evening and enjoyed our finest grass fed Scottish dry-aged steaks. I can understand your agony at having to choose from the a la carte menu, but when Britain has so much to offer it is difficult to leave items off the menu! ', 'We look forward to welcoming you all back soon and your friend so we can add whisky number 19 to his list.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Just love the cool live jazz, go Thursday nights to hear the amazing soulstress Lizzie Deane and hit the dance floor! The steaks are fabulous, they served roasted fillet to 40 of us, it was perfect-pink but not bloody, and the most delicious flavour and texture. These guys know their meat! Love their oysters and shellfish too, the agonies of indecision when eating a la carte! And if you are a whisky man or woman, choose from over 1,000 different ones at the bar. One friend is up to 18, not all in one evening! This is a very favourite place!']
title: what a buzz at Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Thank you for your great review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed your night with us. Do check our website for exciting bands coming up & also great events ranging for tastings to dinners to possible fun/nonsense (chopping champagne corks of with a sword comes to mind…)', 'We all look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['We went for my Brothers 40th Birthday last Saturday. My first time here. I could not fault it. The food was excellent the service first class & a great band playing. ', 'Will be back very soon. ']
title: Great food great music

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review.', 'I was pleased to read you enjoyed the set menu, yet disappointed to hear you did not rate the ambience. I would be delighted if you could contact me under dgm@boisdale-cw.co.uk to discuss your experience in more detail.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['What a strange, strange place. Faux Scottish barn of a place amongst the office buildings of CW. The place is vast - bar & grill, nice terrace area on 1 floor, restaurant above with a jazz band (?????). Table by the window in the restaurant is a must otherwise could be sitting in a fairly grim Scottish hotel from the 70s.', 'But....had the set menu on a Tuesday night from an online booking service & was fine - nice gravadlax & burger & glass of prosecco.', "it obviously does well - inclined to think that's a result of the limited offerings around rather than genuine quality."]
title: Oddness - but set menu good value

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for your lovely review.', 'I am happy that your partner chose us and that you had a fabulous evening. We love the environment we work in as we feel it makes you feel welcome and in the evenings when the lights go down it just turns magical. To hear that the service was spot on and the drink menu could impress is fantastic. I was irked by your comment on the portion sizes; our steaks range up to 18oz, our richly filled Fish Pie I can never quite finish and our Hamburgers are to be reckoned with. I would be happy to hear in more detail about the dishes you chose on the night; I take note however that you thought them delicious and well presented. Visit our website for more details on upcoming events and live music and do let me know when you plan to visit again, I would love to say ‘Hi’', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['My partner booked this venue as a surprise night out. It takes a lot to impress me and this venue did just that! We were made to feel very important as soon as we stepped inside. The decor is modern yet holds on to traditional values. Inside there are different parts which can be used in different ways eg. meet friends or for families or for a romantic night as a couple. We had a sweet table close to the front with other couples. Everyone looked fantastic under the lighting and backgorund deep rich colours. The service was superb, friendly, smiley and knowledgeable. The drinks list was equally impressive. The food arrived well presented, smelling great and tasting just right. the only downside was that the portions were not as big as I would have liked. The live music made everything feel real and special. The musicians were entertaining and skillful. They made us smile, grow closer, wonder in amazement and forget where we were! When we called it a night finally, we were both surprised by how cheap this had all been. I strongly recommend this place. ']
title: Highly recommended night out!

answer_text: ['Thank you for trying us and for your charming review.', 'We take every effort to ensure all guest are aware of the ticket charge for the music, if this was not the case with you I sincerely apologise this should not have happened; still I was happy to read you enjoyed music. I have passed your review on to the Head Chef and he was thrilled you enjoyed your meal, in my case especially the steak tartare which we train on a lot to ensure we prepare it jus the way you like it. I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our service becoming your new favourite before Roast, who run a wonderful restaurant themselves.', 'Thank you again.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Swanky, stylish,brilliant food.', 'Gave this place a go on the off chance and not disappointed.', 'Piano player came on at 7pm - be warned they will charge £4.50pp to your bill if you are there when music is on - but I did not mind,as musician was good.', 'Started with steak tartare,prepared at the table and my daughter had shellfish bisque,both excellent.', 'Followed by an exquisite steak and kidney pudding (meat slow cooked for 15 hours) - my daughter had belly of pork,sides of mash,spinach and carrots - all perfectly done.', 'Portions are generous too.', 'Service good and unobtrusive.', 'This is my current favourite restaurant,just pipping Roast in Borough Market.', 'Window seat recommended for Boisdale.', 'They also do a lot of music evenings which look fun.', 'A definite revisit here']
title: Boisdale Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your wonderful review.', 'Richard and Jon will be rewarded, as are all members of staff being mentioned in despatches; I am delighted they were able to provide excellent service for you. Our Head Chef is pleased to hear you enjoyed our steaks and specials. The Sancerre is delicious with seafood and the deep, red fruits and medium tannins of Malbec really go well with steaks, so you have made great choices.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the Jive Aces, they are sure to return, but check on our website for more fabulous acts coming up. I am pleased your enjoyed the ambience and service, we work relentlessly to provide an intimate feel in our restaurant.', 'I am looking forward to welcoming you again in the near future.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['The incredible service is what sets this restaurant apart. The staff are attentive, friendly and clearly take great pride in what they do. A special mention must go to Richard, who described in wonderful detail the 10 cheeses we had selected from the cheese trolly and John who gave us an fantastically informative tour of the cigar library. Such theatre on a night out for dinner are too often missed by other restaurants.', 'Our group of eight all thoroughly enjoyed the food. The Sea Bass special, Lobster and Fillet Steak were voted among the best. The Sancerre and Malbec we choose to accompany the food were beautiful and served at the perfect temperature.', 'The band for the evening, Jive Aces, had everyone up on their feet with a lively and brilliantly entertaining performance. There are very few places in London where you can guarantee such good food, wine, service and entertainment all rolled into one.', 'Finally, the ambience that has been created in this restaurant is very special. There must of been over 150 guests dining on the night we visited yet it felt like it was a small intimate affair. The decor, careful spacing of tables, lighting, sound and of course staff must all contribute to this success. From the moment you walk through the door to the point you collect your coats, you are made to feel like the only party in the room.']
title: Incredible service, superb food & a lot of fun

answer_text: ['Thank you for your charming review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the food & service we provided. There are indeed a lot of whiskies to try but also over 200 cigars & an equal number of wines to suit your every need.', 'Every night sees a different group of artists take to the stage, so be sure to look on our website for any acts that could be of interest for you.', 'Please do drop us a line under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you plan on visiting next!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Went to Boisdales restaurant in a party of 8 adults for dinner on Saturday evening, 2nd Dec. Varied menu and the food was excellent as well as being well presented. The staff couldn't have been more pleasant or helpful. The wine list is a delight to choose from as is the whisky menu. I believe there are over 900 whiskies on the menu. Absolute heaven!!", 'I am a non-smoker but I thoroughly enjoyed a trip to the cigar room which is well worth a visit. The young man on duty that night gave us an interesting tour and was most pleasant and informative. One might think that a live jazz band performing in a restaurant is a little strange but it made a very enjoyable and memorable evening and their music was such that it added to the evening.', 'I would highly recommend this restaurant.']
title: Highly recommended

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for your review.', 'I am thrilled you had such an excellent evening and hope to welcome you again in the near future.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['What a lovely evening we had recently. Great food, drinks, atmosphere and music. The band was great fun and the meal was delicious. Service was excellent - can thoroughly recommend a visit here, equally good with couples or groups.']
title: Great place!

answer_text: ['Thank you for your great review.', 'I am thrilled that you enjoyed our food and jazz plus the fact that you can spend your whole evening with us!', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Excellent food with some great jazz in toe. ', 'The prices are fair considering you can have a table all evening without being forced out.', 'Superb atmosphere with lots of choices of well known Scottish highland whiskies.']
title: Boisdale at Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your detailed review.', 'I am delighted to hear you have enjoyed our cocktails which we pride ourselves on. Luckily for cigar smokers not all cigars set you back as much as our fine vintage selection and quite a few of them are available for single digits. Mondays to Wednesdays our music is designed to accompany your meal and I am delighted you enjoyed her two sets. Annoyed by the poached egg, I was comforted to hear that you enjoyed the rest of your meal with us, especially our Macsween’s Haggis which we roast rather than boil for fuller flavour. When you do find the time for a whisky make sure you ask or wonderful bartenders for a recommendation; they are sure to find one you will love but never tried before!', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon in the not too distant future.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['After being shown to our premium seats in the Restaurant which were close to the stage, my husband and I made our way down the tartan carpeted stairs to the Oyster Bar. As the bar tender constructed my Jimmy Roosevelt cocktail I found myself distracted by the magnificent crustacea display behind him. The Oyster Bar & Grill offers an extensive menu of shellfish, caviar, steaks, burgers and sandwiches. We sipped our pre dinner drinks seated on the Cigar Terrace overlooking Cabot Square. We don’t smoke, but having peeked into the impressive Cigar shop we almost wished we did! But a 1988 Vintage Cuban Cigar would set you back a smoking £275.00 – enough to burn a hole in anyone’s pocket! We returned to our seats in the restaurant upstairs, passing one or two stag’s heads on the way. Live music was provided by a young Cornish singer songwriter, Jessica Sweetman who was obviously inspired by the likes of Stevie Nicks. The waiting staff were attentive, but not intrusive. The food and wine were excellent, although I had a little gripe about my poached egg that was served with the gravadlax. The chef had managed to achieve a runny white with a firm yolk rather than the other way round, clever – but not very appealing! I was generously offered complimentary desserts in recompense. My main course of Risotto of Broad Beans, Peas and Courgettes was bursting with flavour and colour. My husband had the Mini Roast Macsween Haggis with mashed potatoes and bashed neeps for his starter and the Wester Roast Poached Salmon for main – both of which were beautifully cooked and presented. We didn’t try anything from the remarkable display of whiskies which range in price from a reasonable £7.00 for a 50ml measure of Famous Grouse to a staggering £755.50 per 50 ml measure of Glengoyne’s 40 year old malt! Maybe next time.', 'In summary, The Boisdale Club is an ideal venue for meeting up with friends in relaxing, yet extravagant surroundings. Enjoy Scottish fare, fit for a Laird! With live music and great service it provides a great evening out.']
title: Quality Food & Great Music

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review.', 'I was pleased to hear you thought our set menu was great value, however irked that you thought the portions were meagre. I have spoken to our Head Chef and we have increased our portions size slightly and all vegetables are now being topped up through you meal. I hope this will encourage you to return sooner rather than later! Please let us know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you plan to return and we will make sure to say “Hello!”', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['The seats we had were perfect with a view across the wharf. We decided on The £45 sunday special. This was good value based on the red/white wine was included. The down side was the main course. One slice of beef...one and half roasted potatoes per person and 2 small portions of vegetables ( carrots and wilted leaves) between 4 adults! That is my only fault with the experience.... another slice or half a slice of beef and adult size portions of vegetables would have made it perfect and well worth the money', 'Staff attentive and friendly...great atmosphere with the live jazz band...excellent wine', 'I will return but will make sure Im served some extra vegetables']
title: Sunday Lunch....

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'What a lovely review, thank you so much! I am delighted you had a great time and look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['it was our first visit to this restaurant and would recommend ,we started off with drinks on the terrace before we went upstairs. we had a fantastic table close to the stage and the whole', 'experience with the music and a very good meal is not too be missed.', 'The staff are all really lovely and the service could not be faulted we would certainly go back.']
title: great night out

answer_text: ['Thank you for sharing you experience with us.', 'Although it was not perfect I am delighted that we were able to make amends. We look forward to hearing from you and changing your perspective completely.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Having won a competition with Boisdale. Was unable to attend due to ill health, so my wife and daughter went for the evening. Unfortunately their evening was not the best experience.', 'I sent an email complaining about this. As I have been recommending Boisdale restaurant to my clients for a long time. Within a day, I received a very nice and apologetic email from Mr Nathan Evans.', 'He dealt with the matter in a very gracious manner. It is refreshing to see customer service dealt with so promptly.', "When I'm fit and well again in the new year. I will definitely go to Boisdale with my wife to give it another go.", 'Also to thank Mr Nathan Evans for his professionalism . ']
title: Amazing customer service.

answer_text: ['MARVELLOUS!!!', 'Thank you for your fantastic review. We are all proud to hear that you enjoy your time with us! Please let me know when you are in next; I would love to say Hi!', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Absolutely first class. Food is among the best I have ever tasted. Venue is amazing & the Bond tribute band that was playing when we were there were absolutely outstanding. Staff among the friendliest I have come across in London & very knowledgable. If your thinking if going - think no more - just go!! This is my new regular treat.']
title: Excellent!

content: ["Oh dear the group were good but it was a boring night. Nowhere to dance. Just sitting at a table listening is not my idea of having fun. Stop cramming the tables in - give us some floor space - Boisedale is a somewhat stuffy old people's diner "]
title: Boring

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for taking the time to review us.', 'I was annoyed to hear that the restaurant was not fully tidied by the time you had arrived and have already amended the opening procedures for Sunday Lunches to prevent a recurrence. I am however delighted you enjoyed our lunch menu and would like to point out that I have already agreed with the head chef to increase the main course portion size and we are now topping up the vegetables and roast potatoes. Our live jazz on Sundays has been selected to accompany your meal rather than being the focus; unlike our Friday and Saturday shows. We are all proud you though the service was excellent and we hope to welcome you back soon to fully convince you of our venue.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Went here today with friends for Sunday Lunch. Arrived to find rubbish and bin bags in reception - these were eventually cleaned away. Food was good - 3 course lunch (I had Onion soup, Beef, and a delice desert). Veg was scarce, portions were adequate rather than generous, service excellent and music (jazz) was subdued. Shame. I'd go again - mainly due to the company, although food and setting was very good!."]
title: Decent Sunday Lunch

answer_text: ['Thank you for your detailed review.', 'Such comprehensive feedback helps tremendously with staff training. We strive always to be better.', 'I was pleased to read you enjoyed the wine, many of which we ship to our bonded warehouse directly from the wine makers. I was disappointed to read that you did not rate our Martini very highly. We pride ourselves on delivering some of the finest classic cocktails, so hearing it did not live up to standards was a let-down, though I would like to mention that we always serve the olives on the side. We have reiterated which glass to be used for which cocktail to prevent a recurrence.', 'I have passed your review on to the Head Chef and we have discussed the points mentioned. The Crab/Chili fight is very much a point of preference, though we do err on the side of caution, should yours have been too intense I do apologise sincerely. The fish pie is a new recipe and we have amended it accordingly to ensure it remains succulent and tender, with firm fish. For the side dish I can only apologise as they should be adequately sized and the cabbage seasoned correctly; we should have replaced this no questions asked.', 'To finish on a high I was very pleased to read you enjoyed the service and live performance from Leigh, who had his premier on our stage, though I am sure he will return.', 'I would be delighted to be able to welcome you back and ask you to contact me under dgm@boisdale-cw.co.uk to discuss your experience in more detail.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ["An enjoyable night but a couple of points merit mention. Service: spot on; attentive without being sycophantic, food and drinks were delivered in a timely fashion. Entertainment: Leigh Coleman was a gifted singer and musician. His set engaged us from 2130 until 2330 (ish). Drinks: The Chilean Sauvignon Blanc was zesty and certainly palatable (had a couple of bottles). However my Martini was a bit of a let down, wrong glass and olives on the side; perhaps I had been spoilt by the earlier one in The Plateau (now that was a special Martini) and perhaps I should have said something at the time, but did not want to start the evening on a downer. Food: Average at best. The Venison Carpaccio was OK. My wife's Warm Fig and Goats Cheese was well received. Her Chilli Crab Linguine seemed to hit the spot but I get the impression the chilli won the firefight against the crab in the flavour stakes. My Fish Pie was certainly on the well done side if not over-cooked. Ingredients were all there (inc the quails eggs) but expected better at the price. The side of Cabbage and Chorizo was insignificant in quantity and indifferent on quality; the sausage won out against the veg regarding flavour. So - would I go again? Perhaps but probably unlikely. Was it worth what I paid (inc premium(?) seating? - I think not. In a nutshell - good service and some good tunes mitigated an average-at-best dining experience."]
title: Six and two threes.

answer_text: ['Thank you!', 'It is such a pleasure to read that we were recommended and that you too thought it was great. I am pleased to hear you thought the service, food and wine were fantastic. We have live music every night from Monday to Saturday and for our new Sunday Lunches too, so make sure to check our website to read all about the upcoming acts.', 'I hope to welcome you again soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I recently visit Boisdale Canary Wharf upon the recommendation of Sandy Madhvani, Showroom manager of David M Robinson. Fantastic service by superb attentive staff, vast tasty wine and food menu, busy atmosphere and an overall fantastic evening. The Live Jazz Singer was the cherry on the icing on the cake! I would highly recommend anyone in the Canary Wharf area to try!!']
title: Boisdale Visit as recommended by David M Robinson

answer_text: ['Thank you Aryna for your lovely review,', 'I am glad to hear we managed to convince you that British food can be fabulous! We take great pride in our British produce and serve only the finest Scottish seafood. Also, if you are a fan of Sunday Roasts, you should give us a try as we are starting to serve this wonderful tradition from the 29th September onwards!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I thought I’m not really a big fan of British food, especially if there are lot of jokes about how bad British cuisine is even here in UK and this is why I’m particular glad to find such a fine dining place like Boisdale of Canary Warf. Might actually become one of my favourite British and Scottish places in this town.', 'Full review: http://adventureaspie.com/2013/09/boisdale-of-canary-wharf-london/']
title: Perfect, just perfect :)

answer_text: ['I am thrilled that you visit us again and again Stuart, so thank you for taking the time to review us. We are very proud of this restaurant and work very hard to make it one of the prime locations to enjoy a wonderful evening. We already have many great acts booked for the upcoming months so check on our website for a good excuse to have some more steak and another tipple of whisky!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Honestly - I am not sure that I been to a better place for the entire package. The bar staff and knowledge of whiskey was awesome. Steak was soooo good, and the staff attentive without being over the top. Finally the live music. They are top musicians, and the quality shines through. We have been many times, and will be back again. Attend Boisdale with confidence.']
title: Great Music, Food, Wine, Whiskey and Service = Happy customer

content: ['So I have reviewed this place 3 times now. 1 bad experience and 1 terrific experience.', 'After our last visit which was great we reserved a table on Saturday the 28th and again we were very unhappy with the service and the quality of some of the food. ', 'We had problems from when we arrived and right through every course until we left. ', 'This was very disappointing particularly as it was my parents 40th wedding anniversary.', 'When we arrived we were seated promptly but waited 10 minutes before anyone came to take our drinks order. 3 of our drinks came but we had to request the 4th drink two more times before it finally arrived nearly 25 minutes after we were seated by which time we already had our starters. This was a recurring theme throughout the evening we served our own wine all night and constantly had to find someone to order replacement bottles for us.', 'We were served bread which we had to return because it was stale.', 'For starters 2 of us ordered the half lobster, the lobster arrived but we had no cutlery. We asked our waitress for it but she never brought it, so we then we had to ask the manager who finally brought it, some 10 minutes after the food arrived by which time it had started to get cold.', 'For mains all 4 of us ordered steaks, they were delicious. However, some of the sides arrived cold and had to be sent back only arriving back to our table at the end of our dinner.', 'Then for desserts we ordered the petit four, they arrived but of the 8 petit four there were only 2 types (4 of each) and even these were dry. We asked our waitress if this was how it should be served and she was surprised, said no and took them away and replaced them.', 'There was also a catalogue of disasters around our table on the evening. One of the waitresses dropped a prawn cocktail beside our table, the other waitress was clearly very annoyed with her and proceeded to get on her knees and scooped the mess up with her hands throwing it into the tray in her temper. This was quite unpleasant and very unprofessional. Then another waitress dropped a tray of drinks right beside us, the mess was cleared up nut no one even acknowledged that we had been splashed when the tray fell.', 'There were many disappointed guests that evening.', 'For a bill over £500 the level of service is simply unacceptable.', 'We did speak to the duty manager that evening and he agreed that it was a bad night!', 'On another note Kim Mayzelle was brilliant!! ']
title: Great Steak, Amazing Act...everything else disappointing

answer_text: ['Dear Barbara,', 'Thank you for reviewing us. I am delighted you enjoyed your visit & especially the food. If you check our website you can find plenty of different music offerings so you may find one that you are more interested in!', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon!', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['We saved this restaurant until the last night of our week long stay in Canary Wharf and it did not disappoint . The service was great and we had a lovely table at the window , my son had the grouse which he said was delicious and his wife , my husband and I all had fillet steak which was possibly the best I have ever tasted. All the courses were delicious and there was a band playing with a gentleman singing Sinatra type songs we paid £10 per head extra for this we did not mind as we like Sinatra but are not fans of jazz . It was a delightful evening.']
title: Brilliant

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'I was so sorry to read about your poor experience at our restaurant last night.', 'While it was exceptionally busy it should not have led to such slow service and for that I apologise.', 'I was surprised that you disliked the haggis so much, we sell over a metric tonne a month across our three London businesses and it is purchased from Macsweens, often regarded as the best producer of haggis in Scotland. The skin is natural and we have been serving haggis this way for 26 years which is very much the tradition. To date we have only received compliments about our haggis.', "We add a very small amount of carrot to the 'Neeps' to make it clearly different from the 'Tatties' - a great help when the lights go down for the show and when the time of year renders the neeps paler in colour. Other than that ingredients are turnip & swede only, certainly no sweet potato. ", 'I would like an opportunity to restore your faith and would be grateful if you could contact me directly on nathan@boisdale.co.uk.', 'Your sincerely,', 'Nathan']
content: ['slow service. food terrible. had the haggis which was still in skin. "neeps " were not what a Scot would call neeps more like sweet potato.']
title: awful experience staff slow and food tepid and tasteless

answer_text: ['Dear Anne,', 'Thank you very much for your great review. I too enjoyed the Bohemians who played that night. I can’t remember so much energy in the room… We are all thrilled that you enjoyed the evening with us!', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Me and my friends had a really nice time at Boisdale. The food was delicious for a reasonable price, the service was perfect (the waitresses were really friendly and polite). Then we had the chance to enjoy a fabulous "Tribute to Queen" show: the singer had the same amazing voice as Freddy Mercury and we had a lot of fun. We\'ll definitely go again!']
title: Fabulous evening

answer_text: ['Natalie,', 'Thank you for your review, I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your evening. Did you know that we have a 2-course set menu for lunch & dinner for 19.75GBP? That way we can ensure as many people as possible are able to enjoy an evening with us. Look on our website for more details on our upcoming acts.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Its all a bit posh in this venue, known for its extensive selection of Whisky's and world class Malts, but a very nice live music venue, expect it to be pricey as those who frequent this establishment can afford it. I was lucky enough to be invited here by the band who were performing and so got a great ftable at the front of the stage. By the end of the evening the whole restaurant was up on thier feet rocking the whole place out.", 'Keep an eye out for great bands performing here if you want a very intimate experiance of live music, great food and wine and a thoroughly good night out.']
title: Great live music venue

answer_text: ['Many thanks for your great review. We are glad that you enjoyed our great mix of steak, whisky and music! Please let me know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you plan on visiting next; I would like to say hello!', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Wonderful Scottish themed restaurant, with live jazz on many nights of the week. We had a reserved table upstairs just as the band started. The huge whiskey bar was amazing! 900+ whiskey to choose from...! I had the prime rib with veggies and chips. Not bad at all! The staff was great, even folding my napkin every time I got up to use the bathroom. No complaints at all. ']
title: Great staff and great live jazz!

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review and for loving our food. Our live music is variably priced depending on the days of the week and our team is trained to make everyone aware of the charges incurred. That being said, mistakes are made and I apologise should this not have happened on this occasion. As you are planning on returning, please contact me directly under dgm@boisdal-cw.co.uk; I would love to take care of all the details', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Great food and will definitely be coming back. Only one negative was being charged £7.50 each to hear five songs. More information should be given that there is an extra charge. That said it was a great venue, perfect for a date night or a larger group.']
title: Best haggis ever, one to recommend.
