answer_text: ['Thank you for your review.', 'I was disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy the evening thoroughly.', 'When you phoned regarding the ambience I can only presume that at the time there were not many bookings. Other than in the main restaurant, the Oyster Bar & Grill is less reservations led and as such many diners merely walk in, this incidentally contributes greatly to the lively atmosphere.', 'The too short pints are simply inexcusable, and thankfully the staff rectified this for you. Our hand & thick cut chips have always been received favourably and we always lightly salt them with salt flakes; unsalted chips are readily available upon request.', 'It is unfortunate to hear that you were disturbed by the cigar smoke. You are right in saying that our restaurant is non-smoking; however we provide our guests the opportunity to smoke on out heated terraces. Having looked into the matter I have made sure that the doors leading out to the terraces automatically are held close behind traffic.', 'We constantly strive to provide our guests the best experience possible, and our staff is prepared to go out of their way to ensure you have an enjoyable evening so I am happy that you found them friendly. Hopefully you will visit us again and are able to change your mind about us.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Review specific to the first floor Oyster Bar and Grill, not the main restaurant.', 'When I rang to enquire about the ambience, I was told it was quiet. It turned out to be anything but, and you had to raise your voice to talk. After a tableload of young fogeys occupied the table next door, had to practically shout to talk. ', "Ordered a pint and it was about one-seventh short with over an inch of head. Had to get it topped up (this recurred in the other bar, but when I complained, I wasn't charged). The food was good, though the special thick chips were marred by having salt thrown over them without asking! We decided not to have dessert as cigar smoke was blowing in, presumably from the terrace bar. I thought restaurants were supposed to be non-smoking by law. As suggested on their website, we declined to pay the service charge as we were not happy!", "I don't actually like complaining; Boisdale is a worthwhile music venue with quality décor, the staff have always been pleasant and friendly, and customers looked contented. Those after a noisy night out and who smoke might enjoy it very much; it is a shame that expectations were not met, and I did not look good in the eyes of my companion. If management can fix these lapses there is no reason why it cannot earn 4 or 5 stars."]
title: Has potential but was let down

answer_text: ['Dear Patrick,', 'Thank you for your second review and also for giving us the chance to redeem ourselves. I am delighted that you had a much better experience and look forward you welcoming you back in the near future. The Soul Jets will be back later in the year, but do check our website for upcoming acts. There are some great bandsin the pipeline.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['so if you read through my previous reviews, you will see my last experience of Boisdale Canary Wharf wasnt great! Well the 6 of us returned on Friday the 16th August and it was a terrific night out.', 'The food was well presented, everything we ate was delicious, the lobster and steak being particulary good!', 'Service was much improved, attentive but not invasive, staff were friendly, helpful and fun!', 'The band was Soul Jets, they were brilliant.', 'All in all we had a great night and we will definately be going back!']
title: Wow what a different experience

answer_text: ['Thank you for reviewing us!', 'I also enjoyed the evening immensely with Jordan playing boogie-woogie. He is one of our firm favourite, so I am thrilled that you enjoyed him and his band. Thank you also for commenting on our fabulous staff. We have worked hard to create relaxed but efficient service. Jordan will be playing later in the year so check out our website for further details.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Went for a meal with friends and to listen to the band on 28 August. A really superb meal , very relaxed in a lovely setting looking out onto Cabot Square through the huge window. Staff were attentive and asked whether we needed any help with the menu which was extensive. The evening was even better when the Jordan Marsh Band came on stage and started their set. They had the whole place rocking with a bluesy, jazzy first set ending with a fantastic rock and roll finale and had everyone up dancing! Can't wait to see them again and will definitely book for a meal next time they are playing there. You can just sit in the bar area and sample their huge range of whiskys, over a thousand to try!!"]
title: What a night!

answer_text: ['Thank you for joining us on a lovely summer evening to enjoy seafood!', 'We work hard on ensuring our price points are competitive and I am glad you thought them good value. Our terrace is also great during the winter months when blankets and heaters ensure you are kept warm.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon', 'Falko']
content: ['Good atmosphere, price is usual Canary Wharf. I actually thought the Classic fruit de mer seafood platter was a good deal for £30. Terrace is great for the summer and staff was quite attentive.']
title: Nice terrace and seafood

answer_text: ['Thank you Kevin for your review.', 'I am delighted you enjoyed the atmosphere in the room. We work hard on ensuring you have a good time when with us; so I am pleased that you had a great time.', 'Please visit again soon.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['The food was good and the place is set out well for either a few drinks after work or a good night out. It was busy but not too much and the jazz was really good. All in all a decent night out.']
title: Good food, good music and plenty of whisky

answer_text: ['What a wonderful and extensive review!', 'Thank you for taking the time!', 'I am delighted that we were able to accommodate you throughout the evening and I can only say thank you again! I have read out your review to the team during briefings. We all take great pride in what we do; so to hear great feedback is rewarding!', 'Please let me know when you plan on joining us next under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk. I would like to thank you personally!', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['I fancied trying this restaurant with its Scottish menu having seen it feature on a round of Masterchef.', 'I had expected some difficulty in booking but found they had tables available on the day (a Wednesday) at any time from 6 through to 9 at half hour intervals. I booked through Top Table which secured a special offer of 25% off all food purchased which was an unexpected bonus.', "On arrival, I realised that through a misunderstanding we had been booked into the Oyster Bar and Grill rather than the restaurant. The table was on a balcony overlooking Cabot Square but not in prime location and there was cigarette smoke wafting around from somewhere. It would have been OK but I thought I would ask if there might still be space in the restaurant proper upstairs. The staff were great, confirmed that we could move and also offered a choice of staying with the menu that had the 25% discount or 'upgrading' to full al la carte. I opted for the latter.", 'The new table was right next to the window overlooking the fountains in Cabot Square and perfectly placed to watch the sun go down. Dining at 6.30 secured a quiet restaurant and plenty of attentive staff. As the evening unfolded the tables filled and noise levels increased to create more of a buzz. This was augmented by the live band that commenced at 8pm; sensible volume, easy to hear but not loud enough to destroy conversation.', 'The menu was extensive and for the first time in a long time we really struggled to choose. EW both opted for fish/shellfish starters and tucked into some excellent oysters, crab and smoked salmon. For mains the Steaks ( and in particular the special 1kg on the bone for 2) looked amazing but we chose another special, Grouse which was deliciously gamey and smokey and a rib eye burger with truffle mayo which was accompanied by a pot of absolutely perfect chips. We did not order any sides and on reflection perhaps a serving of vegetable or salad would have been even better but that said, the portions were generous and we were certainly comfortably full.', 'We had no room for desserts but did split a plate of 5 cheeses from an extensive british cheese board.', 'The wine list is substantial (as is the choice of whiskies all lit up like Christmas at the bar - there must be 600 or so). There are some big prices and so we opted to stick with the range listed under Boisdale housewines. An excellent glass of Albarino was around £10 and then a very smooth and fruity bottle of red burgundy £60.', 'As the restaurant filled the service was inevitably a little less attentive but it was not difficult to catch an eye of someone and then they were immediately there and very happy to help.', 'I think there is an expectation that guests will stay on after dinner and enjoy the live music and I sense that unless there is a pressure for tables, the staff are happy to let diners relax at the table long after the meal is over.', 'A final nice touch; we ordered a plate of 5 cheeses but the waiter added a sixth because he was keen we should try it. A little later when he noticed our cheese was gone but a cracker or two remained, he then offered to give us some more cheese to use up the crackers!']
title: Top quality food and service with a smile

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your review!', 'You described the atmosphere at the bar perfectly so I hope to welcome you back soon; perhaps to try some of our fabulous dry aged British beef!', 'Let me know when you are in next under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk. I would love to say ‘Hello’.', 'Falko']
content: ["Loved this place. In a great location over looking Cabot Square. Went there after a lovely meal at Gaucho's, Sat in the Whisky bar listening to live Jazz music sipping a couple of whisky's from the thousands they have on sale! Great place to sit back, relax and let the world pass you by!", 'Couple aged 40-45']
title: Fantastic experience

answer_text: ['Dear Hugh,', 'Thank you for your review and for listening to your colleague! To hear that guests recommend us makes me very proud indeed. I am delighted that you had a great evening and you enjoyed the steak as well as the treatment from the team.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon, and please do drop me a line under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you do, so I can thank you in person.', 'Kind regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Booked Boisdale Canary Wharf based on a conversation at work with a college, who insisted I check out a restaurant he has visited on several occasions with quality food and great live music.', "I was in town recently and booked Boisdale's for a few friends to get together all of which love their food & music. We arrived and took the lift to the inviting entrance lobby and were greeted by a courteous deputy manager who escorted us to the bar before we sat at our table.", 'The surroundings are impressive to say the least the spacious room accommodates a long well stocked bar with an enviable selection of whiskey which is its trademark tipple, The far end sits the stage and to the left the full length windows offer a view over Cabots Square.', "The food is based on Scottish cuisine with a wide selection of steaks, everyone in my party had a great meal and a great time. It should definitely be one everyone's 'go to' list and I guarantee you'll want to go back again and again.", 'The live music complemented the evening, the staff were attentive but not overbearing and the evening is one I hope to repeat again.']
title: A top evening at Boisdale

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for your detailed review.', 'I am glad you hear that you had a good date and you enjoyed our service. We are very proud of the produce we offer so we were delighted you enjoyed the steak tartar and lobster. With regards to the steak I can only assume it was a one off as we have very generous portions and we receive huge amount of positive feedback from guests that love our steaks. Next time you could ask for the guest steak of the day where we present only the very finest dry aged Scottish beef.', 'Still I am very happy that you had a good night and I look forward to welcoming you back in the very near future.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['We recently moved to the area and had a flyer put through the letter box for a 50% of food at Boisdale throughout the month of July - August, it would have been silly not to take advantage.', 'So last Thursday - date night. I had booked a table a week or so in advance and requested a window table. We were informed that there will be live music from 9pm in the restaurant and there would be charged £4.50 per person for table cover charge. Not a problem.', 'Upon arriving at the restaurant they promptly found our reservation and the lady commented on how nice I looked - thumbs up! She took us to a table in the middle of the restaurant and I mentioned that I had requested a window table. She went off to check whether they were available, came back in a jiffy and hey presto! A window table! It was looking over Cabot Square and candlelit (well, it was date night!).', "The restaurant it self is Scottish and had a Gentleman's club feel about it (not in a stripper way - but cigars and whiskey), lovely tables and comfortable chairs. Amazing art and black and white photography. ", 'They have a great wine list with a good range of wines and champagnes by the glass at reasonable prices. A glass of 2003 Dom Perignon was £21..now I know where to go and treat myself in the future! ', 'I had steak tartare to start, which was prepared at the table to your taste. It was delicious, fresh and clean cut - and my glass of Malbec was perfect for it. My boyfriend ordered half a lobster to start which looked amazing - which it was, as I had a whole one for my main - along with a glass of Albarino - yummy. Boyfriend had the fillet steak on the bone with thick out chips and a side of roast garlic mushrooms with crispy shallots. The steak was okay but there was too much bone to meat ratio for his liking and he preferred Gaucho steak. The mushrooms were divine! I could have eaten more!', 'We finished the meal with a 10 cheese platter from the trolley - the waiter explained all the different cheeses and recommended some very good stinkies and a glass of Vinsanto to go with the cheese. ', 'We had a great evening. The restaurant is lovely, good atmosphere, a great range of food on the menu, wonderful wine list and very attentive staff that were not intrusive. The live music was very good too.', 'Downstairs there is a terrace bar and cigar room - we had a quick walk through and will pay a visit shortly.', "For 3 courses, glass of champagne, 3 glasses of wine and 2 desert wine and water it came to £168 including service and cover charge. This obviously would have been doubled if we didn't have the 50% off food discount. Which would have made it rather pricey - but if you wanted to treat yourself to some lovely food, wine and music...you can't go wrong. I'm already looking for my next excuse to go back."]
title: Great date night

answer_text: ['Dear Sue,', "I was delighted to hear that your were impressed by the venue and thought the food very good and service impeccable, I'm only sorry that you found Boisdale Canary Wharf confusing.", "To clarify, we are a British restaurant dedicated to live music. Which is why I was so surprised that you gave such a low mark on tripadvisor - a restaurant review site. You will see that Ronnie's has its listing in nightlife not in restaurants.", "Unlike Ronnie Scott's we don't see selling tickets as a revenue stream and of course we don't have the benefit of two shows on a Friday & Saturday night. Our tickets sales do not cover the costs associated with the band, sound engineers or band hospitality and are on average 30% less expensive than Ronnie Scott's.", 'What we actively encourage is our guests to have a good time and dancing is encouraged in the second set. ', "Please don't be disappointed or believe it to be disrespectful to the band to allow conversation during the music. The artists are both made away in advance and all very much enjoy playing at Boisdale because of the relaxed nature of the venue. The band are very well looked after and we have an exemplary record which is well known among musicians.", 'The practise of sitting in rows, in silence listening to music is a relatively new phenomenon and not one we subscribe to, but we hope to welcome you back for dinner very soon.', 'Nathan']
content: ['As big fans of Ronnie Scotts (which we inevitably compared this to), we found our first visit to Boisdale a bit confusing. On the positive, the venue is impressive - well laid out, etc., the food was very good, wine/drinks list amazing and the staff service was impeccable. We were shown to a great table right at the front. However, we found the dance floor in front of the stage confusing, especially as it may have meant paying for premium seating only to have a bunch of folk \'dad dancing\' right in front of your view of the band (luckily we were on the side so were not really affected but if we had been seated a few tables across, this would not have been good). Being used to Ronnie\'s, we found the amount and volume of chatter from diners as the band drew breath to move on to their next song rather disrespectful and disappointing. Worse, the band (who were clearly a group of very talented musicians) seemed to change their set as they went along to reflect what people who were in that night were dancing to. By the time we\'d got to "Tequila" and "Don\'t Mess With My Toot Toots," we felt like we were at a hideous wedding and were ready to leave. So .... we left somewhat disappointed and rather confused about what Boisdale, Canary Wharf really is.']
title: A bit confusing

answer_text: ['Dear Mazip,', 'I was sorry to read of your disappointment with the BeeGees show that we hosted on 31st August. We had good feedback from other guests so would point out that it was not a view shared,', 'On the subject of ticket prices, I would argue that £10 is a very small sum to pay for a live band.', 'I was taken aback at your suggestion that the cocktails had anything less than the advertised volume of spirits in them. We have won a number of awards for our cocktail list and for the bartenders that mix them. It is widely regarded that great cocktails should not be dominated by any one component part conversely poorly made ones often taste of the spirit base.', 'What was absent from your review was anything about the food, but then you were only here for drinks.', 'NJE']
content: ['my friend came over from martinique and she wanted to go to the boisdale as she has heard it is very good , well we were so disapointed they had beegees on they could not sing the group were awful so out of tune in fact we had beegees at our local working mans club and they sounded so much better than the boisdale and it was free at the working mans club unlike where the boisdale charge £10 per head and the drinks were extortionate the cocktails started at £9.50 and you could not taste any spirits in then at all']
title: bad beegee music

answer_text: ['Thank you for your fantastic review!', 'I am delighted that you enjoyed your evening with us and look to welcoming you again in the near future.', 'Kind regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Faultless and incredibly enjoyable. Live jazz with amazing seafood. Staff were great, best smoked salmon ive had in years, excellent views of the wharf, MUST TRY']
title: Immense

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for your review. I am pleased you enjoyed the food and service you have received. We work hard to offer high quality ingredients as well as excellent value. Any additional feedback regarding price points would be gratefully received. Please contact me directly under dgm@boisdale-cw.co.uk should you wish to explain in more detail.', 'I look forward to hearing from you soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I visited Boisdale (very) early evening. The service was attentive but not over-bearing and the main course delicious. Dessert (ice cream) a bit ordinary and mysteriously the coffee appeared long before dessert. Overall nice food but over priced. ']
title: Delicious but pricey

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for such a lovely review.', 'I am glad you enjoyed the food, drink and atmosphere. While we have items on the menu that are certainly dearer, we also have an excellent value two course menu for £19.75 available for lunch and dinner as well as several wines under £25.00. ', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["This is a Scottish themed Seafood restuarant with a Jazz Cafe feel. I have to say that the food is of a high standard and good service. It's not cheap but the quality is definitely there. They have a good wine list as well. If you don't want to eat in the restaurant then there is a wet bar serving oysters and other shellfish which was very busy on the night we were there. I will definitely go back again."]
title: Great Atmosphere and Fantastic Food

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your in detail review.', 'I am delighted to hear that the team looked after you so well on the evening and that the entertainment was to your liking. Disappointed that the batter was not up to scratch our Head Chef has amended the recipe slightly to ensure crispness all around. I was also pleased to hear you found our cheese trolley offer excellent, we certainly have enjoyed presenting the cheeses since we have had our trolley delivered. When you plan on visiting next, please let us know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk and we will make sure to say ‘Hello!’', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Although London was heaving with tourists the restaurant was not busy, but this is not too surprising as it is slightly off the usual tourist route. We booked our table probably a bit too early (7.00) but staff were happy for us to order cocktails and eat slightly later. There is a charge per person to book a table which in effect is the cost of your entertainment. At £40 for the best table/seats this is reasonable by London standards for a class act. We were entertained by the Callum big band - some wonderful musicians playing great arrangements of Rhapsody in Blue and West Side story. The cocktail menu is a little heavy on the ginger for me but suited the others on the table - they were strong, yummy and under £10 each. Continuing on the alcohol theme - there are some surprising finds on the wine list, featuring wines from small vineyards like "little Beauty" a Gewurtztraminer from New Zealand managing to be sweet and yet dry at the same time and just bursting with flavour. A red wine from the Lebanon was a good contrast with a noise giving hints of cigar (quite appropriate for a venue with a whiskey/cigar theme). There are plenty of staff buzzing around creating a busy atmosphere - it\'s always good to see a happy rapport between staff as well as towards their customers. Service is efficient - staff happily topping up your water glass (with tap as well as bottled water as requested) without being asked. Food wasn\'t wow factor for me, but it was good - the scallops and black pudding were fine, the turbot in a homemade batter, whilst crispy on the top was soggy and fatty underneath - but the fish inside was lovely. The fillet steak was cooked very well, and couldn\'t be faulted. Thanks to the lovely waiter who served cheese to one member of our table (putting up with comments from the rest of us) - he knew his stuff. The cheeses were exciting and generous portions - there was enough for 3 of us to "taste" each of the five selected and still some left for the person who actually ordered it. All in all, its a great venue for a good night out.']
title: Something to sing about in Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for your review. ', 'I am delighted that you have enjoyed your evening with us. I have taken note of your suggestion regarding our service. We work hard to provide you the best possible service and will always try to be better next time. I hope to welcome you back in the near future so you can convince yourself of our efforts.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Boisdale's has a great selection of wine and spirits (particularly whisky). The menu is Scottish and very well cooked (seafood, fish and steaks). I like the rib eye with pepper sauce and buttered spinach. Sometimes service could be sharper, but the staff are very friendly. There is a great bar downstairs and a cigar bar for those inclined."]
title: Great night out with dinner, live music and wine!

answer_text: ['Joanna,', 'Thank you for your review. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the food, wine & whiskies. I hope you did not have too much trouble picking one of the many tipples. For the days that aren’t filled with sunshine we do have heaters on the terraces to keep you warm!', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon!', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Wow this is a fantastic restaurant - mouth watering scallops and wonderful steak. Well informed staff and great house champagne and wine. Over 1000 malt whiskeys and a stage for the evening entertainment/ Can't wait to go back again. The terrace looks great but on a better day."]
title: Excellence on a plate with whisky on the side

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for your lovely review. Upset that the Turbot Fish & Chips was not up to standard, I have spoken to our Executive Head Chef to prevent recurrence; I was delighted to hear that your thoroughly enjoyed the remainder of your evening. Please contact me directly under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you plan on visiting next and we will make sure to say hello!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['We were greeted with a warm welcome from reception staff on arrival, which was to be a strong theme for the night. Shown to our table and whilst we looked over the menus, we ordered cocktails from the extensive drinks list. ', 'Starters were excellent scallops with black pudding and apple purée (2), mackerel pot and smoked salmon. All were superb. ', 'Mains were turbot fish and chips (2) let down a little by the soggy batter, broad bean risotto and the most perfectly cooked medium rare fillet steak. ', "Excellent wine list, we went for the New Zealand Gewurtztraminer (little beauty - that's the name of the vineyard), followed by Massaya Silver Selection 2007 from the Bekka Valley, Lebanon and a lighter Paritua Pinot Noir 2008 from Central Otago, New Zealand. ", "Absolutely stuffed, we settled down the the music - an ensemble of 18 talented musicians all in their early 20's - the Callum Au big band. They played music from Rhapsody in blue for the first half and West Side Story in the second. ", 'During the interval, almost two hours after our dinner, we ordered deserts which was no problem for the team at Boisdale. A creme caramel was soon served, with a great cheese plate, some fantastic cheeses on offer and fully explained by the head waiter. ', 'Overall a great night and something we will be doing again shortly!']
title: All that Jazz

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for your very kind review and a belated “Happy Birthday!” I am delighted that you enjoyed our Scottish beef & lobster as well as the service. Next time you could go for a steak and add half a lobster to avoid any food envy…', 'I look forward to receiving you again in the near future.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['I was taken to Boisdale for a birthday lunch with work colleagues. We received an attentive service, but not pushy. The guys opted for steaks naturally, which looked and tasted amazing. I opted for the lobster club which was good but I must admit I had food envy as the steaks were delicious! A little pricy but very nice nevertheless, would make a return visit.']
title: Very nice indeed

answer_text: ['Dear Mark,', 'Thank you for your review. I am pleased that you enjoyed the view, the atmosphere & the food.', 'Should you plan on visiting soon, please drop us a line under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk and we will make sure to say hello!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['It has a great view overlooking cabot sq. Full of the usual canary wharf suits. However the staff are pretty good and know their stuff. ', "We tried a sample of the fish selection and frankly it wasn't half bad, not that anywhere in the east end should have a bad selection of fish. ", 'Great views, good ambience for a city place, slightly pricey but to be expected.']
title: No messing solid 4

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write your review.', 'I am pleased that you enjoyed the service and food; however was vexed by your comment regarding flies in the restaurant. We take every precaution to prevent such a problem & have rigorous cleaning procedures in place. As a result we have been awarded 5 out of 5 in the Food Standards Agency rating for food hygiene 3 years running. This year we are challenged. We are open from 11am to midnight and as we have had a fantastic summer with the temperatures soaring the doors to our terraces on the first floor are open all throughout this period. Coupled with the Thames being close by this generates high humidity & provides flies ideal conditions to thrive in. We are working very closely with our pest control contractor to minimise the impact and using all methods available to food premises.', 'Should you wish to discuss in further detail please do not hesitate to contact me under dgm@boisdale-cw.co.uk. I look forward to hearing from you.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Good venue, good service, good food, a bit pricey but this is Canary Wharf. Would have got 4 stars but let down by the endless flies that exist in the restaurant, fly around you, your table, your food, sat on the cheese board. Disgusting. Needs to be sorted.']
title: Good but let down by flies

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your rather lovely review.', 'I am delighted you consider us to be a right venue for so many purposes; a feat that we constantly strive to achieve. Thank you so much for taking the time to write. I look forward to welcoming you again very soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Excellent food, the most amazing whisky selection I have ever seen in one venue, wonderfully well kept cigars and a heated terrace on which to smoke them, friendly and attentive service and second to none entertainment. Why on earth would anyone want to go to Ronnies anymore? Boisdale covers all bases. Perfect venue for a romantic dinner in the main restaurant upstairs, business lunches downstairs with a lovingly mixed cocktail. Really 5 star.']
title: Ronnie who..?

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you very much for taking the time to voice your opinion. I am saddened to hear that the team in Canary Wharf did not meet your expectations on this occasion. I would love to hear about your evening with a little more detail and would appreciate if you could contact me directly under dgm@boisdale-cw.co.uk', 'I look forward to hearing from you soon.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ["We have being in the Canary Wharf place, party of 14, having a set dinner menu. On the positive side - food was reasonably good, trendy decorated place, doesn't feel overcrowded while being absolutely full, very convenient location for the evening drinks and dinner after meetings in Canary Wharf.", 'From the minuses - wine was poor ( probably just not the place specialization), very-very slow service ( we deliberately choose dinner set option for the sake of time, but it still took ages to serve), potions sizes are closer to Michelin star restaurants, that to Scottish ones. ', 'Overall - nice place, but probably will not go next time, unless the location on Canary Wharf is key choice factor.']
title: Nice, but not outstanding

answer_text: ['Dear Graham,', 'Your review is very kind and I appreciate you taking the time to write. We are always delighted to hear guests enjoying the venue as much as we do. I look forward to welcoming you again in the very near future.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Boisdale canary Wharf is a a piece of new york in London. Incredible atmosphere, great jazz and worth more than one visit. Thoroughly recommended.']
title: Boisdale Jazz, Whiskey, Cigars and superb food

answer_text: ['Dear Anthony,', 'Thank you very much for your great review. I’m delighted that Erin & Jon looked after you so well. I have read your review out loud in our briefing and the two were able to collect a prize, customary when staff is mentioned in despatches. We look forward to welcoming you and your friends again soon!', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['A few friends and I visited Boisdale on a Thursday evening recently and we were all pleasantly surprised by the service especially considering how busy it was. ', 'We were served at the bar by Erin who went out of her way to make us extremely time consuming cocktails all the while recommending delicious bar bites to keep us sober. ', 'Her margaritas were the perfect summer drink and the burgers she recommended were fantastic!', 'After that we started on the whiskeys and after considering the unsparing list thought it was best to seek advice from John, another of the bartenders. His advice was spot on and his recommendations topped of a brilliant night out at Boisdale. ', 'Will certainly be recommending this place to friends and colleagues.', 'Anthony Gerard']
title: Great service, fantastic cocktails and whiskeys!

answer_text: ['Thank you for taking the time to write your review. ', 'You will be pleased to know that there have been some changes to the menu and while we have kept the set menu at an excellent price point of £19.75 we have also added more dishes to our a la carte menu at great value. I hope this can entice you to join us again and would love you to let us know under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk if you do.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Go there to experience. Lovely evening for me and my boyfriend. We went for the set menu because we couldn't afford it otherwise, but the food was still amazing!"]
title: Excellent service and entertainment

answer_text: ['Dear Jackie,', 'thank you for joining us testing nearly everything that we have to offer. I cannot agree more when you say that the room feels cosy albeit it being quite large. Andy Rose, our Executive Chef, is also thrilled you enjoyed the rib of beef as well as the haggis. I hope your feet did not hurt to much from dancing and look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Had an amazing night in this restaurant. There is a great buzz from the champagne bar as you arrive and we were lucky enough to get a seat out on the terrace. The service is friendly and knowledgeable. Had a great champagne cocktail. Then upstairs for dinner alongside the biggest whisky in Europe. The dining area is dark red and tartan and very cosy for a large room. Had the haggis to start with a nip of whisky - delicious. I had beautiful fresh fish whilst my dining companions tucked into the biggest rib of steak I've ever seen. No room for pud which was a good thing because once the music started we were all up dancing! Best night out ever!"]
title: Best night out in London

answer_text: ['Dear Keith,', 'Thank you for your beautiful review. I am especially proud that you see us as being your preferred venue in London. The team here have worked hard & with dedication to provide excellent service. A statement like yours makes all the work pay off. I cannot wait to welcome you again to our venue and thank you in person.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['I am a regular user of Boisdale. Originally the Belgravia venue, but now more often than not Canary wharf. In my view this simply the best restaurant in London, with the most attentive staff. To be able to create such a warm personable atmosphere on this scale is an incredible achievement. The steaks are incredible, there is a fabulous wine selection to suit most budgets (the Boisdale claret is excellent value) the largest whisky selection on the planet and a cigar selection to die for. If that\'s not enough, throw in live music just about every night, Whats not to like!! always check out the "beast of the day" or Guest steak.']
title: Probably the best in London

answer_text: ['Thank you Chloe for your review.', 'I am glad that you came in and enjoyed one of our great burgers & that you had the chance to enjoy the terrace at its best! We are looking forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Dined here last night, as a quick random meal. I must say I was very impressed with my gourmet burger, cooked to perfection! Would definitely dine again. Service was also very good. Sat out on the terrace just before 6pm when it started to get busy, however great atmosphere.']
title: Gourmet burger!!!

answer_text: ['Sandy,', 'Thank you very much for taking the time to write such an endearing review after your visit. We are incredibly proud when we receive such lovely feedback from our neighbours and look forward to welcoming you again soon on our doorstep.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Wanting to have a team outing in Canary wharf I took my team to Boisdale.The service was outstanding and the food was mouth watering...We enjoyed chilled drinks and cigars. It makes me feel happy to have this worldclass experience at my door step and I would recommend them with pride. Thank you from Mr Sandy Madhvani Showroom Manager at David M Robinson Jubilee Place Canary Wharf.']
title: excellent service and great experience

answer_text: ['Chris, ', 'Thank you for your review and for trusting us with your clients. I am delighted that you enjoyed so many aspects of our business. We are proud that you think so highly of us. When you plan on visiting again, do drop us an email under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk; we would love to say hello.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Great way to entertain clients! Fantastic attentive service coupled with a knowledge and range of cigars rarely encountered in the UK. ', "My clients were able to enjoy gourmet burgers, excellent wine choice, and then able to retire out to the balcony and enjoy a London summers evening with cigars, and the extraordinarily moreish spicy scotch quail's eggs. Us Londoners are incredibly lucky to have a truly world class venue on our doorstep. ", "Thanks to all the team - we'll definitely be back."]
title: Summer in Havana

answer_text: ['Dear Nic,', 'thank you for taking the time to review us. I am very sorry to hear that on this occasion we did not live up to your standards. I would be very grateful if you would contact me directly under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk to discuss your review in more detail to prevent a future recurrence. ', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['My friends and I visited boisdale on a Tuesday evening and were initally pleased with the service. We ordered from a set menu and i was diappointed with the food. Although presented well, the taste of the meat was not up to the standard I had expected. The service was mostly good, although not very friendly. Maybe a better choice of restaurant for a date. lovely outdoor seating in the bar overlooking canary wharf.']
title: beautiful decor, average food

answer_text: ['Thank you for such a lovely review. I am delighted that you enjoyed your food thoroughly and managed to squeeze in some desserts. While annoyed by the fact that your first choice whisky was out of stock, what are the chances given that we have over 700 varieties? I was happy to hear the team made their amends. I look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['The mixed reviews of Boisdale made us a bit apprehensive but we still had to give it a try. ', 'We went as a group of four on a Monday night. Music was fantastic, as expected, whilst dining experience was also great, much to our relief. ', "Some of the starters ordered were Parma ham and Gravad Lax. Our mains included the truffle burgers, haggis and rump steak. It's true, you can only choose your burger to be cooked medium well or well, but their medium well is more like medium in other places; still pink on the inside. ", 'Everyone was full after starters and mains but we managed to kindly convinced ourselves to have dessert. All of which made all of us smile with satisfaction. The special dessert raspberry jelly, sticky toffee pudding, creme caramel and a cheese course. ', 'In absence of Marlborough Savignon Blanc, we had their Boisdale French one which was quite nice. We wanted to have a petticoat type of whiskey to finish the meal but it was out of stock. To make up got our disappointment, we were given an alternative as a compliment which was a really nice touch. ', 'Great music, good food, drinks and fantastic service. So, would we come back? Oh yes!']
title: A great place

answer_text: ['Thank you Hector for your great review and for returning to Boisdale of Canary Wharf to dine in a Private Room with dedicated waiter. If you love our signature steaks, you should join us from the 29th September 2013 onwards when we will start to open Sundays for Sunday Roasts. That way you can enjoy our great grass fed dry aged beef with Yorkshire puddings and goose fat roast Potatoes. I hope to welcome you then or on any other occasion.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['This is my second time to eat here with a small group of colleagues/guests in a small private room overlooking Cabot Square. Excellent service, good wines, sound menu -- the best choice being one of their signature steaks!']
title: Very fine steaks, ideal for business dinner at Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Linda,', 'Thank you for your short but lovely review. I am delighted to hear that we have on several occasions been able to meet your expectations. With regards to our service charge; an industry standard 12.5% is divided wholly amongst the team. As you state it is optional and should you be dissatisfied will be removed from your bill.', 'Kindly let us know when you plan to visit next under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk and we will make sure to say hello.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['We have been before and we are never disappointed. great food,great music and lovely atmosphere! there is a high service charge but it is optional.']
title: fantastic

answer_text: ['Dear Patrick,', 'Thank you for taking time to review our Canary Wharf restaurant.', 'I am very sorry that on this occasion the service fell so short of expectations.', 'I would like and opportunity to restore your faith and would be very grateful if you could contact me directly on Nathan@boisdale.co.uk so we can discuss your complaint in more detail. ', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan Evans', 'Deputy Managing Director']
content: ['We went this weekend to Frank Sinatra night, great atmosphere and brilliant setting.', 'There is a great and varied menu, all of food was well presented and everything we ate was delicious.', "However, service was poor and not what you'd expect in a place where your paying £30-£40 for a main course (plus sides) Our waitress was unfriendly and unhelpful. There were 6 of us and 5 main courses came together the 6th arrived 20 minutes after everyone elses just as the rest of us were all finishing. We had to order fresh sides as the they were all cold by the time the 6th meal arrived. No engagement from the staff or Managemet on this we had to keep chasing and we were told it was coming. Then the staff just avoided our table. Real Shame but I'd recommend avoiding the restaurant. Service really ruined our evening!"]
title: Great Food, Terrible Terrible Service!

answer_text: ["Dear 'Bizzyboy1960' ", 'Thank you so much for taking time to write such a comprehensive and complimentary review, for which we are very grateful.', 'We are delighted that your chose to spend a milestone birthday for your wife with us & thrilled that you & your guests had a wonderful time.', 'I have shared your feedback with the team and have presented Gintare with her Boisdale Champagne (Something we do, when specific team members get mentioned in despatches!)', 'Our executive Head Chef - Andy Rose, has passed on your positive feedback regarding the food to the team at Canary Wharf, who were beaming....', 'I do hope we will be welcoming you back very soon. Please drop me an email ahead of the next visit to Nathan@boisdale.co.uk, I would like to thank you in person.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan Evans']
content: ["I wanted a good location for my wife's 60th birthday and stumbled across Boisedale on the internet and decided to give it a site recki.", 'From the point I entered the venue I knew it was perfect. After discussing my requirements with Gintare, who was very informative and helpful in assisting me selecting the most appropriate table for our needs. A cup of coffee was offered and produced while I made my final decisions.', 'Although a Scottish themed venue it doesn’t smack you in the face, just the tartan carpet, furnishings and waiting staff attire accent the homeland, the jazz connection is more apparent from the pictures adorned on the wall.', 'We arrived to a complimentary glass of champagne in honour of my wife’s birthday - nice touch.', 'The menu and wine list is the type that you can have a reasonably priced meal and drink or you can go to town.', 'We ordered a selection of starters - steak tartare (expertly mixed at the table to the correct degree of piquanteness), smoked salmon was thickly cut and served with a soft poached egg and delicate leaves - nice change from the flat thin slices covering the plate, cesaer salad and nice looking prawn cocktail with good tasting plump prawns.', 'Our main courses ranged from a well flavoured grilled lobster, a manly sized steak and kidney pudding, a huge rib eye steak, a chunky rump steak, a good golden hockey puck shaped Cod and Haddock fishcake- tasty and chunky texture, a grilled dover sole. The vegetable accompaniments are good and interesting not just your boring green beans - we had Hispi cabbage, chorizo sausage & caraway, Steamed Broccoli, Lemon& Toasted Linseeds and Leaf Spinach, Simply Wilted or Creamed with Black Truffle.', 'For dessert we had a couple rhubarb and apple nut crumbles (my wife’s dessert plate had Happy Birthday piped in chocolate on it), a selection of cheese’s from a huge cheese offering served with pera slices and honey.', 'I had brought a Choccywockydoodaa cake with us with two numeral sparkles. The waiters tactfully brought the cake from the kitchen and light the sparklers close to the table but shielded from my wife to conceal the surprise.', 'One of my guests said "this has been faultless tonight", and he was right. As a package, from the first meeting, to the champagne reception, the meal, the Jazz music the staff were totally professional, very attentive without being intrusive which all went to make an excellent celebratory evening.', 'So whether a business meal, pre-theatre dine or a celebratory dinner I warming recommend it. The management should be very proud of their team.', 'To access the restaurant by car its best to go to Cabot car park in Canary Wharf and take the lift directly to the 2nd floor restaurant. If you are not too bothered about the music artist choose a table furthest from the stage as it can be a tad loud.']
title: Faultless Boisdale

answer_text: ['Dear Lisa,', 'We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit to Boisdale Canary Wharf.', 'Check out our website for even more great bands to dance to & drop us an email ahead of your next visit so we can be sure to say hello.', 'Nathan']
content: ['I was taken to boisedale by friends for my birthday really enjoyed my meal ,decor is very new York in style, band really good even had a room to dance fantastic night will return soon.']
title: Birthday dinner

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for your fantastic review as well as for spending your birthday with us. Thank you for mentioning Glen in your review, he was happy to have played his part.', 'We all look forward to welcoming you and your friends again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Wow, this place it the one! The staff are attentive, the food is delicious, the atmosphere is contagious and where do I start about the music...the whole package made for an extra special birthday celebration.', 'Want to say an extra big thank you to one of the Restaurant managers Glenn, thank you for making my evening wonderful. This place is defo on my recommend list.']
title: Excellent

answer_text: ['Dear Mark,', 'Thank you so much for choosing for your 10th anniversary. I am pleased to hear that everyone on the team did their part to ensure you have had a memorable evening. I look very much forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warmest Regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Having eaten here on a few 'special' occasions in the past and never been disappointed, I decided to book a table here for our 10th wedding anniversary last Saturday. The wife and I think the Restaurant setting is just fabulous with the impressive bar stocked with hundreds of whiskies on one side, the panoramic view from the bay window on the other and the stage / dance floor straight ahead!", 'The decor combined with the atmosphere created by the live music, Saturday was a Motown Tribute, just makes this a special place.', 'The wife likes to think she is a vegetarian, (I know that she is just a fussy eater) but the food was exceptional and the service was attentive without being intrusive. In our opinion, this really is a classy joint!']
title: Classy joint!!!!!

answer_text: ['Dear Martin,', 'I am delighted you have enjoyed your evening with us & that the team wholly looked after you. Please check our websites for information on future bands playing on our stage.', 'I look forward to welcoming you again soon.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['This restaurant has a really good atmosphere and plenty of space between tables. The view from the windows is extensive.The staff are very good and the food was excellent. I had langoustines followed by Dover Sole and it was top-notch.', 'At around 9.30 we had the option to extend our stay at the table for a small fee to enjoy a very good jazz band who played for the rest of the evening.']
title: Very pleasant evening

answer_text: ['Dear Rafael,', 'Thank you for the feedback of your visit. I am delighted you enjoyed our whisky range and that you did enjoy our Haggis; we do get lots of excellent feedback. I would be very interested in hearing more of your thoughts regarding the rest of the evening. I would be delighted if you drop me an email under dgm@boisdale-cw.co.uk and outline your views.', 'Warmest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['I was here mostly to try Haggis (hard to find in Seattle). The selection of whisky is simply impressive, including rare and extinct brands. I tried the Kalkerran (never heard before of it), and was worth the price tag. The haggis was good, but my companion (from Scotland) was not overly impressed. I look forward to try it again a bit further North.', 'Service was quite disconnected from an otherwise great experience. Probably our waitress was inexperienced, but she was unable to answer questions about the menu, and was quite slow.']
title: Impressive selection of whisky, good food, ok service

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for your feedback, and for choosing us on such an important day. I am sad to hear that we did not live up to your expectations. I would be delighted if you would be able to provide me with some detail under dgm@boisdale-cw.co.uk . Our pastry chef was quite delighted that you would return for his deserts though…', 'I look forward to hearing from you!', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Falko']
content: ['Went for our wedding anniversary thought the food was over priced for the food Dessert was v good. Service was slow felt like they did not have enough staff. Would go back for the dessert.']
title: V expensive meal

answer_text: ['Dear Guests, ', 'Thank you very much for your review. I am glad you have enjoyed your food. I am very sorry that you had to wait for your salt & pepper. It is part of the standard setup, but we have introduced new procedures to prevent a recurrence . We are very proud of our whisky selection and have a team of enthusiastic and dedicated bar tenders who have lots of tastings and training sessions laid on, to keep their creative brains ticking. I’m delighted they were able to help you navigate through weighty volume.', 'I look forward to welcoming you back in the future and hope you drop us a quick email so we can make sure to say hello.', 'Falko']
content: ['Myself and my husband came here for an anniversary meal. We booked a table in their oyster bar and grill when there was a live band upstairs, which made the atmosphere very quiet. I had a lobster club and my husband the bone in rib steak as a main. We had a McSween haggis and a Loch Duart smoked salmon to start. All was nearly excellent, but there was no salt and pepper on the table and we had to wait for that a bit longer. The claret and the whisky was also impressive. An Scotch whisky lover would enjoy flicking though the seemingly endless pages which come as booklet rather than a menu card. The desserts were also very lovely. Overall we were both impressed and will probably come back another time and sit in the main restaurant area.']
title: Very smart setting very good food and whiskies

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you very much for your review. I am happy you enjoyed the setting and the service from our waiter, even though your arrival was a bit rushed. We are currently training a few members of staff and I am confident that the team will be so much stronger for it. With regards to the music charge, it seems unfortunate that you were not aware of the music ticket charge, as every team member has been trained to ensure guests arriving without booking are made aware of the ticket charge prior to seating. In the event of a booked table, the reservations team ensure you will have been made aware and an online booking can only be made with an acknowledgement of the charge. We are currently working on making this system even more clear and concise to our customers.', 'At Boisdale we aim to provide dining opportunities at any price point. While I agree that for example our finest dry-aged Fillet of Beef on the bone may seem expensive, I would point out it is a premium cut of meat of the highest quality. I can only refer to our excellent value Jacobite Menu. This is a 2 course menu available for lunch as well as dinner, all week; for £19.75. When you pair this with one of our 12 wines available for under £25 I hope you can agree that we can provide excellent value.', 'Again thank you for your feedback and I do wish to welcome you back in the near future.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ["Very nice setting. Good views and romantic decor. Service felt a bit rushed when we arrived but our waiter was great. Not really sure why £4.50 per person is added on for ? Entertainment. I think that really takes the Michael!! poor taste! Overall not bad. Probably most romantic place on canary wharf. Food on the whole was good. Definitely wouldn't pay full price as v expensive."]
title: Romance in canary wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you so much for your lovely review.', 'We are delighted that you think our restaurant is awesome.', 'Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan']
content: ['Delicious food, excellent service and great location. I went twice and had a great time. Highly recommended.']
title: This place is awesome

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for your brief but splendid feedback!!', 'I look forward to welcoming you back again soon.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['First time here, fantastic food great service, would return, steaks were beyond great!!!!! Live music is always a plus ']
title: Epic lunch

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you for taking time to review our restaurant.', 'We were delighted that you like the décor, thought the food was excellent & the staff attentive.', "It was disappointing to read however that you scored the restaurant as 'poor' because other guests were talking during Clare Teal's performance.", "I appreciate that the actions of others obviously had a negative impact on your enjoyment of the show & I have taken steps to ensure Clare's next performance will be a Saturday night, due to intimate nature of her set. The absence of any corporate business on Saturdays makes for a totally different experience. ", 'Boisdale is a restaurant dedicated to great live music, it would not be practical to cease the service during the performance with so many customers dining. ', "Finally, Clare is both completely at ease & very capable when dealing with a difficult audience. Previous audiences at her show have been quiet enough to hear a pin drop, particularly during her beautiful rendition of 'Chasing Cars'.", 'I hope your positive remarks regarding the food, service & décor would convince you to return.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan']
content: ["I went with my husband to this restaurant/jazz club to see Clare Teal. The décor is beautiful. The staff are extremely attentive and friendly and the food is excellent. However, many of the tables carried on talking during the show, as did the staff. Apparently this always happens as a lot of the tables are paid for by companies, so the people aren't bothered about the act. For this reason I would not go back, as it was very irritating and totally inconsiderate."]
title: Busy Boisdale

answer_text: ['Dear Sonia,', 'Thank you for your great review. I am delighted you enjoyed our Macsween’s Haggis, which we roast, rather than boil as we believe this makes for better flavour. You are quite right with regards to the whiskies and the cigars, both being amongst the best selections in Europe. I hope to be able to welcome you back in the not too distant future.', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['The restaurant was truly beautiful, boasting one of the larges whisky collections and humidors in Europe??', 'We had a collection of starters and steak. The haggis starter is divine! As was the quail scotch eggs.']
title: Beautiful restaurant and food

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you so much for your marvellous review. I am always delighted to hear that the team has performed over and beyond, so thank you for letting us know. Andy Rose, our Executive Chef & his team, are delighted that you enjoyed the food. I hope to welcome you back in the near future not only for business but perhaps to enjoy an evening of jazz and whisky. ', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['I attended a business meal here in the private dining room.', 'We had a reception on the veranda which was great. From the start the staff were exceptional - they really went the extra mile to ensure we were look after at every point.', 'The dining room was very pleasant, the food was really good and the wine waiters were very professional.', 'Afterwards we availed ourselves of one of the biggest selections of Malt Whisky I have ever seen. You could spend some serious money!', 'Ideal for business entertaining.']
title: Fantastic for Business

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you very much for your review. We try to anticipate the needs of our guests so I am happy the team recognised you were not in a hurry. I look forward to welcoming you again soon in the near future and hope you enjoy your return visit!', 'Warm regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Met a friend for a business lunch. We had not seen each other for a number of months so lots of news to catch up. The staff did not hurry us to order, which I had not expected from a somewhere used to doing lunches in Canary Wharf. I will certainly be back.']
title: Lobster for Lunch

answer_text: ['Dear Stevie,', 'Thanks for taking time to write a review. We are delighted that you liked the venue and felt that the service was excellent all the way through. We are obviously disappointed that the food on this occasion did not live up to expectations. We sell a few hundred portions of the bisque a week but it is clear that this was over-seasoned on the night in question.', 'I have taken your feedback on the beef to the butcher, in the hope that we can prevent a recurrence. We only buy the very best Dry-Aged, Aberdeenshire beef and generally receive very positive feedback on our steaks, sadly not this time. It sounds like a poor cut of meat slipped through the net. Happy to hear the fish & chips was good.', 'Perhaps you could contact us on manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk and give us an opportunity to show you how good the food can be.', 'Kind regards,', 'Nathan']
content: ['Boisdale Canary Wharf is a giant of a venue, beautifully decked out in traditionally rich Scottish colours, an enormous main dining room with a grand bar on the right and a small stage at the top for the musicians. Tables are spacious yet cosy, white table-cloths, sterling silver cutlery, decent glassware. In all, it screams elegance and grandeur and you are anticipating a great meal ahead.', "It is such a shame then that I write this review with very mixed feelings. Certainly the service and staff were excellent all the way through, being very attentive without being intrusive. The wine selection is extensive and their by-the-glass Malbec was very good value. The whisky offering is unbelievably large and I could quite easily while away several weeks just sampling the drams they have. The jazz band on that night were phenomenal (I wish I could remember the band's name!) and made for a great ambience.", "Food-wise however, Boisdale was a real disappointment. The shellfish bisque that was ordered by four out of the six of us was so far over-salted that it was unbearable. All four diners sent their soups back to be replaced by four fresh versions that still were on the salty side. I can understand if one person's salt preference is more on the bland side, but for four people to all comment in similar fashion is more than just personal taste. My steak tartare was as expected, given that the preparation and seasoning is done by myself rather than pre-prepared by the chef.", 'Fish & chips as a main course was very good - a huge chunk of lightly battered fish with plentiful chips. The "untrimmed rib of beef on the bone" (£25) sadly was offered not such complimentary comments. Flavour-wise, the beef was a little bland and could have done with a bit more seasoning (in strange contrast to the bisque before!) but what is totally unforgiveable is the poor quality of the meat itself. Cooked medium rare to medium, the meat was almost impossible to cut with a steak knife, being far too stringy and tough. The fat simply had not rendered anywhere near enough, even though the steak was of thick-enough stature to allow the fat to melt away without overcooking.', 'In comparison to Hawksmoor (which I have just reviewed), Boisdale is a good deal cheaper but on the evidence of this visit, it needs to up its game quite considerably to be acceptable in standard.']
title: Great jazz, disappointing food

answer_text: ['Dear Mr Jensen,', 'Thanks for your feedback, we are delighted that you consider us to be one of the best places to sit and relax with live music in London. ', "We're sorry our food did not impress you on your visit, we pride ourselves on sourcing the very best ingredients, primarily from Scotland and producing balanced, flavoursome dishes of the highest quality. I'm sorry you felt this was not the case.", 'Please drop us an email so we can find out a little more about your experience.', 'Yours sincerely,', 'Nathan Evans']
content: ['This is one of the best places in London to sit and relax and listen to live music and enjoy a drink or two. The food is nothing special.', 'The drinks are not that pricey but a bit small. They have a HUGE whisky collection!', 'They have a lot of great live music and the decor setting of the place is impressive.', 'On the floor below there is a terrace and a cigar lounge']
title: Great bar, not so great restaurant

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer,', 'Thank you for taking us up on our half price seafood offer, which is proving to be very popular.', "I'm sorry that the whelks were not up to scratch. I have spoken to our Executive Head Chef to prevent a recurrence. I have also spoken to the team regarding the recommended amount of space required to enjoy these dishes in comfort. ", 'I empathise with your remaraks on the service which is calculated at 12.5% of the bill before the 50% is discounted from the food element.', 'All of the service charge goes to the team and we try not to let strong discount offers promoted by the company such as a 50% off food, adversly effect their earnings.', 'The service charge obviously remains optional and you were quite within your right to remove it.', 'We will make this policy even more clear on-line and when people book, but assure you that this is not sharp practise.', 'I look forward to welcoming you back soon.', 'Kind regards,', 'Nathan']
content: ["We recently went to Boisdale to take advantage of their half price seafood platter deal. We went all out and decided on the Royale platter (originally £95), lobster, crab, six oysters, six langoustines, prawns, cockles, mussels and whelks. Good value when you're only paying £47.50.", 'The food was good, decent sized lobster for two and a decent amount for two to share. Disappointingly the whelks were nearly all impossible to get into.', "We were sat on a tiny table for two which couldn't accommodate the platter, our plates, drinks and finger bowls so we asked if we could move to a larger table for four. No problem but the staff seemed a little surprised that we wanted to move.", 'When we asked for the bill we saw that we were charged a whopping 25% service charge as the service had been calculated before the discount had been taken off. Be wary of this should you go for the deal as the waitress handed over the PDQ without seemly realising the high bill. We had the service charge refunded once we looked into it.', "Overall I'd rate the following: service 3/5, food 4/5, value for money 4/5 (but only because it was half price), toilets 4/5 and general ambience 3/5."]
title: Half price seafood platter great - 25% service charge not so

content: ['What a fantastic night. My family went here for an evening out so the age range was varied. My daughter is 20 to my father in law who is 89 years old. The music was fantastic and thank you Mr Ray Gelato who came to our table after performing and gave my father in law a signed cd. You made our visit very special. The food was fantastic. The service was second to none. And my family cant wait to come again.']
title: A brilliant night. Not to be missed

answer_text: ['Dear Tony,', 'Thank you for your wonderful review. The team at our Canary Wharf Restaurant are delighted that you had such a great time on Saturday night.', 'We look forward to welcoming you back very soon', 'Kind regards,', 'Nathan']
content: ['Certainly one of the best places that I have been. Fantastic views elevated over Canary Wharf. There was a Stevie Wonder tribute band playing in the background. The food was beyond belief. After dinner I visited the cigar bar and has a super cigar. There was also an oyster and champaingne bar. This place, you really have to book in advance.']
title: Pie in the sky

answer_text: ['Caroline, thank you so much for your review.', 'I am happy that the three of you had a good time. It was lovely to see you again and I look forward to the next time.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['This is my 4th visit to Boisdale this year. My sister and I took our mum for a belated mothers day meal and she absolutely loved it! The food was amazing - she had the risotto which was the best she has had before. The waiters and waitresses all work together exceptionally well and come across as very professional at all times. The manager was attentive and makes you feel very welcome. The Congo Faith Healers were playing and they were brilliant. My mum even bought their cd! ', 'So to sum up.....great restaurant, food, atmosphere, staff. A great evening enjoyed by all 3 of us.']
title: My favourite restaurant

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your fabulous review.', 'It is wonderful to hear you have had a lovely time & I look forward to welcoming you again before long! Do check the website for upcoming events including our Guitar Greats festival and make sure to drop us an email under manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk when you plan on visiting us next.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["visited Boisdale for the first time and was not disappointed . we booked a premium table so we could enjoy the atmosphere of being in jazz club in addition to some fine dining. My first impression was how grand the whiskey bar was with the largest selection of whiskey you could imagine. We were greeted and shown to our table which was lit with candles and well layed out, cosy and romantic. The views were very good looking out over canary wharf, with the rest of the club tastefully decorated with various art etc, stylish. The service was spot on ,as was the food, nothing to much trouble for the waitress who looked after us very well. fantastic wine list, wines to suit every taste at reasonable prices. Great music venue as well , great band , great atmosphere . Also had a cocktail in the bar which is down below the restaurant that was lovely as well. All in all had a great night and can't wait to return."]
title: Great all round venue!

answer_text: ['Dear Bob,', 'Thank you for your review, which is greatly appreciated by the team at Bosidale Canary Wharf.', "It is heart-warming to hear that you enjoyed both the food & the ambience. The cigar terrace really comes into it's own now that the warmer weather is here too.", "It was the second time we have run the 'Suspiciously Elvis' show this year and I agree that Ivor gives a splendid performance as Elvis. Saturday's show was one of the best yet.", 'He returns in October and we hope to welcoming you back very soon.', 'Drop us an email prior to your next visit and we will be sure to say hello.', 'Kind regards,', 'Nathan']
content: ['First went here over two years ago. Got a flyer in the post so went to see a jazz band .. And wow what a great place....the decor the ambience the music and the food is great. The great selections of whiskeys are the cherry on top! Went last night to the Elvis tribute night and a good singer who puts on a good show. The food was superb as is the members cigar terrace. For those who like live music, cigars and excellent food then you should pay this place a visit.']
title: Great night out

content: ["My friends and I went to Boisdale for a birthday, all 12 of us were very disappointed with the overall experience. The majority of us chose Haggis for starters, only to be told they had 'run out'. The steak I received for my main course was largely made up of fat (a large amount of weight the steak claimed to be) and did not come as requested it to be cooked. The side dishes were a laughable size but were probably the best thing about the meal. Service was average and dining was slow, we waited a long time for our food to come out. Music was ok, but more of a gimmick than entertainment. Sadly another restaurant you pay the price to eat in a nice location not the quality of food. Overall I would NEVER go back or recommend to anyone... Should have gone to Goodman's or Hawksmoor!"]
title: Huge disappointment!

answer_text: ['Dear Janice,', 'Thanks for your detailed review. ', 'We are obviosuly delighted that you and your guests had a great night out with us.', "It was the first time the Lamours have performed, but the feedback has been great so I'm sure we will book them again.", 'I am also pleased to here that your gluten intolerance was dealt with professionally and that you enjoyed your dinner.', "As for background noise, I do take your point and although I wasn't there on that particular Friday, there have been occasions where a proportion of the audience are there for dinner only and seem disinterested in the music. All of the artist are aware of these difficulties and used to dealing with some background noise. We are however looking at making an announcement before the more intimate performances, requesting guests to keep their conversation to a minimum. We are hoping this will do the trick!", 'Please drop us an email before you next visit, I would like an opportunity to thank you for your lovely review.', 'Best wishes,', 'Nathan']
content: ['What can I say? What an amazing amazing place!! Lovely attentive staff AND a goody bag! But v-e-r-y expensive. ', 'We went on a Friday night to see a band called The Lamours. On our arrival my coat was taken from attentive cloakroom staff and then we were shown to our table (VIP, at the front, and for which you pay lots extra!) and asked if we wanted a drink…we opted for champagne (£23 for 2 glasses). We had arrived early because we wanted to eat before the entertainment began, only we didn’t realise we would have a 3 hour wait! The lovely waitress suggested that we took our champagne to the oyster bar downstairs – this we did and it was crowded because it was a Friday night, so we went and stood on the balcony and looked at Canary Wharf and all the sights. The drinks there weren’t actually too dear, a pint of real ale and a non-alcoholic cocktail came to £6.10.', 'We went back to our table and chose from the extensive menu. There was no problem with the fact that I need a gluten-free diet. I had gravadlax for starters (absolutely delish) and my friend had haggis tatties and neeps with a snifter! For mains we both had steaks, I had a lovely tender ribeye with Bloody Mary sauce (inspired) and he had a sirloin steak. The vegetables were interesting, I had broccoli with lemon juice and almonds and he had cabbage with onion and mushroom. ', 'The cheese trolley – what can I say?? I’ve never seen anything like it. It must have been 3’ in diameter and full of the most wonderful cheeses including Lancashire Bomb (black, spherical and full of crumbly Lancashire cheese) and Stinking Bishop. The waitress actually asks you what kind of cheese you prefer then guides you in the right direction. I had the best crème caramel with a creamy/crème freche type accompaniment.', 'We had a very good red wine (there again v-e-r-y expensive judging from the wine list ) and coffee. The bottles of whisky behind the bar have to be seen to be believed.', "I didn’t actually see the bill, but be warned - 12½% service charge is added automatically and we didn't realise this until afterwards. ", "The only thing spoiling the evening was the chatter made by people who went for a night out and not to hear the band, which is extremely annoying and not very respectful to the musicians. (Note to the Boisdale – can’t you manage this in some way?? I’ve been to jazz clubs where the management challenge noisy customers. Why should we pay a helluva lot and not be able to hear properly?) Oh, and the acoustics aren't brilliant either, but I was prepared to overlook that. ", 'And the goody bag?? Well it contained a ¼ bottle of Canard Duchene champagne (no rubbish here, obviously!), a miniature of Chivas Regal, a tiny bag of posh chocs and a CD of Cuban music. ', 'Would I go again? Oh yes please']
title: Amazing special night out

answer_text: ['Dear Reviewer, thank you so much for contributing. I am very pleased you enjoyed yourself.', 'It would be great to see you again soon.', 'Kindest regards', 'Falko']
content: ['Cool place, fantastic views from the public terrace , food good, larger was the best and staff a bit offhand, but great atmosphere and stopping of place after work .']
title: Boisdales

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for your fantastic review.', 'Did you know that if you join us on Mondays through to Wednesdays the music starts from 7pm so you would have plenty of time to enjoy it and still be able to be home at a reasonable time?', 'I really hope to welcome you again very soon.', 'Falko']
content: ["My second trip to Boisdale was just as marvellous as the first: excellent food, first rate service and attention to my need to be in and out double quick. My lunch host recommended the steak - WOW! It was cooked exactly as I'd asked and was delicious. Now, not everyone wants to visit Canary Wharf but this place rocks - in more ways than one - they do R&B and jazz evenings - sadly I live 2 hours away from the office so unfortunately I daren't afford myself the luxury of an evening meal -wish I could - one day, maybe."]
title: Super restaurant - food excellent

answer_text: ['Thank you for your review. I am delighted you enjoyed the food and cocktails. ', 'Some of our bourbons are exceptionally difficult to source so please accept my apologies for the inconvenience caused. We are looking forward to welcoming you again soon; hopefully on the terraces with lots of sunshine.', 'Warm regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Boisdale is a really well run place. The food is excellent, especially the new york strip steak, the sides are very good, and they do one of the best whiskey sours in London. It's not cheap, but its not in the Hawksmoor group of pricing. The Jazz is atmospheric without being a distraction. Cheese board is excellent. The only gripe is the lack of bourbons. Had to go to my third choice before they found one in stock. There is also a cigar terrace which i cant wait to try in summer."]
title: Our new favourite local

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'thank you for your fabulous comment on our restaurant. I am glad to see you have come to your senses and agree that tartan is the way forward. Please let us know when you are visiting next (manager@boisdale-cw.co.uk) and we will make sure to say hello.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ['Once you get over the somewhat twee decor slap bang in the middle of canary wharf, theres nothing not to like about boisdales. Fab steaks, haggis, and great wines. Service was good , and after a nice steak and red wine, i actually started to think tartan wallpaper is the way to go']
title: whats not to like?

answer_text: ['Dear Peter, ', 'All of us work hard to make Boisdale of Canary Wharf something special so thank you very much for your lovely review. Please look on our website for information on our upcoming music line up and other events such as whisky and cigar tastings. ', 'I hope to welcome you back soon.', 'Warmest regards,', 'Falko']
content: ["Steak was cooked to perfection and seafood bisque was one of the best I have tasted. I can't say that I've ever seen such a huge selection range of whiskeys on the separate list and stacked high behind the bar. Really nice evening with first class and appropriate musical entertainment to dine by."]
title: Great Experience

answer_text: ['Dear Catherine,', 'I am delighted that you enjoyed the entertainment, the Dry-Aged Scottish beef and the service with us on Saturday night. Thank you so much for your review.
